1141111112212121111122.content:
"Give it to me." Ian says.
"WHAT?" Jack asks, not believing his ears.
"Give it to me dude. I'll hold on to it."
"I don't know..." Jack says, his voice trailing off.
"Oh, wait are you afraid of? The coin's going to get my mom pregnant? My dad pregnant? Me.. pregnant? Come on man, it's just a coin. You give it to me, I'll hold on to it, and after a few days when you've calmed down and realized that all of this... stuff is in your head, I'll give it back. Your under a lot of stress and I think your projecting your feeling onto the coin. So, I hold onto it, your life goes back to normal.. .Well normal as it's going to be for you now with your Mom pregnant" Ian finishes.

Jack sighed and looked at the coin, turning it over and over with his fingers. What if Ian's right? What if all of this is coincidence and he's finally losing it? But it can't be... He saw what it did to Jessica, to Faye, to April, to Tara. It has power... Doesn't it?

"Tick tock, Crazy. Offer's only good for the next sixty seconds.." Ian says looking at his watch.
"Okay" Jack says, handing the coin over to Ian.

"But Ian... Promise me.. PROMISE ME.. That you'll be careful with that thing.. Don't flip it, don't look at anyone. Just keep it locked up somewhere!" Jack says, begging his friend with all of his might.
"Jack, listen.." Ian says, trying to calm his friend down.
"PROMISE ME IAN! DON'T MESS AROUND WITH THAT THING!" Jack is shouting.
"Okay man, okay. I will." Ian says, taking the coin and putting it in his pocket.
"Now Jack, don't you feel a little better now?" Ian asks.
"I do, actually. I feel like some weight has been lifted off my shoulder. " Jack says, feeling a false sense of relief washing over him.
"Good, now ready to go home and do some online Zombie Massacre Mania 2?" Ian asks, getting his friend amped.
"Yeah man. Let's do this!" Jack says, ready to kill some hordes of undead.

"Alright, let's get going. Whoever's online first, sends the other one a game invite." Ian says.
"You got it." Jack says, picking up his package and heading off to his car.

Everything was going to get better from here on out Jack thought Who knows? Maybe now that the coin is gone, maybe the magic will reverse itself

- - - - - Jack's Room - - - - - -

As Jack walked to his car, coin free back at the mall, he had no idea that a coin, exactly the same as the one he just gave his friend Ian, just appeared on top of his dresser with a faint laugh that could only be heard to those who were in his room

- - - - - - Ian's Point Of View - - - - -

Ian was certain that this was the best thing for his friend. With the coin out of sight, Jacks mind could rest and have to deal with all the crazy craziness that was certain to go on in his life right now.

Ian reached into his pocket and pulled out this coin that his friend just gave to him. It was impossibly smooth, almost brand new feeling, yet looked older than old. It was covered in deep scratches, yet the image of what looked like a happy pregnant woman and a pregnant... man?

"Man this thing is weird" Ian says looking at the images. "I have no idea what Jack would buy something like this. But that's his problem not mine." Ian said.

As Ian walked back towards where he parked on the opposite side of the mall, he was constantly flipping the coin and catching it, a trick his uncle taught him to do when he was younger.

As he flipped the coin, over and over and over again, Ian looked at all the people who crowded this mall. It was particularly crowded today, but that didn't seem to bother Ian, he loved to people watch, women, men, old, young, it didn't matter to him, although Ian's favorite was the scantily clad ladies who did seem to frequent this shopping center.

As Ian walked into the parking garage, he didn't seem to notice behind him, men and women, young and old, either cover their mouths because they were about to be sick, or that the midsections of these peoples were beginning to round out, some of the men and women responding in panic, others rubbing their new round life orbs with a smile and coo.

- - - - - - - Back to Jack - - - - -

Jack left the mall a new man. No more coin, no more worries, just the sweet sweet promise of zombie ultra violence. Ian would get home first, he always did, which gave Jack some extra time.

He could try and beat Ian home and set up the game, hopefully having to come face-to-face with his now pregnant Mom, or he could go check up on Jessica. Maybe, just maybe she really wasn't - - - You know..

Jack turned the key, and the car roared to life. Jack decided to -
1141111112212121111122.title: Oh, this is going to end badly.

choices: He got a text from Amber
Nothing happened and he went straight home
11411111122121211111222.content:
Jack knew exactly what he needed to do. Pulling out of the mall parking lot, he headed back to the somewhat-familiar neighborhoods where Jessica lived. As he drove, he didn't notice the pregnant women (and men) walking along the entrance of the mall, either strolling along pleasantly with their full womb cradled in their arms or waddling anxiously and uncomfortably, staring in confusion at the new occupant inside them.

Once he pulled up in front of her house, Jack texted Jessica to let her know he was outside. After a few moments, he got a message back. <Come on in>.

Jack could feel himself shaking nervously as he walked up, still not knowing what condition Jessica was in after last night's sudden...episode. Every time Jack's mind drifted to the conclusion that she must be pregnant, he shook his head emphatically. The coin's gone now, he told himself. The coin's gone, and with it, all my problems.

Jessica opened the door as Jack approached, giving him a soft smile. "Hi."

"Hi," Jack said back, walking up to her. He couldn't help but notice that she still had a slight bulge under her shirt. Swallowing nervously, he looked back up at Jessica, who still had a tiny grin, one of her front teeth just barely biting her lip. Without a word, Jack kept walking forward, Jessica taking a few steps back to let him inside.

"We should talk in my room," Jessica said. Jack wasn't exactly sure of what to make of this turn of events, but he gladly followed Jessica down the hall into a very cool-looking bedroom. There was a subtly green paint over the walls, a stacked bookshelf, a CD rack, and a table covered in various computer and music accessories. Jessica sat down on a bed with a thick comforter and patted the seat for Jack to sit next to her.

"So..." Jack said slowly. "Did you, um, go to the doctor or anything?"

"I did," Jessica said, before taking a big sigh and turning to Jack. "Looks like I'm a mom."

Jack hung his head and looked at Jessica sadly. "Oh, Jessica, I'm...so sorry."

Jessica smiled weakly and put her hands over the firm bulge in her mid-section. "About three months pregnant, according to the clinic. Looks like you were right: that coin of yours really does make people pregnant. That's the only explanation, unless my fingers can get me pregnant." She giggled and looked at Jack, who's already nervous face turned bright red with embarrassment. "Aw, c'mon Jack, I'm trying to make jokes to lighten the mood. This is usually the kind of thing you do."

Jack looked back at Jessica and tried to force a smile of his own. "I just want make sure you're okay. This whole thing is my fault."

"Hey, it's not your fault," Jessica said, resting her head on Jack's shoulder, making a pouting face. "Stop saying that. Who could have expected that a coin would make someone pregnant?"

"Well, I went ahead and got rid of the coin. I gave it away to someone who assured me they'd put it somewhere far away, out of reach. It can't get anyone pregnant ever again," Jack said, before sighing and looking down at Jessica. "Well, not before it got my mom pregnant, though."

"Your mom's pregnant too?" Jessica said, looking back into Jack's eyes from her spot on his shoulder. "You're sure it's the coin's doing? Couldn't she and your dad have just...you know?"

"Well, she's kind of old to get pregnant from that," Jack said, trying not to think of his parents...ugh. "Besides, it sounded like she was a lot further along and the coin seems to make people kind of advanced into their pregnancy." Jack paused before adding the next issue. "And she's pregnant with four babies, which seems like exactly the kind of dick move the coin would pull."

"Four?!" Jessica said, wrenching her head up suddenly to stare back at Jack. "Your mom is having quadruplets?" Then, a serious thought dawned on her and Jessica clutched her small belly. "You...you don't think I could be pregnant with that many, do you?"

Jack thought about it before shaking his head. "I mean, I guess it's possible, but I doubt it. Remember Tara, the woman I told you about from my mom's work? She was pregnant with triplets, and that was after I flipped the coin three times anyway. The coin must have been flipped more than once around my mom. So you probably don't have that many babies in your pregnancy."

As Jack finished his sentence, he realized how casually he was now talking about Jessica being pregnant. He buried his face in his hands.

"Hey, don't do that," Jessica said, moving closer to Jack. Gingerly, she wrapped her arms around him in a small hug. "I know this is a weird situation, but you've got to be a little cooler about it."

"Why?" Jack said, his heart still sunk from the idea of all the lives he and his coin must have ruined. Jessica moved his chin to face her.

"Because I'm scared and I can't fake it all the time," she said, hugging Jack and burying her face in his chest. Jack embraced her back, holding her close. She wasn't crying, but he could feel her taking deep breaths as her heavy breasts, their new size now explained, rose up and down as they squeezed against him.

"Do your parents know yet?" Jack asked. She shook her head, her forehead rubbing back and forth against his shirt.

"No, I'm scared to tell them. I need to at least have an idea of what I'm going to do first."

"Well, I'm here if you need anything," Jack said, tightening his grip and moving one hand to rest against Jessica's shoulder. "After all, I got you into this mess."

From against his shirt, Jessica giggled and looked up at Jack, her eyes barely watery. "You've got to stop saying it like that. People will think we did it." Jack gulped and grinned, moving back as he felt an erection growing. Your friend's in the biggest trouble of her life but one mention of sex and I go all hard, Jack thought pitifully. I'm a real class act.

"Sorry. Hey, let's talk more later, okay? My parents will be home any second now and I've got to think of a good story for them. Soon enough, they'll notice how I've been..." Jessica paused and pulled up her shirt, revealing the bare slope of her newly-found pregnance. "...growing."

Jack blushed and nodded, trying to look only at her eyes. "Okay. But really, let me know if there's anything you need."

"I just want to hang out with you later today. That's what I want, dummy," Jessica said, sticking out her tongue. As the two of them walked down the hallway, Jessica walked up to Jack as they exited the door and gave him a kiss on the neck, looking up at him while biting her lip. "Well...bye."

"Bye," Jack said with a small but genuine smile, heading back to his car. He sighed heavily once he left, the reality of the situation hitting him all at once. Faye. Amber. Tara. Jessica. Mom. Probably the waitress from the restaurant and plenty of other people he inadvertently got pregnant and thus threw a massive wrench into their lives.

At least that damn coin is gone for and I won't have to worry about this happening to anyone else, Jack thought. No one else is suddenly going to get pregnant.

At the thought of pregnancy, Jack's mind immediately went back to Jessica's tiny, bare tummy. Not Tara's gargantuan womb, Amber's flirty belly, but Jessica's small bulge. He couldn't shake it out of his head. He imagined it growing bigger and bigger, Jessica looked up at him with doe eyes as she massaged her maternal orb.

"Fuck!" Jack yelled at himself inside his car, jamming the key into the slot, powering it up, and driving off a little too fast for a residential neighborhood. "What is the matter with me?"

--- Amanda Dale ---

Jack's mom stood in her bathroom, looking at herself carefully in the mirror. She had never been a bad-looking woman in her own opinion, even as he entered her 50s, but the change she noticed in herself was revolutionary. Her skin was much softer and smoother, without any wrinkles or sags present across her entire body, especially her belly. Her breasts were nice and firm and there was more sensitivity in each nipple than she'd ever remembered. Her face was much the same, with a new warmth present her cheeks while she still maintained her mature charm.

Amanda looked down at her big, round belly that, surely, looked much too big to just be three months developed, as the doctor had told her yesterday. Even with quadruplets, that was just silly. Still, she wasn't exactly complaining about its size yet. She had loved being pregnant with Jack so many years ago and she couldn't remembering having any morning sickness except for once a few days ago. On top of all of that, she was sure that her pregnancy was the source of the rest of her body looking so...different.

"More women should try growing four people inside them," she scoffed to herself, putting her clothes back on and waddling out the door for the mail. Out there, she saw Faye doing the same, only she was just as big as Amanda!

"Hi Amanda!" Faye said, walking over, rubbing her big belly. "I couldn't believe it when you called me. We're going to be pregnant together!"

"Yeah, it's weird, huh?" Amanda said, following Faye's lead and massaging her own belly in the same way. "Although I look a little big, even for quadruplets."

"Yeah, you look about the same size as me," Faye said, craning her neck to admire Amanda's middle. "Although, that makes sense, because I just had another appointment this morning and...I'm carrying quadruplets too!!!!"

--- Jack Dale Jr. ---

As Jack waited at a long red light...
11411111122121211111222.title: Jack checks up on Jessica.

114111111221212111112221.content:
Jack heard his phone buzz in the little tray by the car's position handle. His eyes flicked between the phone and the red light as he read the message.

<hey its amber> it read. <can you come to the gym on ryder st?>

Jack quickly typed a message back. <sure> He wasn't exactly sure why he agreed, but he didn't exactly have anything else planned for the day and he wasn't in the mood to dive right back into video games. It still felt strange, though. If anything, he would want to stay as far away from pregnant women as possible, especially when it was his and the coin's fault that she got pregnant in the first place. <be there in 20>

Jack added the last part because, if he was going to the gym, he needed to grab a change of clothes first and he was pretty close to home. As he drove up, he saw his mother and Faye talking on the front lawn. And with a shocked expression, he saw that they both had considerable pregnant bellies. Nowhere near as big as he'd seen on Amber or Faye, but they both looked like they were close to reaching full term. What's more, Faye was giggling and putting her hands on her and Jack's mother's belly! He looked away, blushing as he quickly backed down the driveway.

Well, I guess it makes sense that she'd be a little bigger than normal. She's carrying...four after all Jack thought, trying to rationalize his mother's sudden belly size. Before, she'd managed to cover up most of her new-found size with her robe. But Faye...that seems like a huge jump in just one day.

Once he darted into his room, Jack opened a gym bag and started stuffing in a plain white shirt, shorts, and some athletic shoes. After pausing and considering it, he included a change of underwear, a towel, and some shampoo in case he got too sweaty and needed to shower there. Satisfied that he was done, Jack looked around his room to see where he'd dumbly left his car keys. He looked and looked until-

"Jack?" His mother called from down the steps. "You came back while I was talking with Faye. How was your trip?"

He could hear her getting closer, so as soon as he spied his keys on top of his dresser, he quickly swiped his hand over the top and stuffed the key and anything else he happened to catch in his grip into his pocket.

"FineI'mgoingtothegymnowbye," he sputtered, walking through the door just as his mother walked in, narrowly getting past her without bumping into her new belly. And with that, he was out the door and down the stairs. His mother was left standing by the door, absently rubbing her belly with a curious expression on her face.

Hoping back into the car, Jack texted Amber that he was on his way and drove off. While her new pregnancy certainly made things different, it wasn't that odd on the surface that Amber had texted Jack. She had done plenty of athletics in high school and college and still exercised and even went to charity runs every now and then. And ever since he lost all of his weight from high school, Jack had maintained a fairly regular exercise regiment, so the two of them ran into one another at the local gym sometimes.

Once he got to the gym, he changed and walked into the gym's main center, looking around for any sign of Amber. As he looked, he felt a tap on the shoulder.
114111111221212111112221.title: He got a text from Amber

1141111112212121111122211.content:
"Hey there, guy," Amber said, her usual, teasing grin on. "Glad you could make it." She was wearing a baby blue tank top that covered her belly but pushed her swollen cleavage clearly into view. Around her toned hips were a pair of grey sweatpants and her shoulder-length fire-red hair was tied into a messy bun.

"Yeah, no problem. I felt like I needed to com here to relax anyway," he replied. "So, did you want to go for a run together or what?"

Amber's smile turned up a little more as she chuckled. "No, actually, I didn't bring you here to work out. I need a lamaze class partner."

Jack jaw dropped as his eyebrow skewed confused. She needed him for what?

She rolled her eyes as she smacked her full lips, looking for the right words. "Well, my friend who usually takes me couldn't make it today, and I couldn't think of anyone else who'd help me out. I don't have a lot of reliable friends, you know?"

"Look, it's...nice that you think so much of me, but lamaze class, Amber? That's a little...familiar, you know?" Jack said. And with that, Amber's eyes lit up as she chuckled even louder, taking a big step up to Jack, her full-term looking belly barely an inch from his torso.

"Oh Jack, always so forward, yet still so shy," Amber said. "Look, it'll be okay. It's just helping me stretch, timing breathing, things like that." Then she leaned in and whispered. "Don't worry, I won't tell any of the other girls that you like pregnant chicks."

"I don't-" Jack said far too loudly, catching himself and starting over, "I don't have any kind of special attraction for pregnant women. Y-you were just saying that to tease me yesterday."

"You know me so well," Amber winked. "So you'll do it?"

Jack sighed. "Well, I can't just let you be in the class alone. Sure, I'll do it, but you'd better throw some good shifts my way for this."

"You've got it," Amber smiled, walking with Jack into a room off to the side of the gym. It was covered in posters with diagrams of pregnant women at various stages, some with cross-sections showing the uterus and whatnot. And, of course, there were plenty of pregnant women in the room, most of them wearing outfits similar to Amber's. They were talking, joking, patting each other's bellies. Some even came up and talked to Amber briefly.

Wow, they really think she's been pregnant all this time, Jack thought. Then why isn't it like that for Jessica?

"Alright moms, get ready," said a woman at the front of the class room. Like the other women, she was heavily pregnant, but she was just wearing a black top that did nothing to cover her belly, which to Jack, looked like it might be carrying twins. To term. As she spoke to the room, Amber nudged Jack softly and walked him to a soft mat where the two of them sat down. Amber crossed her legs, her belly taking up her entire lap. "To start off today, let's just do some assisted deep breaths."

The other women and their partners started to stir and Amber turned her back to Jack. "Put your hands on my back and press down," she said, blindly reaching for one of his hands. "I need to stretch out and then you're going to breathe steadily at the same pace as the woman at the front and I'll follow along. Okay?"

"Yeah, okay," Jack said, putting his hands nervously on Amber's back. Her tank top didn't cover much around her shoulders, so his fingers went right on her warm, pale skin. Then he pushed gently until she was bent down about as much as the other women. Then, the pregnant woman and the front of the room started taking deep breaths, which Jack repeated. Amber followed his breathing pattern, but as she started lagging behind, he leaned in, figuring it would be easier to hear him and follow along. From her back, he felt her chuckle, and sure enough, she started breathing at the right tempo. After a few minutes of this, Amber turned around as well.

"Check out any of the other women while I had my back turned?" Amber murmured, grinning at Jack.

He blushed. "What? No, of course not."

"Why not? Some really nice, big bellies here. Especially Trisha in the front," Amber said back. "Go ahead and get some eyes-full. It's not like we're in a committed relationship." Amber winked again before giving Jack her arms. "Now hold onto my wrists. Same thing, but I'm stretching the other way now."

As Jack held onto her hands, they put their feet together and Amber stretched forward and breathed with Jack. As she was bent down, her full cleavage was totally exposed to Jack, who had a hard time not looking. And, every now and then, he would sneak a peek of the class's apparent instructor, Trisha, and her huge belly. Jack didn't know what it was, but he got a hypnotic feeling from watching her bouncing, dancing, round belly.

"Those shorts don't hide much," Amber whispered gleefully. Jack looked down and saw his erection clearly showing through the baggy fabric of the athletic shorts. As he looked down, Amber laughed, causing some of the other people in the class to look over. "Hey, it's okay. You don't even have to tell me if it was me or not who gave you that."

"You're supposed to be doing your breathings," Jack whispered back, agitated.

"So are you," Amber said, resuming the gentle pattern of deep breaths coming from Trisha. When they were done, Amber leaned back up and patted Jack on the shoulder. "But, hey...thanks for being here to help me. I really do appreciate it."

"Y-you're welcome," Jack said, shaking his shoulders and adding. "I mean, you know, no problem."

Amber giggled again and turned her back to Jack again. "Now, don't freak out," she said as she scooted back and leaned against Jack. He shifted around nervously as Amber moved his hands to hold onto her arms. "Don't worry, for the next one you're just counting my breaths...I don't even mind that it's rubbing against me right now."

Jack turned bright red and started to speak as Trisha yelled "and go" and Amber began taking lots of quick, short breaths. Jack nervously started counting, until he got to 50 and Amber stopped.

"Thanks, Jack," she said, patting Jack on the leg. "Ready to do it again? Not too much stress for a frail guy like you?"

"I-I'm fine," Jack said quietly as Trisha had the women start to do their breathing again. As Jack got to 45, he heard a familiar voice.

Jack

Distracted, he missed the final number. Amber turned around with a weirded-out look as she slowly stood up, using one arm on the ground to support herself.

"Okay there?" she asked, grabbing a big, round rubber ball and sitting on it. "Next is just a birth ball, okay? Not too much work for you."

"Yeah, I'm fine," Jack said, distracted by the voice in his head.

Jack!

Jack absently reached into his pocket, and past his car key he found a slim metal object in his fingers. It can't be... he thought.

Flip me!

He couldn't help it. Jack knew by now what would happen when he flipped this coin, but it was useless to try and fight it now. He flipped the coin, looking at Amber, with a few other women, including Trisha, possibly caught in his line of sight as well.
1141111112212121111122211.title: Continue

choices: Follow Amanda and Faye to the gym
11411111122121211111222111.content:
Jack caught the coin, smiling side up.

"Whoa," Amber mumbled, gripping onto Jack's wrists for support. Her belly began to expand, just like he'd seen it do for Tara. Her exercise tank top seemed to be able to handle the growth, still covering much of her belly, but a creamy slice of underbelly was definitely there and hard to ignore. "Here, help me out, won't you Jack? I know you're not thrilled about being here, but at least don't let me fall. It's hard sitting on the birth ball with two full grown babies inside me."

"Two?" Jack said, staring at Amber now much-larger belly. "You're carrying twins?" Amber rolled her eyes.

"You did this at work yesterday. Yes, Jack, I'm pregnant with twins," Amber said with a scoff and a grin. Moving one of her hands, she lifted her tank top to reveal her full, bare belly. In the process, Jack's hand was rubbed all across her swollen middle. It was creamy and soft and Jack couldn't help but blush. His first time rubbing a bare pregnant belly and it...felt great.

"Whoo, alright moms, let's do some channelled breathing exercises to wrap the day up," Trisha said from the front of the stage. Jack looked over at the class's instructor, still inexplicably drawn to looking at her and her unexposed belly. Now, to his surprise, she was also much bigger than before! From his estimates, her belly size was just about on par with Tara's triplet belly.

"Alright, help me down, will ya?" Amber said, covering her belly back up. Jack leaned in to help her roll off the ball, the size of her maternal middle making it that she had to literally roll off. As she slumped down, Jack grabbed her belly and hips as she sat back down. "Hey now, where are you grabbing at?" Amber grinned.

Jack looked away embarrassed. "So what's this next thing?"

"I just breathe deep and try and relax. It's good for the baby, it's good for me when I have to deliver in a few weeks, so on, so forth," she said, closing her eyes and breathing in slowly. Then, after about a minute of inhalation, she released, her breasts, even bigger than before, sighing back down. This, Jack felt less strange about being aroused by.

As she started her next breath, Amber cracked one eye open. "Most partners...put their hands on the woman's belly at this point," she said quietly. Sure enough most of the other groups (most of them looking like married couples) had their hands on pregnant bellies. Gingerly, Jack placed both of his hands on Amber's belly. She slowly put her hands on top of his and took in a slow breath, this one even deeper than before. Jack didn't notice it, his eyes glued to Amber's belly, but she now had the faint curl of a smile on her lips.

"It's really tight," Jack said quietly. Amber giggled as she let out her breath. "What does it, um, feel like?"

"Heavy and full," Amber said, taking in a breath. After a minute, she released it again. "But kind of good. I can feel the babies resting inside. When they move, I can sort of sense where they are."

"Huh," Jack said, relaxing his hands against her belly as Amber took another big breath. He couldn't help but look at Trisha again, who was sitting in the same cross-legged position as the rest of the women, only her hands were eagerly rubbing her own belly. "Is Trisha carrying triplets?"

"Yeah, crazy, huh?" Amber said, opening one eye. "You're not going to leave me here and run off with her, are you? I know you like pregnant bellies, so bigger must be better."

"I don't-" Jack said in a hushed, annoyed tone, before looking back at Amber. "I'm not going to leave you. I'm your partner and I'm helping you out. B-besides, you're just as nice as she is. It's not all about having a...big belly."

"Yeah?" Amber said, trying to hold back a laugh.

"Yeah...you have a prettier face," Jack said, feeling his face get warm. "And, you know, I know you personally. You like to have a good time and joke around and that's...fun."

Amber's smile slowly faded and, without warning, she rested her head down on Jack's shoulders. She held it there and Jack kept his hands on her belly.

"Oh, Jack," she finally said as the class ended. "You're so dumb, but you can be sweet sometimes." Amber picked her head up. "Thanks for helping me out." Then, she winked, put her hands on the floor and stood herself up. "See you at the store. I'll be sending out the schedule tomorrow. I think you'll like it."

Jack was speechless. He watched the women and their partners walk toward the door, most of them heading for the women's locker room. Jack stood up and walked to his own locker room, changing out of his gym clothes. It hadn't exactly been a work-out, but boy was he sweaty. Jack wet his towel in the sink and just gave his face and armpits a quick wash before heading out the door to his car. As he drove, he reached into his pocket and dumped the Coin into the tray.

"I should have expected it, in retrospect," Jack said. "I have a feeling I won't be rid of you for a while. But until then, I've really got to be careful."

As Jack pulled into his driveway, he saw his mom and Faye walk over, both laughing over some private joke or comment.

"Hey buddy, glad you got home. Faye and I were about to head out ourselves," Amanda said. Jack nodded silently and handed his mother the car key, trying not to look at her (or Faye's, for that matter) new, pregnant bump. As his mother got into the car and closed the door, Faye turned to Jack.

"So, how was that date yesterday?" she asked with an eager smile. Jack chuckled to be polite.

"Oh, it was fine, I guess."

"Well I'm dying to hear all about it," Faye said. "I haven't heard of any of Jack Jr.'s romantic exploits. Come over sometime and we'll have a nice, long talk."

Jack felt a shudder run through him. Faye giggled and waved her hand, walking around to the passenger seat. Jack had seen her look better and better since she announced she was pregnant (although she had always been pretty good looking, to be honest) but today it was like she'd transformed hugely. Her skin shone more, everything was perky, even her hair looked better. And Jack could hardly ignore that her breasts had increased in size too.

Just as thoughts of her pregnant belly crept into his head, Jack darted back inside to finally crack open Zombie Massacre Mania 2.
11411111122121211111222111.title: Heads - Reality Shift
