She turned her attention back to the screaming match still taking place and sighed. Hopefully they would resolve their differences soon... hopefully BEFORE their children turned two.

Another series of kick made the material of Amanda's clothes strain. "I know.. Their children are going to make interesting playmates hmm?" Amanda said to her midsection under her breath. Who knows what tomorrow brings?

- - - - Lisa Smith - - - -

She sat alone in her small studio apartment, in nothing but her bra and panties, her hands wrapped around her very pregnant triplet filled belly.
She was still trying to make sure it was real, even all that happened over the past few days. It was a still a blur to her. One moment she was in the bar, getting the stage set up for the pregnant bikini contest, and then she felt an incredible pressure in her midsection, like she was being inflated, and then POP! She was not only pregnant, but VERY PREGNANT with what turned out to be triplets.

It took her sometime to fully accept what happened to her, the fear slowly giving away to worry intermixed with small moments of happiness. She worried about her looks, why shouldn't she? Her main purpose at the radio station was to be the sex symbol, the girl they can slap on billboards to drive up interest. Having three kids out of the blue wouldn't do her figures any favors. She worried about money. How could she afford a child, let alone three?! Cribs, diapers, toys, food, doctor's bills... She couldn't think about it. It made her panic.

But when she felt them move, when she felt them kick, she smiled. Every care she had went away, these were HER CHILDREN. She never really thought of herself as Mom material, but that was then, this was now. She couldn't even think of giving them up. This was a piece of her that would be with her forever.

Getting up with a groan, she walked over to the small bag of maternity clothes that she bought sometime after.. the incident. They weren't exactly conservative for a woman in her condition, but if you got it, flaunt it. Picking up the bikini that was.. unfortunate enough to have to wear all day, she looked at it. Hopefully it was "Sexy" enough for her to win, that money could go along way.

"Well Lisa, nothing to do know but make them want it. You certainly got some stares today at the hospital, let's see if we could do that again" She said to herself, changing back into the bikini to practice again. Her routine was certainly.. provocative, but she's seen enough of these contests to know that's what the crowd wanted.

A strong firm kick from one of her children, made her put a hand on her bare belly. "Hungry again? Jeez, at this rate, I think my figure will be the least of my worry. I'll be giving birth to some serious plus-sized kids" She said, walking over to the half-eaten pizza box on the counter. She opened it up, and started eating the cold pizza. She had such a craving, and she wanted to give her children all they could possible want... to an extent. Pizza seemed fine for that right now.

Looking at herself in the mirror, belly and tits hanging out of her too-small bikini, a piece of pizza in one hand, she laughed. "Oh Lisa, look at you" She said to herself, grabbing a nearby camera. "Well, might as well get some pictures"

CLICK. She captured her moment in time.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Why Interrupt A Good Thing? A Cast Of Dozens!

choices: The movie ends, off to dinner at a familiar restaurant
The amount of characters cannot be overstated. Follow some of them.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
Lisa took a few more pictures before realizing that Natalie had been standing in the doorway the whole time. As soon as she caught her partner in her peripherals, Lisa turned around and covered her body with her arms as best she could. Of course, with a belly her size, there was plenty left in the open. "Natalie! Geez!"
Natalie covered her mouth to stifle her laughs. "Aw, sorry, I didn't mean to embarrass you." She walked over and rubbed Lisa's arms from behind, the two of them looking in the mirror. "You're really going forward with the bikini contest, huh?"
Lisa sighed and turned slightly to get another look at her hugely pregnant figure. "Oh yeah. I can't exactly drop out. The station's expecting an even bigger turnout when people heard that 'Foxy Lisa' was going to be competing. Besides-" Lisa said, turning her head to face Natalie, "-someone's gotta win."
Natalie chuckled. "Well, I know who my vote's going to." She leaned her chin forward and gave Lisa a long, soft kiss. "Just based on looks, though. You can't dance worth shit."
Lisa rolled her eyes and looked down at her belly. "You hear that? Your other mom is the mean one."

---Kristen Harper---

Dr. Harper was not having the best day of her medical career. The metropolitan hospital where she worked was overrun with armed guards and other foreign personnel. All of them claimed to be from Health and Human Services but it was pretty clear to Dr. Harper that this was not the case. Well, about half of them had actual HHS and other similar clearances and positions. And that all made sense, to some degree. There was some sort of bizarre medical breakout in the city, for sure. Hundreds of people don't just report instantaneous pregnancy within days of one another, let alone men. But they were seizing the entire OB/GYN wing of the hospital and taking over plenty of other sections as well. The department head was still stuck in committees with these bureaucrats and no one was giving Dr. Harper any information.

That was the other thing that was bothering her. It was not just ordinary government bureaucrats here. These armed guards seemed to be from a variety of different countries and none of them had any apparent training when it came to issues of medical sensitivity. As a doctor, Dr. Harper swore to protect her patients, and over the course of her career, she'd made a point to help all pregnant women she could. Well, with the way the situation had developed, she now had to expand that to all the pregnant people she could, but the point still stuck. As far as she could tell, these...goons were not helping her get any closer to the reason behind the pregnancies and were just getting in the way.

Ooph, speaking of getting in the way, Dr. Harper's belly made pushing past two guards a particularly tight fit. Thanks to an accident of her own, Dr. Harper had no basis to explain away the sudden pregnancies as misunderstandings. One second she was absolutely, positively not pregnant. And the next, she had over a foot of round, baby-filled belly in front of her. She might call it a happy accident. Dr. Harper already had a son of her own and her husband passed away about ten years ago. This pregnancy was a miracle for her and not one she wanted to give up. Pushing her miracle belly past another array of guards, she held up her hospital badge to one officer standing in front of the conference room's doors. "Dr. Harper, here for my scheduled meeting." With a nod, the doors were opened up and in she went.

The room was mostly empty. It was just Dr. Harper, the head of OB/GYN, and about five other "HHS" officials, although Dr. Harper doubted very much whether they were all truly with that department. "Alright, now we can get down to business," Dr. Harper said, clearly exhausted and irritated with the entire procedure.
"Wait!" one of the five officials said, holding up one hand and motioning to one of the guards in the room. "You didn't say you were pregnant. We have to cut you off to reduce the chance of infection."
"That is ridiculous," Dr. Harper protested loudly. "None of the tests have shown that the sudden pregnancy is contagious." The head of OB/GYN nodded along.
"H-Health and Human Services, Kate Rosette. The data given to us shows the same, sir," a young woman with mousey brown hair said, standing up and sitting down. The others at the table nodded in agreement.
"Then we can continue?" a woman in full, grey P.E.A.R. attire said, standing at the head of the table. "I'm Lieutenant Han with P.E.A.R., and we need to negotiate the further use of this facility in our investigation."
Dr. Harper scoffed. They were no longer even pretending to be a legitimate medical team, were they? "Where is this Commander Zavaleta or Lieutenant Riker I've been told about?" the head of OB/GYN asked.
"Both are unavailable at this time," Han replied. "I'm third-in-command here. Now, not all of the examining rooms were available this time around, which slowed us down considerably. What needs to happen to get this wing up to full operations by tomorrow?"

Dr. Harper shook her head. "I have to say, this entire series of events is highly egregious. We are sacrificing actual medical analysis for this paranoid, knee-jerk reaction."
Han turned to the head and her other officials in the room, who nodded and turned on the screen at the front of the room. They cycled through a few pages of medical readings. "As you can see, doctor, there are actually a number of curious...energy readings we've found that tended to be higher in patients with larger numbers of fetuses," said one of the other P.E.A.R. officials in the room. "So we are, in fact, getting closer to a real medical answer."
"Energy readings?" Dr. Harper said with a confused gaze, one hand moving unconsciously to her own belly. "Just what kind of equipment are you using on these patients?"
"Don't worry, doctor," Han said with a small smile. "This is something that we are very familiar with. You could say it's the whole reason we exist."
Dr. Harper sighed frustratedly. "Well...then give us a hand but get all of these armed militia out of here and get rid of the barricades around the city. This is insane."
"I'm afraid we can't, doctor. This is all procedure for events that we come across," Han said. "It would take a severe compromise of security to get us to leave."

---Mia Vasquez---

Back at the station, Mia was pouring through what little video she was able to recover from her own camera operators and from various residents around the city who'd sent smart phone recordings to her. "This is a once-in-a-lifetime type of story," Mia said to the reporters gathered around her, shaking her head. "This is going to put us on the map."
"You mean put you on the map," Brooke, one of the station's anchors, said with a smile. "And I still can't believe you're doing all this work...you know..."
"Pregnant?" Mia smiled, not taking her eyes off of the screen, but patting her belly with one hand. "Hey, it might be a little heavy, but I still feel great and I love doing this work. Besides, this story is insane. I told you how they stuffed me in some holding cell with a bunch of other big, pregnant women, didn't I?"
"Well, don't get personal about it," Rick, the other anchor, who was worried about Mia taking his job, said. "That can taint a good story."
"Upton Sinclair got pretty personal in 'The Jungle' and that's one of the best pieces of investigative journalism we have," the station manager, Douglas Taylor, said, walking up behind them. "Keep up the good work, Mia. It's impressive stuff and you're making it really unique."
"Thanks, Doug," Mia smiled, making a few more clicks before turning around. "Well, that's it for the package. We'll be all set to run it tonight." She started to slowly get up, balancing herself against the desk and her chair.
"Hey, careful," Brooke said. "Where are you off to now?"
"I haven't had a chance to get to the gym today," Mia smiled, putting her hands on her expansive belly when she got to her feet. "I've got to work to get limber if I'm going to be dancing in that contest."
Brooke, Douglas, and the rest of the staff gathered around her laughed (except for Rick, of course) and shook their heads. "And I can't believe you're doing that too," Brooke said. "Well, you look amazing, so you'll be a shoo-in to win. In fact...you almost look better pregnant. No offense."
"None taken," Mia grinned, rubbing her belly in larger circles. "I know what you mean. I've never felt better. I guess I'm just lucky."
"Seems that way," Rick grumbled. "I'm going to get more coffee."

---Jack and Jessica---
"This movie sucks," Jack whispered in Jessica's ear. "This is like a parody of a romantic comedy but...taken seriously."
"Oh, hush," Jessica whispered back, pressing her head harder against his shoulder. "Just try to enjoy it, okay? I want to have a real date experience and this is part of that."
"You didn't say it had to be a cheesy love movie," Jack said, tickling his new girlfriend's pregnant belly slightly. "Just a movie. We could have seen a real movie!"
"Jack, Pacific Rim is not romantic," Jessica said in a tone like a teacher talking to a student.
"There's romance in it!"
Jessica just rolled her eyes and placed one hand over Jack's. "It's almost over, just...try to have fun, okay? Look at how beautiful Anne Hathaway is. Focus on that."
"That's true," Jack said. Jessica squeezed his hand hard.
"That was a trap and you fell right into it," she grinned. "As punishment, you'll buy me a box of candy afterwards."
"Movie candy? That crap's crazy expensive!"
"That's where the taste comes from," Jessica giggled, resting more deeply against Jack's chest, the two of them feeling the other's rising and falling breaths.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Really, how many characters are there?

choices: Jack & Jessica are served by a very familiar, very grumpy, waitress. Hilarity!
Hmm, let's follow Tara, Oven, and some other characters shall we?
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
- - - - - Jack and Jessica - - - -

The house lights slowly returned to life as the end credits of the movie began to scroll. Not that Jack or Jessica noticed, as their attention was turned to trying to suck each others faces off with their lips then the conclusion of their tired, retreaded romantic comedy. Jack's hand were busy quickly moving between the ampleness of Jessica's chest, and the ampleness of Jessica's midsection.

Somewhere in the "plot" if it could be called that Jessica decided she wanted the "real" date experience, which as it turned out, more often that not, turned into a hot and heavy grope session. If it wasn't for the fact that there was other people in the theater, Jessica would have had her way with Jack right there during one of the blandest romantic comedies in years.

Between moans and giggles, Jessica noticed that the credits were nearly over, and brought this rodeo to a complete stop.

"mmmm.. Jack. Jack!" She said, pulling her lips off his face and his hands off her body. "What?" Jack asked, failing to realize WHY this suck-face session was coming to a stop. "What's wrong?"

"I think we need to leave" Jessica said, looking over to the cleaning crew of the theater who just stood there, looking at them, one of them nodding his head like "Yeah buddy." Jack saw what Jessica saw, his face turning bright red, and grabbing her by the hand, shuffled out of the theater.

Outside in the lobby, Jack was dying from embarrassment. "Oh man, oh man" Jack said. "Hey, don't be embarrassed, that's what couples do in a movie theater isn't it?" Jessica said with a knowing giggle. "Besides, I think that might have been the best show those ushers have seen in a while"

Jack tried to swallow his embarrassment deep inside, and grabbed Jessica's hand to lead her to her "chariot" before Jessica wagged a finger in his direction.

"Uh, uh, uh. Forgetting something?" Jessica said, jerking her head towards the concession counter. Jack swore under his breath before putting on a smile and turning towards his love. "You're going to ruin your dinner." Jack said.

"It's for after dinner. I thought we could go for a walk through the park before heading home for tonights... activities." Jessica smiled a smiled that said "Prepare your body for tonight". "And besides I've never been this hungry before in my life. I swear these kids are trying to fatten me up with how often I've been eating" Jessica said, rubbing the tight constraints of her belly filled red dress. "Get me some chocolate covered pretzels. I have such a craving for sweet and salty at the same time."

Jack walked over to the concession line, and after what felt like an eternity (Jack noticing the various sizes of bulged bellies on some of the women and men waiting in line or behind the counter) he finally got Jessica's much craved for snack.

During the walk to the car, Jessica resting her head on Jack's shoulder as they walked, Jack couldn't help but feel ashamed for what has happened to everyone in this town. He thinks back to the pregnant women and the pregnant men whose condition can be directly linked to Jack's actions of buying that damn coin. What must the men of this town be thinking? He couldn't possibly imagine or want to know. He needed to undo all of this, but with Jessica's head resting on his shoulder, he felt selfish. He WANTED Jessica to be bring, to have the babies, to raise them with her.. He wanted a family.

But doing so would ruin other people's lives. What if when he undid all of this he and Jessica drifted apart? He had no idea how this "undoing" thing even worked. Would it be like it never happened? Then would he and Jessica even still be together? This pregnancy had brought them together, and he wanted them together, but what about everyone else?

The moral implications of this situation was enough to make someone's head explode. But no time for that now, if fate so determines that IF, no, not if, WHEN, he undid all this, that he and Jessica wouldn't be together and have no memory of this, then dammit, he was going to embrace every second of it, embrace every second of her.

"Hello, starving pregnant woman here!" Jessica said, lightly flicking Jack's ear to get his attention. "Ow!" Jack said covering his ear. "Where to?" Jack asked. "How about for our first date-date we got to the site of our first not-date date?" Jessica asked, looking over to him with a smile. "Besides I've got"

"Yeah, craving for Italian. Figured it out" Jack said, starting the car and driving off.

Sometime later, after a long car ride discussing everything that ranged from Jessica's rapidly changing body to undoing all of this, to music, movies and more, Jack's car finally pulled into the italian restaurant they were just at a few days before. Jack, hefting (there was no doubt about it, he had to haul his date out of the car at this point) and entered in.

After being asked to wait for a few moments, Jessica turned to Jack with a look of love in her eyes.

"Jack.. if we don't.. if we can't undo this" Jessica asked, her hands exploring her changed body

"I want you.. I want you to help me pick out some names." Jessica said plainly.

Jack felt the floor drop out from under him. He had no words to say. His brain had shut down.

"I... love you Jack. And I want you.. to be the father of my children.. OUR Children."
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Shopping? Check. Movie? Check. Dinner? To Do.

choices: Jack, Jessica, the birds, and the bees
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
"Jessica," Jack said softly, reaching one hand over to Jessica's. "You don't know how-"
"Your table's ready," the hostess replied with a cheery smile, interrupting Jack's reply to Jessica's confession. Both blushed a little and smiled in response, following her to their table.
"Different than the one last time," Jessica said, looking around. "Well, maybe that would have been too sentimental."
"Maybe," Jack laughed uncomfortably. "It's not like we're going to order the exact same food too."
"No, I'll probably get even more now," Jessica sighed, putting her hands on her belly and rubbing slowly. "Every day they get bigger, I get even stronger cravings." Jack blushed again and Jessica giggled. "You're such a perv."
Now it was Jack's turn to giggle. "What do you mean?"
"Talking about my pregnancy heats you up so much. Just the tiniest mention." Jack blushed again, wishing he had a glass of water so he could drink nonchalantly. "It's okay. It's cute." The two smiled at each other in silence for a bit. "So, you were saying?"
Jack cleared his throat. "Jessica...since this started, I was worried that I'd put you in this...situation and wanted to undo it at any cost. But, lately, being with you, I've-"

The two were again interrupted by two glasses of water being placed on the table in front of them. They looked over at their waitress, an exhausted young woman with a clear baby bump. "Hello, I'll be your server today. What can I get both of you?"
Jack and Jessica exchanged more embarrassed looks. "Just some bruschetta for now, please," Jessica said.
The waitress nodded and walked off, one hand stroking her rounding middle. Jack and Jessica immediately got in close to whisper. "Wasn't she the same one we had last time?" Jack asked.
Jessica nodded. "Yeah and we...practiced flipping the coin on her and decided it didn't work."
Jack laughed uncomfortably as he took a sip of water. "Well, we messed that experiment up pretty badly."
Jessica rubbed her own belly as her face became more somber. "I was the one who told you to flip the coin. It's my fault. I got her pregnant."
"That might be the first time I've ever heard a woman say that," Jack replied. Jessica rolled her eyes and hit her date on the arm. "Okay, okay!" he said with a smile. "Just trying to lighten the mood."

Jessica brought her glass to her lips. "Well...I appreciate it, I guess."
Jack sighed. "B-but, this is important to talk about. Finding out something with the coin won't just undo what happened to you and my mom. It'll do it for everyone. There are lots of people the coin...impregnated and we have to fix this for them too. And we'll undo your pregnancy, even though..." Jack took a deep sigh. "Even though I would really like to raise-"

"Your bruschetta," the waitress said, sliding the plate in front of them. "Can I take your main course orders now? And I can I get you anything else besides water?"
Jack ran his hands through his hair, frustrated by his seeming inability to confess to Jessica. She smiled at his reaction, sensing what he had to say. Jessica placed her order and stuck with water, gesturing to her belly as part of that decision.
"Believe me, I understand," their waitress said, jutting her own small belly out. "I'm not as far along as you, but I've got a level one human in here too. I got knocked up long before all this 'magical pregnancy' stuff too. Not that it mattered. Those government people put me in their trucks and ran tests on me anyway."
"O-oh," Jessica said, confused. This woman didn't seem to notice that less than a week ago, she wasn't pregnant at all. "Are you going to try that pregnant bikini contest at all? They told me women with...smaller bellies usually do very well." The admission made Jessica conscious of her own size yet again. She looked just like her waitress when she signed up for the contest and now...now she was a house. And likely to get even bigger...
The waitress let out a scoffing laugh and put one hand on her belly. "Yeah, just my luck. I also work at Dino's where the contest is and my shift is the same day as the contest. A pregnant waitress at a pregnant bikini contest. Isn't that a riot?"
Jessica and Jack looked at each other uncomfortably. Jack put in his order and the waitress nodded, walking back to the kitchen.

After a short silence, Jack reached under the table and took Jessica's hand. "Jess...being with you has made me wish that you really were pregnant with our kids and we were ready to start a family together. It's...it's selfish, but I feel that strongly about you." He looked up to see Jessica looking back at him with warm, amazed eyes. "I'll of course do everything I can to undo this, but if we can't stop it and you...I'll be the father and raise them with you. No doubt in my mind."
Jessica's smile widened a bit, a tear falling down her cheek. "Jack..."

---Tara---
Tara was in front of her full-body mirror, moving her hips back and forth, watching her movements intently. She had to adjust the mirror somewhat so she could actually see what her hips were doing. The full-term triplet belly was getting in the way quite a bit. Tara stopped and wiped her brow with a towel, slinging it over her shoulders. Hopefully, this wouldn't be too different in an actual bikini. Although, for Tara's actual dance routine, she had a special outfit picked out that would stay within the contest's boundaries. The idea of performing her planned dance routine brought a little grin to Tara's face. It would certainly turn heads.

There was a loud knock at her front door. Tara sighed and grabbed her water bottle. "Coming!" she bellowed, waddling to the living room. It wasn't a long journey. Her apartment was on the small side if anything, although it was still very nice. But with a belly her size, and given that she'd had less than a week to get used to her added weight, it was a difficult trek. Finally, making it to the door, Tara opened it, shocked at what she saw.

"Special Commander Nicole Zavaleta," the humongous pregnant belly in front of her said. Tara couldn't take her eyes off of it. "I demand to be let inside. You would be foolish to decline."
Tara slowly brought her eyes up and saw that the impossibly big baby-filled orb belonged to an intense-looking woman, wearing what looked like some kind of military uniform. "P-please come in," Tara said, stunned with surprise and fear.
"Thank you," Zavaleta said, waddling in slowly, turning her hips several times to fit all of her pregnance inside. "Now, I should explain my presence here. I am the senior officer in the organization responsible for the current military operations in your city."
"The ones who keep everything on quarantine and made me go to that hospital?" Tara said, crossing her arms nervously.
"Exactly. But, my position with them has been jeopardized somewhat and I am forced to act in secret," Zavaleta said. With her sudden extreme pregnancy and the loss of the coin after it was in her clutches, she knew Riker was already taking actions to get her out of the leadership position and maybe even take the coin for himself. No, she needed to lay low and get it herself, especially when she was this close!
"Well...I don't see what I should go along with that," Tara said nervously, running her hands over her belly in an instinctive, protective pose.

Zavaleta smiled like a predator and took a step forward, her own belly pressing against Tara's, dwarfing her in size and intimidation. "Because, I have the tools to make sure that you don't have to jump through any of their hoops. You and your babies will be perfectly safe as long as I'm here."
Tara thought about it. That was an excellent deal. "And what do you need from me?"
"Just board in your apartment and background on your bank," Zavaleta said, stepping away from Tara and slowly lowering herself onto a sturdy seat that still moaned under her pregnant weight. "You see, the coi...the cause for much of this abnormal pregnancy is connected to Titan Bank somehow, so I needed to stay with someone who works there to gather information on it."
"And why me?" Tara said with a raised eyebrow.
"I looked through all the data we have on you. According to my readings, you're the smartest person at that bank. I wanted to be with someone who could understand me better."
Tara smiled a bit at what felt like a compliment. "Well...as long as you keep up your word, you can stay. But you will probably need to pay for your own food."
Zavaleta smiled and looked down. "Yes, I can see why you'd have that worry." She didn't include that she was staying with Tara because her tests showed that she was exposed to the coin more than anyone else in the city. The intelligence reading was accurate as well.
"But about the 'strange pregnancies,'" Tara asked, pointing subtly at Zavaleta's utterly unsubtle belly. "Is that what caused..."
Zavaleta looked up at Tara with a purr and a knowing grin. "No, these are my babies, through-and-through."

---Jack and Jessica---
"Ugh, I can't believe how much I ate," Jessica groaned, putting her fork down. "But they feel nice and content in there."
"Good to hear," Jack smiled. He finished his dinner nearly half an hour ago but had enough common sense not to say anything. After a while waiting for Jessica to finish, he went ahead and paid for the dinner and the two of them got up, Jack helping Jessica to the car. "Well, good date?"
"Excellent date," Jessica smiled.
"So...what's left?" Jack asked.
"Only one thing," Jessica smiled, kissing him on the cheek and looking into his eyes with a hungry smile.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: You Look Familiar...

1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
--Tara---
Tara felt her young kick and squirm inside her and started to rub her belly. "Mmm, speaking of food," she laughed with a sigh.
Zavaleta felt the same sensation on a much larger scale and stroked her pregnant expanse as well. The blowback the coin had given her in anger meant much stronger and harsher cravings. "I agree," she groaned, feeling a good number of sharp kicks. "I can reimburse you for any food."
Tara looked over Zavaleta's belly once again. "Maybe...I'll just order some pizzas," Tara said, waddling over to the phone. If I tried to cook for us both, I'd run out of food, Tara thought to herself. "Any kind in particular?"
"Something with lots on it!" Zavaleta bellowed, heaving herself off of the couch. Once up, she steadied her legs and began waddling toward the bathroom with the weight of about five full-grown fetuses on her bladder. Here again, the doorway was too small for her impossible pregnant bulk, but she managed to shift herself inside (smashing the "Spyder" camera inside in the process).

Tara ordered 11 supreme pizzas, one for each baby they were carrying, and sat on the couch, drinking water and caressing her bump. When Zavaleta came back into the room, Tara's jaw nearly dropped. Zavaleta abandoned her military outfit for...for nothing. She waddled back into the room in just her pants and a strained bra. "Um...um..."
Zavaleta looked back at Tara with a blank expression. "My outfit was entirely too restrictive for my child-bearing body and I'm on unofficial business. And you weren't wearing formal clothing so I didn't want to make you feel uncomfortable." Tara was only wearing a tank top that covered maybe 1/4 of her belly and half-zipped jeans. "In fact, if you have any pants that are more accommodating, I'd like some of those too."
"I-I'll get you some sweat pants," Tara said, shifting her weight so she could stand up as Zavaleta eased herself onto the couch. Tara hurried to her room and picked out the right clothes. As she looked through her drawers, she couldn't stop thinking about how her guest looked. She was definitely older than Tara but...even topless and ridiculously pregnant, she looked amazing. No stretch marks, no sagging, only a few well-placed wrinkles on her face. Tara hoped she'd look that good at that age...whatever that age was.

Zavaleta slipped her own pants off and took Tara's sweatpants from her, heaving her belly up as she stepped into the legs. "M-may I ask what your name is?" Tara said nervously, standing with her hands over her belly.
"Ah, yes. Please call me Nicole," Zavaleta smiled. It had been a long time since anyone just called her "Nicole." "Of course, I already know your name."
"Of course," Tara said, sitting next to Zavaleta. She was rubbing her gigantic belly and winced with discomfort every now and then. "Here, may I?" Tara said, leaning over and rubbing Zavaleta's belly.
The expression of pain quickly left her face. "Oh, that worked marvelously," Zavaleta said with surprise.
"Yes, it feels much better when someone else rubs your belly," Tara smiled.
"Well then, let me repay you," Zavaleta said, aggressively stroking Tara's sensitive belly, making her insides tickle and shiver.
"T-that's good too," Tara whined, curling her toes. "So, you seem excited to be a mom."
Zavaleta beamed. "Yes! I've wanted this all my life but work came first. Now, not much can stand in the way of me and my eight little ones. And I know I'll be a great mother."
Tara smiled, happy to see Zavaleta's rough exterior coming down a little. "Yeah? How so?"
Zavaleta scoffed and turned to her host. "Because I'm such an efficient leader. I'll assign each child exact schedules to play, to study, to clean the house." She sighed and smiled, placing her hands on top of Tara's and guiding her rubbing. "It will be perfect."
Tara giggled. "Well, I don't think you can expect children to follow orders precisely like that. And it takes much more to raise kids."
"I know that," Zavaleta said. "I'll encourage them by giving them a scale for presents on their birthday and holidays. Each one starts off with 10 presents, then failing in their sector of the house means one demerit. Then-"

The doorbell rang and Tara chuckled, patting Zavaleta's belly. "I need to get that."
Zavaleta reached into her pants on the floor and fished out her wallet, handing Tara a wad of cash. "There you go."
Tara smiled and thanked her guest, going to the door and taking the pizzas from the pregnant delivery girl, who was balancing the food on top of her belly. Tara handed her the money and smiled and thanked her, waddling back to the couch. "Nicole, the one positive about all of these pregnancies is that I don't feel embarrassed about my own pregnancy around most people, since most of them were pregnant themselves! Even my boss."
Zavaleta turned around, remembering information on Titan Bank's manager from her files. A pregnant man. He might hold some clues. "Your boss?"
"Yeah, here, he even sent us an email about a baby shower he's holding at work tomorrow," Tara said, getting out her phone and showing the message to Zavaleta. She put the pizza boxes on the coffee table and opened them up, letting the garlic and tomato smell waft around the room.
"Interesting," Zavaleta mused. "I need to come with you to investigate further."
"Well..alright," Tara said. Zavaleta had seemed safe enough so far and she appeared close to an explanation for these pregnancies. "I guess you can tell people you're my mom and you-" Tara looked at Zavaleta's bare belly and paused. "-got affected with the same thing as everyone else."

Zavaleta ate pizza with glee and gusto as Tara watched, impressed. I thought I was a pregnant pig when I ate...
"Oh, Tara, they're kicking! And this time it's not painful!" Zavaleta suddenly yelled, excited. She took Tara's hand and placed it on her belly. Tara couldn't believe all of the activity she was feeling. Carrying eight babies must be unbelievable.
"It feels nice," Tara smiled at Zavaleta, who smiled back. "You might have to change your parenting methods a bit, but you really will be a great mom." Tara's smile faded and her voice trailed off. "Not like me."
"Tara," Zavaleta said softly, taking Tara's chin. "All of your data shows that you will be an exceptional mother. You have a stable career, a high level of education, a-"
Tara's eyes welled up. "No, it's...it's different. I don't feel ready. I don't know the first thing about taking care of one child, let alone three."
Zavaleta wrapped one arm over Tara and hugged her against the mass of pregnant belly Tara was already rubbing. "You'll do fine, my dear." Tara sniffled and nodded, resting against Zavaleta's belly. It was tight and soft and the warmth and heartbeats inside her soothing.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Tara and Zavaleta's slumber party!

choices: Jack takes them to his home
Jack takes them to Jessica's home
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
The two stayed like this for a while, with Zavaleta moving another pizza box to the other side of her belly so Tara could reach over and eat. "We're nearly out of food," Zavaleta said, putting the last slice of her stack of boxes in her mouth. "What do you propose we do now? You seem to be better at...recreation."
Tara brought her head up quickly. "Well, there's one thing I hoped to do if any of my other friends got pregnant but...well, Nicole, would you like to do it with me?"
Zavaleta nodded. It had been 30 years since anyone considered her a "friend." "I am always open to new experiences."
"Great!" Tara said happily, heaving herself off the couch. "Wait here!"
Moments later, Tara returned with a stack of DVDs and another plastic box. "Okay so...these are all movies about pregnancy I rented from Blockbuster right before it closed so I guess I just...own them now. And this is body paint."
"Body paint? What would we do with that?" Zavaleta said with a raised eyebrow.
"I was hoping we could paint our bellies?" Tara said with a weak grin. "It's something I've sort of had my heart set on for a while."
Zavaleta sighed and smiled back. "Well, that sounds like it could be fun. Let's do it."

Tara popped in the first DVD in the pile (Knocked Up, unfortunately) and opened the box in front of her, sorting out the different paints. "Okay, so...just go for it, I guess."
Zavaleta nodded. "I took visual art as an elective at the Sorbonne. I believe I should be able to do this."
"Great!" Tara smiled, dipping her own brush and starting work on floral designs on the front of Zavaleta's belly. Of course, it was so big and so round, the "front" was hard to accurately find, so Tara made patterns around her popped-out belly button. Zavaleta turned her head a few times, inspecting her "canvas." Tara's belly was huge, for sure. Practically nothing compared to Zavaleta's, but she was about 70 inches around. Wrapping the tape around Tara's belly button would probably add another half-inch. Her brown skin had a few well-placed freckles near her belly button. Zavaleta's military work prepared her to pinpoint Tara's ethnicity immediately, but Zavaleta decided against that. She was no long on duty with P.E.A.R. and she thought the process silly and needless anyway, even when she was in the field.

Zavaleta gingerly dabbed her brush in the blue and green paints, twisting her brush to mix them into a turquoise shade and dabbing it gently on Tara's belly. Tara began to laugh after the sixth dab. "You're just trying to tickle me, aren't you?"
Zavaleta shook her head. "I assure you that I'm not. I'm surprised that your own brushstrokes aren't having the same affect on me. They're very smooth and...feel quite nice."
"You're welcome, Nicole," Tara smiled. "Now don't look down at your belly, okay? I want these to be a surprise when we're done."
"You've thought this through quite a bit, haven't you, Tara?"
Tara blushed, embarrassed. "Well, I've been pregnant for a while."
"But your file said that these babies-"
"Just the other two were a surprise," Tara said, looking up to meet Zavaleta's eyes. "But believe me, I've been pregnant for quite some time. I'm nearing the end pretty soon."
Zavaleta nodded. "I apologize if I was prying."
"No, don't be," Tara smiled, going back to her paint job. "I don't really get to talk about my pregnancy with anyone. It's nice to have someone to share it with...even if you're..."
Zavaleta stopped. "Even if I'm what?"
"You know..." Tara said. "My warden."

Zavaleta put down her brush and reached back into her old pants' pockets, bringing out a small, metal box. "Give me your blue card."
"What?" Tara said with surprise.
Zavaleta quickly snatched Tara's phone out of her pocket and turned over the case. In the clip was a credit card, her ID card, and other miscellaneous things like that - including her blue card with a pink dot. Zavaleta ran her device over the card and handed it back to Tara.
"There, now you have no tracking, no duty to return to the hospital, and you could in fact leave the city if you wished. Do I feel like your warden now?"
Tara paused and placed one hand on top of Zavaleta's belly. "No...you're right. I'm sorry, Nicole. It's just been a crazy day and-"
Zavaleta smiled and placed her hand on Tara's belly. "I understand. Now that I'm pregnant I see how this procedure is...intrusive. And I...enjoy spending time with you too." Zavaleta cleared her throat. "I don't get many opportunities to...do this."
Tara smiled and took her brush back, continuing her work on Zavaleta's belly. "Neither do I. Nicole, I'd hug you, but I don't want to ruin the work you did on my belly."
Zavaleta smiled and took her brush back too. "This feels just as good, Tara." And the two resumed painting.

This went on and on, with Tara having to put in a new movie at one point. Finally, Tara felt done and let out a long yawn.
"Mmm, just in time," Tara said. "I'm exhausted. I'm still not used to carrying three babies and I'll bet that's more than double for you." Zavaleta chuckled and nodded.
"It's nothing my training can't handle," she replied, heaving herself off the couch once again. "But I agree. I still need my sleep. Now, let's see our artwork."
Tara smiled as she walked Zavaleta to the full-body mirror in her bedroom. Her guest's eyes shimmered as she saw the designs across her belly...the belly she'd worked so hard to get.
"Beautiful," Zavaleta breathed. "And now you."
Tara smiled and looked into the mirror, her expression turning stunned at the detailed, intricate work done on her.
"It's Monet's 'Waterlillies,'" Zavaleta said, impressed with her handiwork. "Do you like it?"
"I...wow," Tara said. "That's...wow."
"But I suppose we need to wash this off before we sleep," Zavaleta sighed, looking down at her belly.
"Well, hold on!" Tara said excitedly, grabbing her camera off of her bureau. "Let's get a picture and capture the magic!"
Zavaleta smiled at Tara's phrase as she posed for the picture. Tomorrow, I intend to capture the magic.

After a few pictures, Tara used a wet towel to clean off their bellies. "So, for our sleeping arrangement..."
Zavaleta looked at her confused. "I assumed we would just share a bed. Yours seems large enough."
Tara doubted that, but that wasn't the main issue. "Well, still, I think that I could just take the couch and-"
"Tara!" Zavaleta said, putting her hands on her pronounced hips. "You are easily 39 weeks pregnant with triplets. I cannot have you sleeping on that tiny couch. You will share the bed with me and have a restful, rejuvenating sleep. Do you understand?"
Tara unconsciously snapped into an upright position. "Yes ma'am!"
"At ease."
Tara relaxed and rubbed her belly slowly. What the hell was that? she wondered.
"Perfect. And in the morning, I will accompany you to your work to investigate. Now...how will this work?" Zavaleta examined the bed and let out a low groan as she lay down on it. "Hmm...alright, we will have to sleep head-to-toe so our bellies don't intrude against one another's."
"Wh-what?" Tara stammered, everything still moving too quickly for her.
"Get in bed!" Zavaleta bellowed again. Tara moved the fastest she'd ever moved since her triplets were added to her belly (which was less than a minute after she became pregnant anyway), slipped out of her jeans, and lay in bed as Zavaleta instructed. "Yes, this will do nicely...well, goodnight, Tara."
"G-goodnight, Nicole," Tara said, not mentioning that she was now staring directly at Zavaleta's belly at this position.

---Jack and Jessica---
Jessica smiled sweetly and met Jack's eyes as she waddled around the car, stepping into the passenger side.
"C'mon, Dale," Jessica purred, leaning over. "Isn't this what you wanted all night? Hurry up and drive!"
Jack was still stunned, his body and mind still not piecing together the Jessica=Girlfriend reality before him. "I-I also wanted to hang out with you tonight."
Jessica laughed. "Believe me, I love 'sweet Jack' but right now, I just want to rock your world. Either hit the gas or I'll take you in the backseat right now."
"W-well, I don't know if we'd both fit back there," Jack said, his eyes bugging out more and more.
Jessica laughed again and slapped his arm. "Then step on it!"
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Their time together continues

choices: Next morning: Amanda bumps into a naked Jessica in the hall, and the baby shower
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
Slowly, Jack brought his car to a halt, hoping to stop the inevitable loud SQUEAL of his breaks, telling him that they needed changing.
Breaks can wake, what was coming next.... Just couldn't.

"Taking me to your place hmm? Presuming much are we?" Jessica said with a smile, softly chewing the last of her chocolate covered pretzels, the crumbs and wrapper resting lightly on top of the large red mound that was her pregnant stomach, that Jessica had now just began to realize made a handy shelf.

"Let's not be too loud. I don't want to wake up my parents" Jack said, undoing his seatbelt.

"Hmmmmmmm. Where's the fun if we can't be loud? No moaning and groaning loverboy?" Jessica said with a sadistic smile, hoping to get him both revved and riled up at the same time. It was working, the two conflicting emotions playing havoc with Jack's head.

"I uh..." Jack said, his "deer in the headlights" look again quickly finding it's way to his face. It had been doing that frequently.

"Oh, stop being some damn cute and predictable and heft me out of this thing" Jessica said, undoing her seatbelt and opening her door.
Extending her arms out to the side and waving them was Jack's signal to heft his date of the car once again. Hefting her to her feet, her face immediately began to suck various small corners of his face. He wanted to happen right here in the dirt in front of everyone who could see...

But deciding against that, he slowly guided Jessica into the house, kissing her back.. and her front... and her forehead.. and well anywhere he could get his lips on while she was dressed.

Entering the kitchen they began to disrobe, and Jack threw Jessica against the kitchen table, which groaned in response to her impressive weight. Kissing her deeply, she wiggled back a little bit, until her rear end hit something... square.. and brightly wrapped.

"Mmmm.. Package" She said between kisses.

"Yeah, I got a pack- - - " Jack said trying to sound sexy and sounding more idiotic.

"I will stop this whole thing right now if you finish that sentence. It sounded like something out of a bad porno" Jessica said, chastising Jack and his awful attempt at sexiness.

"Sorry." Jack said embarrassed.

Jessica reached behind her and grabbed a large wrapped box in bright pink-and-blue paper, some pacifier's tapped to the outside with a card that says "To Ryan. Best of luck at Fatherhood (Or is it Motherhood with you?) Regards, Amanda."

"Looks like a baby shower gift" Jessica said, a small pang of sadness in her voice. IF they couldn't undo this, it would probably be too late for a proper baby-shower which made her very sad. "Whose Ryan?" She asked.

"The only Ryan my Mom's ever talked about is her boss, but he doesn't have any kids." Jack said, before it dawned on him. "You don't think that - - -" Jack asked already knowing the answer.
"Would it really surprise you after everything else.." Jessica said, her hands pressed tightly around the roundness of her belly for emphasis "that has happened?"
"I don't want to think about it" Jack said.
"Still.." Jessica said, looking at the box, tempted to open it, to kick it's brightly wrapped treasure for herself
"What?" Jack asked.

"It's just that well.. Sarah and Ariel are coming so quickly into my life that well, I didn't really to get experience the whole pregnancy thing - Just the cliff notes you know? I mean, the little things like waiting so long and of course..." Jessica said with a pang of sadness in her voice, holding the present in her arms like one of her future unborn children "A baby shower. I'm not going to get a baby shower"

"Yeah, you and a lot of other people if we don't figure out a way to undo this.." Jack said smartassly quite pleased with his clever quick quip. "And wait, Sarah and Ariel?" Jack asked.
"Sarah and Ariel, our daughters?" Jessica said, rather matter of factly, pointing to her belly for emphasis.
"Ah no no, our sons. Luke and Optimus" Jack said with a smile. He was quickly falling into the role of "Father" quicker than he would like to admit.
"We're not naming one of our sons after a robot that turns into a car" Jessica replied back.
"Truck. He turned into a truck. Big difference" Jack said, correcting very sternly. You not triffle with Jack in matters of all things nerdy.
"And you admit that we're having sons then?" Jack just added as a way to twist the metaphorical knife.

"I said no such thing. We're having daughters, and there going to be as smart as beautiful as their mother, and as funny and charming as their father" Jessica said wrapping her arms around Jack, putting the present aside, and giving him a big kiss.
"Their father was a semi-evil coin that's obsessed with causing chaos through pregnancy in both men and women" Jack said, being a smartass again.
Jessica playfully slapped him upside the head.

"Nobody likes a wiseass" Jessica said, kissing him again.
"Shall we take this somewhere more.. sexable? I'd rather not have sex with my very beautiful and very pregnant girlfriend where I eat my cereal every morning.

Jack took his date back towards his room (something that rarely happened) and shut the door. They continued to kiss, each one of them removing more and more clothing with each kiss they took...

In the dark of that nerdy room, as the bright pale yellow glow of the full moon shone in on the two, as they lay upon the bed, it was prefect moment in time. In a rising syphony of creaking bedsprings, the two became one and all was right in the world.

Once it was all over, their bodies glistening with sweat, he held her, and she chose to be held, speaking not a word to each other, yet saying everything they would ever need to say: IF we fail, it will all be okay. IF we fail, we have each other. IF we fail, we have this moment.

Without saying a word to each other, they pledged themselves to each other, forever and always, in the dark of the night, in the light of the moon.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Insert Epic Love Scene Here.

1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
Kicking and turning inside Jessica's belly woke her up gracefully and she stretched her back and smiled as she opened her eyes, Jack's scruffy bed head in her face. After petting it softly and not noticing Jack getting any closer to waking up, Jessica planted a kiss on the back of her lover's head and inched her way out of bed. As she moved and got out, she could see what she had gotten used to over the past few days: her belly had gotten bigger. Jessica sighed and ran her hands around her naked bulge.

I look ready to pop, Jessica thought to herself. And she was right: anyone looking at her would say she looks about full term with one baby. Let's see...two more days. She sighed and patted the front of her belly as she walked around Jack's messy room. Two more days.

Peeking outside the bedroom door, Jessica couldn't hear any more noise in the house and breathed a little in relief. It's always awkward to run into the parents. Jessica reached a strange mix between tip-toeing and waddling as she checked doors for what she hoped was a bathroom. On the way, she stumbled across a closet and got herself a big, soft towel. Once in the bathroom, she drew herself a warm shower and stepped in, cooing and smiling as the water ran over her.

Down the hall, Amanda felt an even stronger flurry of movement inside her gigantic tummy, which she couldn't pretend to ignore. Mumbling and turning over, which was quite the exercise now, Amanda sat up slightly in bed, her belly now jutting up in the air four feet. It had grown again, Amanda noted with a little smile, running her hands over her enormity. On the surface, she could see the bumps and signs of in utero activity. Turning over, Jack Sr. was deep in sleep, snoring slightly. Amanda laughed quietly and patted him on the head. I've been wearing you out each night, haven't I dear? Amanda's libido grew with bounds and bounds each day her pregnancy increased and the added energy of four growing little ones inside her intensified that even further.

Amanda put her hands under her belly and heaved herself out of bed, breathing steadily as she did. As her feet settled on the floor, she then had to gradually stand up straight, putting her belly out as she stretched. Yawning and rubbing her pregnance some more, Amanda waddled to the coatrack in the room and slid into her robe. Of course, with Amanda's belly, the robe only served to cover up her breasts and conceal her hips and thighs some. The belly was now framed by velvet fabric.

Amanda waddled into the hall, trying not to wake her sleeping Jacks with her swollen movements, and opened the closet, getting a towel for herself. As she moved around, it was clear how much harder it was to move around with such an enlarged belly. Amanda sighed and started stroking her size. Just as she thought: she would need to rehearse her dancing thoroughly again to get used to her size. But, on the other hand, she would just get even bigger tomorrow...Amanda chuckled and put both hands on her belly. "When are you going to stop growing?" she asked, jiggling her belly a bit and getting kicks from eight individual legs in reply.

In the shower, Jessica had just turned off the water and was running her hands through her hair with a smile, feeling refreshed and ready to start the day. Talking with Jack about how they could raise little Ariel and Sarah was fun and...really sweet, but it was a scenario she wanted to avoid. If...when she and Jack have children, it'll be on their own terms. Besides, this wasn't just for them. Jack's mom, Jack's neighbor, Mariah. All of those men and women on the news. They don't all want kids and they can't all handle them.

Jessica and Jack had a day of fun. Now, it was time to get to work and now that she was washed and relaxed, Jessica was ready to take it all on. Opening the shower's glass door, Jessica stepped out, totally naked, pregnant, and dripping wet, as Amanda walked in.

"Oh! my god...Jessica?" Amanda said, holding her hand over her heart in fear.
"Mrs. Dale?!" Jessica choked out, jumping back in surprise and covering herself with her towel. "I-I-I-I-"
"It's okay," Amanda breathed, bending her knees some to catch her breath. "I'm sorry, you scared me half to death. Although I suppose you would have been the first pregnant burglar I can think of."
"Maybe," Jessica said, forcing a smile, her face bright red. "I'm so sorry about this."
"It's...alright," Amanda said, waddling up to Jessica. "Just...let us know next time."
"Sorry, I would have. I thought we would go to my house but Jack really...took charge," Jessica said, an idyllic grin spreading across her lips. "I'm sorry, you don't want to hear about that."
"You're right, I don't," Amanda laughed, "but I think it's my job as a mother to know. And now that we're here together-" Amanda paused, taking a huge breath, "-is it...Jack's?"

Jessica bit her lip, thinking about how to answer the question. It was something she needed to come to terms with if their plan didn't work out. "It...they aren't, Mrs. Dale. But we agreed to...raise them together. As a family."
Amanda nodded, putting her hands on Jessica's shoulders. "And you're sure that's what you want?"
Jessica nodded emphatically, feeling her cheeks getting hot again. "Absolutely. Jack's really been there for me and I love him. We love each other. It was a decision we came to together." A tear ran down Jessica's cheek. "You've got a great son, Mrs. Dale."
Amanda started to cry softly too, taking Jessica in a close hug. Or as close as they could get with their respective bellies. "So, twins huh? Two grandkids at once. And while I'm carrying four new children at the same time."
"It's all a little...out of the ordinary, I guess," Jessica chuckled.

Amanda broke the hug and nodded. "Well, this should be a time for celebrating. How far along are you?"
Jessica's smile faded. "Oh, um...I honestly don't know how to answer that. It's grown so quickly. I haven't even gotten used to being pregnant."
Amanda nodded. "Actually, I feel exactly the same way. Do you think it has something to do with these other strange pregnancies in the city?"
Jessica gave a little half-truth. "I think so, Mrs. Dale. And getting so big so quickly, I feel like I'm missing a lot of pregnant activities. No lamaze, just one ultrasound. And I really wanted a baby shower."

Amanda put her hands on her hip and smiled. "Well, you're in luck. A lot of my coworkers are pregnant so we're having a big group shower today." Amanda rolled her eyes. "Well, technically it's just for my boss, but we're letting him think it's all about him."
"Him?" Jessica started to say, before shaking her head. Right, that coin doesn't discriminate.
"So, why don't you come along? We can include you in the festivities."
"Mrs. Dale, are you sure?" Jessica said, still trying to find away to keep herself covered by her towel that she slowly realized was not big enough for her bulging belly.
"Of course," Amanda smiled, running her hands on her maternal curve. "You're carrying my grandbabies, after all."
Jessica smiled and laughed, giving Amanda another hug. "Thank you, Mrs. Dale. Really."
"You're welcome, Jessica sweetie," Amanda said. "You've always been good to us."
As they hugged, Jessica giggled. "Oh, one more thing, Mrs. Dale? Do you think I could borrow some clothes? Just until I get back home?"

---Mariah---

Jessica's pregnant friend, a sneak preview of what Jessica herself would look like in two days, snorted and woke up on a mattress, rubbing her belly and head sleepily.

"Sleep well?" Ms. Apple said, walking into the tiny room Mariah was sleeping in. "We could have gotten you back to your house, you know. Just because Ms. Quick and I are pregnant doesn't mean we can't give a little care."
Mariah shook her head and groaned, sitting up. "No, I had to stay here and look through the book," she said. "And the mattress was fine. I slept great."
Ms. Apple sighed and smiled, waddling over to Mariah and slowly heaving herself down onto the mattress. "Well, you're a hard worker, that's for sure. And smart. If we don't figure it out this time, would you consider joining the four of us on our global quest to vanquish magical evil?"
"That's a nice offer, but I'll have to sleep on it," Mariah said, reaching for the stack of notes she'd taken. "So from what I remember, and from what you left me, I think we definitely have a way to influence the coin's hold over us if we can get the other two. We'll need Jack too, but everything checks out."
"That's great, but where do we get the other coins? Or the book, for that matter?" Ms. Apple said, rubbing her belly and looking at Mariah's scribblings. "You're sure you and Jack and the girlfriend have a fix on them."
"I saw the woman who took the book myself," Mariah said. "And Jack happens to live by the monstrous pregnant woman who took it and gave me these two bundles of joy." Mariah rolled up her white t-shirt and showed Ms. Apple her smooth bulge.
"Hey, don't worry," Ms. Apple said in a gentle, quiet tone. "The four of us have made it out...okay. You'll be okay too."
Mariah nodded and heaved herself up. "Well, let's get ready to meet up with Jack and Jessica to go get the book back."
Ms. Quick walked into the cramped room, her belly hanging out defiantly from under her unbuttoned shirt. "And good luck, ladies. We've got a pretty solid lead on the third coin."
"Great, where?" Ms. Apple asked as Ms. Quick held out the flier for the pregnant bikini contest.

"Remember signing up for this?"

"Oh no..."

"Oh yes. We'd better practice our dancing, starting now."

choices: Lisa - Baby names and work with Sandwich and Oven.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
Lisa Smith stirs softly from her sleep as her lover, runs her fingers along the gravid expanse of Lisa's belly.
"Good morning lover" She says softly, lightly kissing Lisa's belly.
"So, before you go into work this morning with those knuckleheads on the radio. Maybe we should start discussing baby names" She said towards Lisa with a smile.

It wasn't a bad way for Lisa to start her day, lightly kissing her lover on the lips.

Or we could always go with someone else.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Rise And Shine III...

1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
"So you're starting to like the belly?" Lisa said, reaching down to touch her belly at the same time as Natalie. Their hands met and fingers intertwined as they rubbed her vastness.
"Well, to be honest, I always found it pretty hot," Natalie smiled, nuzzling her forehead against Lisa's collarbone. "But I could see how it was troubling you so I didn't say anything. But you seem...better now."
Lisa wrapped one arm under Natalie's armpit and held her closer. "I think I am. Having you here helps." Lisa rolled over onto her back, her belly nearly pulling the covers off the bed as it moved. "So, names...that would mean knowing the sexes." She turned and looked into Natalie's eyes. "Do you want to know?"
Natalie scooted even closer. "You mean you do?" Lisa grinned and Natalie gave a smiling gasp and pushed her playfully on the arm. "Well c'mon then! It's not fair to keep that to yourself!"
Lisa laughed and took one of Natalie's hands, kissing her palm wetly, and placing it on top of her belly. "Two girls and a boy." Natalie gasped and leaned over kissing Lisa frantically. "Oh! You like those sexes a lot more than I expected."
Natalie shook her head. "No, it's just...knowing the sexes makes it all so real now. And I can't believe how lucky I am to be starting a family with you."
"You're even luckier because you don't have to do the heavy lifting," Lisa sighed, rubbing the side of her belly with her other hand.

Natalie kissed Lisa on the cheek. "If I could switch places with you, I gladly would," she said. "Well, except that I'd miss that gorgeous pregnant figure you've developed." Now it was Lisa's turn to give Natalie a little push as she slowly sat up. "So, let's get the easy one out of the way. Boy's name."
Lisa thought and thought. "I kind of like Scott."
Natalie nodded. "That is a good name. For one of the girls, can we name her after my grandmother, Dalia."
Lisa let out a little whimper. "Aww...of course we can. That's a nice name. I guess we should name the other girl after my grandmother, Julia."
Natalie pressed her torso against Lisa's belly and wrapped her arms around her fleshy orb. "Scott, Dalia, and Julia...I can't wait to meet them. And raise them with you."
"Me either, babe," Lisa said, looking at her belly, feeling the kicks and movements as her children began to wake up. "Me either."
"And I definitely can't wait to see you strut around in a bikini tomorrow," Natalie giggled, kissing Lisa's belly.

At that, Lisa started to get out of bed. "Oh my God! I can't believe I'm really doing that." She looked back at Natalie's still grinning face. "And why do you want to see that so badly? I'm naked right now, is that not enough?"
Natalie shrugged. "It's different. And I've never seen you in a bikini pregnant before." Natalie started to turn red and bite her lip.
"Wow, this pregnant bikini thing is really doing something for you, isn't it?" Lisa remarked with a smile, waddling off to the bathroom to shower. Natalie just nodded rapidly, watching her lover pass behind the door.

Once dressed, and only thanks to the clothing the station was sent by Baby Universe as part of their sponsorship of the competition, Lisa sat in the living room, looking out the window. Since her pregnancy, Lisa had Sandwich and Oven carpool with her so she could still get to work. Natalie walked into the living room, wrapped up in a robe. She had her own job working an entry-level job at Titan Bank, but she didn't have to be in for a few hours. Lisa's time on the radio required her to get up pretty early in the morning.

Lisa saw the familiar over-compensating Ferrari of Sandwich. Natalie sat on the arm of her chair and two exchanged one long goodbye kiss as Lisa heaved herself out of her seat. "Do you have to keep going to work?" Natalie said with sad and worried voice. "I mean, at your stage, any pregnant woman would start taking maternity leave. We don't know how long you have until you...you know."
"Don't worry. When it's finally time to hatch, you'll be the first person I call," Lisa smiled, rubbing her belly. "And if I feel good enough to go to a pregnant bikini contest, I can go to work."
Lisa and Natalie exchanged another peck before Lisa waddled out the door and heaved herself into the backseat of Sandwich's car. Oven was in the front seat, grumpily fidgeting with his seatbelt. His belly had gotten larger again over the night and it made his restraint that much tighter.

"Tomorrow's the big day," Sandwich said as they drove to work. "We've got all of our bases checked?"
"It would have been easier if we didn't start putting this thing together last week," Oven complained. "I mean, really, why did we only start the legwork last week?"
Lisa shrugged. "Well if we wanted to find pregnant women, we had to find them pretty close to the day of the contest. We don't stay ripe for long, you know?"
"What are you trying to say? That I don't know what it's like to be pregnant?" Oven growled, turning around.
"Alright, alright, let's calm down," Sandwich said. "It's been a stressful week, yeah? Let's not be at each other's throats."

At the station, the three did their typical on-air, drive-time shtick for a few hours, then took their lunch break while the syndicated news played. As they ate, they went over the competition's check-list. "This is a pretty big list of women. Way more than I thought we'd get," Sandwich said.
"Well, you've got one more thanks to me," Lisa laughed sarcastically, going over the itinerary. "What's this about 'helpers?'"
"We've got two guys that got signed up as helpers in between the events," Oven said. "So like, straightening outfits, applying and reapplying oil to make the bellies stand out more."
Lisa's face turned red. The idea of having some rando rub oil all over her belly was not very appealing. If it was a woman, it might be a little different, but it didn't sound like it.
"And the opening band is all set, right?" Lisa said, turning the next page.
Sandwich nodded. "They're pretty...combative, but hopefully Mommy Kills Best will be professional enough to not give us any headaches or surprises. They're pretty popular, even if it's only a novelty because they're an all-pregnant band, but they'll bring in plenty of people by themselves."
Lisa's next question couldn't help but make her grin. "So what happens if I win? That might be seen as cheating, right?"
Oven scoffed. "You think you've got a good shot at winning?"
Lisa shot him back a piercing stare. "I'd say I have a very good shot at winning."
"Okay, okay," Sandwich said, holding out his hands. "The audience is the ones who vote on a winner, not us, so I think that should clear that up."

"Now Sandwich and I have to go over the actual competition elements, so if you're still going to be in this, you should step out of the room," Oven said. Lisa nodded and waddled out the room to the benches outside the station, finishing her big lunch. As she took her last bite, she called Natalie on her phone.
"Lisa! Oh my god, I was just joking this morning! Did your water break? Are you at the hospital? Do you need me to-"
"Natalie, relax, nothing's changed," Lisa giggled. "I just wanted to call you and say hi."
"Oh," Natalie said. "H-hi."
"But I'm glad you were so prepared to help out," Lisa said, rubbing her struggling belly. "You'll be a great mom."
Natalie blushed brightly. "T-thank you. You too. I, um, I've got to go. There's a baby shower here I should get to."
"Okay, no problem," Lisa said. "Did you listen?"
"Of course I did," Natalie said, quietly. "I love you."
"I love you too," Lisa said, hanging up the phone. Then she wrapped her arms around her belly and looked down at it, seeing the occasional bulge across the smooth surface and wondering whether it was Dalia or Julia or Scott who she was seeing.

"Maybe this will all work out," Lisa sighed, smiling.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Lisa starts her day

choices: Tara & Nicole- Tara briefs Zavaleta on her mother, Zavaleta practices her role
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
The smell of bacon, eggs, and pancakes filled the delicate nostrils of Tara, causing her to stir softly in her bed. She reached across the bed, and felt the heavy indent of nothingness.

Another night sleeping alone Tara thought, the events of last night quickly coming back to her as her brain woke up as well.

Her eyes bulged and she quickly (or as quick as she could given her circumstances) turned over and pressed her hand to the massive indent next to her, a profound heaviness was here just a little a while ago. Grabbing her bathrobe, (which basically just covered her breasts with her belly sticking out of it like a large skin-colored watermelon) she waddled into the kitchen, following the delicious smell of breakfast to find quite the sight for her eyes.

It was.. Zavaleta, cooking breakfast....

In the nude.

"Good morning. I take it your rest was peaceful and sound?" Zavaleta asked, flipping the pancake, completely oblivious that her... birthday suitness was making Tara a little uncomfortable.

"I uh.. I uh.." Tara tried to talk, but her eyes was just taking in the very, very pregnant 60-something military woman in front of her. Her belly was massive, bumping up against the oven. Her breasts rested on top of her massive heap of belly, the nipples a deep shade of brown, and covered in deep red and purple veins. Tara could see each little hand and foot that went THUMP against the massive pale planet of belly flesh that was here belly.

Tara had never seen anything like it before, it was hypnotizing. It was an impossible pregnancy, in both Zavaleta's size, and Zavaleta's age, but not only did Zavaleta look perfectly natural to be pregnant at her age (and somewhat happy), she carried her pregnancy with an unnatural grace. It was like she was barely even pregnant. While a belly like that would ground a normal woman, she moved with a deftness that made it seem like she was only pregnant with one. It was.. incredible.

"I looked over your pantry and noticed that your breakfast choices did not have the proper caloric intake of a woman pregnant with triplets. So, I left the apartment this morning, and purchased enough necessary groceriers to provide us with proper caloric nutrition during our time together. Don't worry, I paid for it myself. I have plenty of money, but no place to stay. I would find such a situation humorous if it wasn't for the fact that we are just hours away from executing a daring mission with little-to-no prep-time, and failure, I can say, is not an option for us." Zavaleta said, putting eggs, bacon, and pancakes, onto a plate and putting it on the small table in Tara's small kitchen. Zavaleta was taking up a lot of room in a small place, yet Tara's apartment didn't seem to notice.

Every ince of Zavaleta's naked body jiggled as she walked, as she placed the food on the table. Zavalata placed one hand into the rather large arch in her back, the other rubbing the vast expanse of her pregnant belly, Zavaleta humming to herself as she felt the kicks and punches of her unborn children prod back in response.

"I.. uh.. mission?" Tara asked, taking a seat at the table as Zavaleta poured what appeared to be freshed squeezed orange juice into a glass.
"Yes. In a few hours, I will be going undercover to initiate Operation: Baby Shower. The safety of you, your children, me, my children, this town, possibly even the world, rests on it's success." Zavaleta turned back the stop, her surprisingly toned rear end facing Tara as she cooked up another batch of breakfast.

"What?" Tara asked, trying not to stare at the massive naked pregnance in her direct eyesight. It wasn't that a sight of another woman naked made her uncomfortable, far from it. It wasn't Zavaleta's age or her massive pregnance that made her uncomfortable either, quite the opposite. Tara admired how a woman in her 60's could be so proud of her body to put it on display, let alone one who was impossibly pregnant with 8 babies.

Hell, it wasn't even the fact that there was a naked woman in the kitchen cooking her breakfast. She's had naked women cook her breakfast before in college, when, as her parents called it "she went through a phase".

No, what made Tara uncomfortable was the fact that Tara had NO IDEA WHY Zavaleta was naked in her kitchen. She leant her clothes last night, it's not like she didn't have anything to wear. Zavaleta didn't even sleep in the nude, so why the hell was cooking in the nude? And Bacon of all things? Nakedness and bacon are two things that do not go very well with each other.

"You say that sometime today, your bank, Titan Bank, will be hosting a baby-shower for one of your male employees, who is currently pregnant." Zavaleta laid it all out.
"I plan to use this baby shower, posing undercover as your mysteriously pregnant mother, visiting from out of town, to finally track down, what I believe is a sem-sentiant coin of magic which is causing the strange pregnancies around town. This coin is currently being held as a prize by your bank which is currently a sponsor of this "Pregnant Bikini Contest" that has, after some early morning research I did on your laptop, seems to be one of three "focal" points of these strange incidents I have tracked down, the other being your bank and the mall. Recon of the mall turned up the connection to your bank, and the bikini contest. I believe the connecting thread of this is somewhere hiding in plain sight.

Once, I infiltrate the bank, I will secure the package and use the bank's computer to find the common thread. Once the package and the thread are in my hands, I can make sure all of us" Zavaleta said, pointing at her belly for emphasis "are safe".

This was all too much for Tara to take in. A week ago she was pregnant single twenty-something with twins on the way and suddenly she's looking down the barrel of triplets and have had her home made into a makeshift command center by some pregnant sixty year old woman whose made her some kind of weird shadow agent.

"Here" Zavaleta said, walking over to a nondescript brown paper bag and giving it to Tara. "Inside, you will find a camera-pin which has been synced to download all footage you film ontop a off-site cloud server. I want you to record the baby shower, every detail, every belly, everything. In fact, if you can get everyone's shirts off so I can see bare bellies, would be even better. I had an advanced algorithm program running under the footage capture program to analyze the data in real time and transmit to this smart-watches. If anything abnormal is spotted, it was let us know. I will blend in, playing the part of the poor old pregnant woman, and then, when the opening appears, I will sneak off, secure the package and find the thread. You will wear this ear-piece. It's a whisper piece, allowing you to whisper all the developments to me, and have your cover remain intact. I will be listening on the other end, also monitoring data with the watch."

Tara's head was spinning. "Where did you.. where did you get all this?" Tara asked, finishing her breakfast. "I procured this items very early this morning along with the bags of groceries. I had to call in some favors to get people to check out this items for me.. The less questions you ask the better. Anything else?"

Tara felt like this was her only chance. "Why are you naked?"
"The answer is obvious." Zavaleta asked, putting her own breakfast plate down, and sitting, her massive pregnant body spilling out from the chair, and making her sit far away from the table. "My sleeping attire was dirty after purchasing all these items this morning. I did not want to soil the lent maternity clothes so early cooking, so I did so naked."

"You shopped in your bra and panties?" Tara asked.
"Yes. Now, go shower and get dressed. I need you to brief me on everything about your mother and how she would react becoming mysteriously pregnant at her current age. I need her likes, her dislikes, everything. I need to disappear into this role" Zavaleta said, scarfing down her food with military precision.

It was going to be a long day.
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.title: Operation: Baby-Shower.

choices: Amber and Jack drive to work together. That won't be awkward at all, will it?
1141111112212121111122211122111112121111.content:
Faye was happily awoken by the kicking inside her womb, as she'd been for the last few days, although to her, they were months. She laid on her side, her belly pushing the limits of the queen-size mattress in the guest room. Faye wasn't sharing the bed with her husband for...a variety of reasons. Stretching out, Faye scooted herself forward a bit, reaching to her side bureau for the coin sitting there. "Good morning, my curious friend," Faye smiled, feeling the coin's energy pulse out. "What's the task today?"
They're getting closer...trying to take away your children. Snatch them out of your womb. Get it back from the boy.
Faye nodded with a smile. "Yes, I've been wanting a second try with Jack Jr. for some time now."
And you must earn the final piece. Win.
"The bikini contest," Faye chuckled. "Yes, I think I have a good shot at that. This belly is irresistible," Faye said, sitting up in bed, running her hands all over her curves. Her belly was perfectly smooth and round, her skin glowing with energy, all of it several feet out of her body. "The only one with a belly to rival mine is Amanda and...she's a little old to out-dance me."

The coin fell silent and Faye shrugged, pushing herself out of bed and rubbing her rear as she yawned. Faye took off work a while ago to take care of her massive pregnancy. She was lucky to get in her maternity leave before the whole city was struck with pregnancy and her bosses started restricting time off so they could at least have enough people in the office to keep the place running. Gripping the coin in her hand, Faye waddled out the door and down the hallway to one mysterious locked door. Reaching around the frame, Faye got out the hidden key and opened the door, gently walking inside.

"F-Faye!" Charles' moaning voice said from the bed inside. "Please, you've got to undo this! I don't know what you did to me, but-"
"Shh, shh," Faye said with a playful smile, walking over and rubbing her husband's gigantic pregnant belly. "You always wanted a family didn't you? Now we're going to have one that's even bigger."
"Faye, please, this is-"
"Don't you get the news in here?" Faye said, pressing down on Charles' belly. He groaned. Faye's relationship with the coin was quite beneficial. When she used its magic on him, it sensed her thirst for revenge and gave Charles more than one baby. A lot more than one baby. And as Faye pressed down, those many babies pushed down on Charles' bladder. "Men getting pregnant is very common nowadays. You're a bit of a trend-setter."
"Faye, this is insane! I can't-"
"A big family, that's what you always wanted," Faye sighed. "So badly that you went ahead and knocked up some young little thing and then had her stay in our house."
"Faye! Don't you remember the time we used to spend together? How happy we were holding your growing belly together? We can be like that again!"
