Tails! No Reality Change! the voice boomed in her head!

"Samantha! What are earth is going on!" Beth yelled as her (now pregnant) husband stared at Samantha.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Tails - No Reality Change. Two In A Row!

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Moments later Beth's hand went to her mouth as she ran towards the bathroom, fighting off HER need to puke her guts out everywhere.
URK! The sounds of Beths' pregnancy related puking could be heard from behind the door.

Samantha came back to her senses as Mark just stared at her.
"Samantha, what's with that coin?" Mark asked, still pale from his bout of pregnancy related puking.
"It's uh - - -" Samantha searched for a lie.
"It's my coin that I use to make moral decisions on. I've been flipping it lately because - - - well I've decided that - - - I will not tell anyone what happened here tonight. Maybe your concerns were valid, maybe not. But you should totally get to run for home owner's association president" Samantha lied, the words becoming clearer and easier for her to form.

"Really?" Mark pale face seemed to light up.
"Y-yeah" Samantha continued her lie "Look, I needed to flip the coin twice to make sure I was making the right decision. Leave it up to fate and all that. So, I won't tell anyone. In fact, I'll endorse you. I have some minor pull in the neighborhood, and coming from a middle aged pregnant woman" Samantha said, holding her belly for emphasis "They'll by any story I tell them" Samantha finished her lie.

My god. Did I really just absentmindledly do to these two what I think I did? Samantha thought to herself. If it's true, well then, they're in for some big changes and bigger surprises soon Samantha thought to herself.

"You two will have playmates" Samantha said outloud to her belly giving it a rub.
"I'm sorry?" Mark asked confused.
"Oh, just saying something out loud to myself." Samantha said, spewing out another lie.

Beth returned from the bathroom minutes later, her eyes also red and watery.
"Beth honey, you okay?" Mark asked.
"Yeah. I feel fine. Great in fact. I'm - - -" Beth was interrupted as Samantha finished her thought, "Starving?"
"How did you know Samantha?" Beth asked.
"This puking hunger thing is going around school. A couple of the staff have it. You probably caught it somehow" Samantha said, in yet another lie.
"I guess" Mark said.

"Well, see you guys later and thanks again for all your help" Samantha said, politely pushing her two guests towards the front door.
"See you Samantha" Beth said in a daze.
As Samantha closed and locked the door behind them, she could still hear Beth and Mark talking.
"I'm starving. Let's eat." Beth said.
"What do you want to get?" Mark asked.
"I could go for a extra large pizza with everything on it" Beth said.
"Honey, we don't eat meat. " Mark said.
"I know, but I have this sudden craving from meats and lots of it" Beth said her voice drifting off as they walked towards their home.
"Yeah, I' craving meat as well. 1 little pizza with meat won't hurt us right?" Mark asked.
"Make it two, I could eat a whole one by myself" Beth corrected.
"I'll make it three. I know a place around here that delivers late. Saw an ad for it"Mark's voice fading off into nothing as Mark and Beth went into their house, unware of the new beings that were growing inside of them.

Samantha yawned, scratched her belly and looked at the clock. Almost 11:30.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Fast Pregnancy - Beth's Matching Bundle Of ...

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
"Well, it's getting late," Samantha said, rubbing her belly,"I guess I should get some sleep." Samantha made her way into her bedroom, where she laid down on her bed. Tomorrow would be a big day, as she had a half-day of teaching, and she had to go to the mall. Hopefully, someone would send her an e-mail about the the coin, as she had many questions to be answered. With these thoughts drifting through her head, she fell asleep, her babies kicking gently inside.

Surprisingly, she did not have a dream last night. Unraveling the covers from her pregnant state, she was again surprised at what sat before her. It was as if someone had shoved a watermelon in her womb. She was huge, maybe the size of a woman seven or eight months pregnant with just one baby. Even more surprising was the fact that her belly button was now poking out. "I may have to schedule another appointment soon, I'm growing really fast..." she said, as her babies greeted her with strong kicks.

She had about half an hour before she needed to be at school. First, she decided to take a shower. Her slight waddle/slight walk had turned into full-on pregnant lady waddle. After removing her clothes in the bathroom, she carefully stepped into the shower. Five minutes later, she dried off, which was difficult due to her larger size.

Samantha waddled back into her bedroom and went to her closet. Unfortunately for her, she could only fit in a pair of sweatpants and shirt that was similar to the one she was already wearing, exposing her belly slightly. There's no way that I'll be able to get away with this at school. I need to come clean...tell everyone I'm pregnant...she thought, her babies kicking in agreement. Her belly gave a rumble, signaling that she needed food now.

Her appetite was definitely increasing. She had four pancakes, bacon, eggs, and a side of fruit, which could have fed three people. "Ugh,"she groaned,"I'm going to be having a feast every meal if this keeps up..." Checking her watch, she noticed that she had five minutes until she had to leave. She decided to...
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Samantha went to bed. (Day 6)

choices: Dylan, Lisa, and Brooke are back...with a 'little' surprise...
The three teachers are out again
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Beth and Mark were pretty sick last night, so I should probably play the good neighbor and check up on them. Besides, there's a chance they might be pregnant... she thought to herself. Samantha then waddled over to their house next door. Approaching the front door, she rang the doorbell. She was able to hear heavy footsteps coming to the door. Opening the door was Mark, different from yesterday. He appeared to have grown some man-boobs and a slight paunch, to Samantha's surprise. Reminds me of Chris, but a bit smaller. I better not say anything about it as to not piss him off, she thought.

"Good morning, Samantha. What do you want?" he asked. "I just knew that you were both pretty sick last night, are you feeling any better?" "Not really, we're both really hungry, though." All the signs so far...Samantha thought, rubbing her own belly. "Where's Beth?" she asked. "She's getting ready for work at the moment."

Suddenly, they both heard footsteps coming down the stairs. It was Beth, dressed only in work pants and a bra, which struggled to contain her growing breasts. Her belly was exactly the same size as Mark's, as if she were severely bloated. She also had an almost maternal glow about her. "Hello Samantha, what brings you here this morning? Have you decided to accept out offer?" Samantha immediately shot that down. "No! I was just checking to see how you all are doing." Beth let out a soft sigh. "We're still pretty sick. We were throwing up a lot this morning. But we're also really hungry, as I'm sure Mark mentioned. And I guess you can tell we're pretty bloated, but for some reason I'm a little worried..." Beth said, rubbing her belly.

Without thinking, Samantha's hands shot to Beth's stomach, feeling the firmness of it. I knew it. She's pregnant. And so is Mark. But I can't tell them that here, they'd have a heart attack! she thought. Beth gasped. "What are you doing?!" she asked. Samantha removed her hands from Beth's paunch, while Mark gave her an angry look. "I-sorry, I wasn't really thinking. I think you're alright, but if you get any bigger, you may want to see a doctor. Same goes for you, Mark." Samantha said. "Goodbye Samantha!" said Mark angrily, slamming the door in her face. Checking the time, Samantha realized it was time to go to school.

She waddled to her car and headed out. Pulling into the parking lot, she became nervous. What would they all think of me? How are they going to react to my pregnancy? Her babies began to kick, as if to give solace to her.

Inside...
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: What Are the Neighbors Up To? (Day 6)

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
As Samantha heaved herself out of her car and waddled towards the front doors of the school, she noticed something that was a little different today than two days ago. Two days.. she thought to herself.

It just occured to her that she ditched work yesterday. Now granted, she would have TWO very good excuses to give to Lisa, but still it occurred to her that she should have at least told someone that was taking yesterday for a personal day.

But yesterday was yesterday, and Samantha was focused on today. Today was going to be a very busy day for her; she had a pregnancy to announce (although at this point, people could just look at her and make a safe guess), a class to test, and a shopping date with her pregnant best friend in a crowded mall to purchase items for her two children that she was pregnant with, despite (to her own knowledge) she was not pregnant with days ago.

Today's going to be a day Samantha thought to herself, and she was right. Her first clue was that as she waddled towards the front door of the school, she noticed a brand new bright blue sedan parked in Lisa's parking spot.

That's not Lisa's car. She's driven that old mid 90's sedan for several years, almost to the point of death. Someone must have parked their car in her spot. Samantha thought examining the car from where she was standing. It looked brand new, pristine, not a speck of dust on it, like it just rolled off the factory floor. It looked roomy, sleek, yet safe.

Samantha was just about to shrug off this new car as someone not parking where they are supposed to, goodness knows that Samantha has had her fair share of that, until she noticed the bright pink steering wheel cover, a pacifier hanging from the rear view mirror, and a back window decal showing a smiling woman with the name "Lisa" written above it, with a tiny story next to her with the name "Ian" written above it.

Looking through the front windshield, she saw a brand new carseat in the back seat, with a plastic doll strapped in, dressed in blue.
"What in the world?" Samantha asked, taking in everything she saw. This was Lisa's parking spot, the sticker on the window said Lisa, so why was this family car parked here? Why was there a plastic baby doll in the back in car seat? Surely none of this belonged to Lisa. She had no need for a family car or a carseat didn't she?

The coin. Samantha's thoughts came back to the coin.
Is it possible that the effect it had on Chris and Nina and her neighbors was at work here with her coworkers?
She ran a hand across her belly, lost in thought as a chill ran down her spine.

"It can't be." Samantha told herself before looking down at her pregnant belly, which was hanging out of the shirt she was currently wearing.
"But then again, I said that about you two now didn't I?" Samantha said to herself.

She wanted to investigate but she couldn't. She had things to do today, she a class to teach, a test to supervise, a mall to shop at. Whatever mystery that lay behind this mysterious blue car would either have to wait or would unveil itself to her in due time.

She sighed turned around from the bright blue mystery and entered into the building.

She made her way into the teachers lounge, and upon her immediate entry, she could feel every pair of eyes looking at her and her pregnant belly. A silence fell over her co-workers as Samantha wrapped her hands around her pregnancy.
"Good morning everyone." Samantha said to her co-workers.

Here goes everything! Samantha thought to herself. "I have something I would like to announce to everyone, although I think it might be obvisious to anyone with a pair of eyes. I'm - - " Samantha was just about to say those words when she was interrupted.

"Pregnant, you too! Samantha, that's fantastic!" The interrupting voice was from Lisa who came into the room from the bathroom, rubbing a very small but very visible tiny pregnant belly.

"Wha-wha-Lisa?" was all Samantha could stammer about before it felt like she was going to faint.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Samantha (FP Day 6) - Big Surprises, Bigger Staff

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha couldn't believe her eyes. Lisa Jacobs, a single 40-year old woman, was pregnant. Although it was not big, she had a noticeable bulge in her midsection, along with a larger pair of breasts.

"This is such good news, Samantha! I can't believe it!" Lisa said, beaming, arms around her belly. Samantha just smiled as she tried to control her wits. Lisa tried to continue the conversation. "So, what is it? Boy or girl?" she implored. "It's both..." Samantha replied. "Twins?! That's incredible! Of course, I only have little Ian in here, but that's all I really need..." Lisa said, rubbing her belly.

"So how far along are you, Samantha?" Lisa asked. "Actually, I'm not really sure. I'll probably have a doctor's appointment soon to know for sure...What about you?" "Oh me, I'm four months along...but I really have now idea how I got pregnant!" she said. I can venture a guess...Samantha thought. Now it was Samantha's turn to continue the conversation. "So...you feel any kicks yet? These little jerks do it all the time!" On cue, the "little jerks" gave two swift kicks to Samantha's bladder. "Actually no, they haven't yet, but Dr. Harper said I should soon. It's different for every woman, I've heard-"

At that moment, they were interrupted by Dylan entering the room. Dylan's belly was also big, nearly identical to Lisa's. Like Chris and Mark, he also had a sizable pair of man boobs. He seemed distraught, confused, even. He was dressed in khaki's and a button down shirt which struggled to contain his belly. As Dylan approached, Lisa left the room. "I'll see you later, Samantha!" she said, cradling her own pregnant belly.

"Good Morning, Samantha. I see that your swelling swelling hasn't gone down, then again, neither has mine..." he said, looking down at his belly. "I'm actually pregnant. With twins." Samantha said. "Wow...you? Pregnant? I never thought I'd see the day! Well, my congratulations to you." Dylan said. "So what's your excuse, Dylan?" she said, referring to Dylan's turgid midsection.

"It's just an illness, I guess. Maybe a tapeworm or something. I'm just hungry ALL the time. Unfortunately, I really can't afford another sick day to go to the doctor's so I'll just have to fight it off, I guess." he said, somewhat timidly. Samantha was at a crossroads. On one hand, she knew he was pregnant. But on the other hand, how could she break the news to him in the break room? I've got to tell him, she thought. "Dylan, I think that-" At that moment, Samantha was interrupted by someone loudly entering the room.

It was...
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Samantha talked to Lisa.

choices: Samantha goes to teach her class
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
"Good morning losers!" Samantha turned around and saw Brooke stroll into the room in her typical fashion. Of course, any time Brooke walked into a room, it was an eyebrow raiser, with her impossible good looks and her sexy stroll, but today it was like never before.

Brooke was wearing a full body leotard, clinging to her body like her own pair of skin. Her already heaving cleavage was even more noticeable now, the neck of the outfit leaving an open cut for her breasts to show and the tight material showing their full size. Her nipples were also clearly visible against the fabric. And, like Lisa, Nina, and every other woman who'd become mysteriously pregnant, Brooke's double-Ds were now even bigger.

The outfit probably didn't cover up her legs, but Samantha couldn't tell because around her round ass, Brooke had on a tight pair of black, velvety pants; the kinds that probably say JUICY on the butt. Samantha wouldn't put it past Brooke to wear that sort of thing so she craned her head a little to see if there was any writing.

"See something you like?" Brooke grinned. Samantha snapped out of it and looked back at Brooke annoyed.

"Brooke, do you really think that outfit's appropriate for a work environment?" Samantha said.

Brooke pouted playfully. "Well, I can't help it. I need to wear more form-flattering outfits. I'm pregnant!" Sure enough, there was a big bulge in Brooke's midsection, easily visible through her satiny leotard material.

"Yeah, me too," Samantha said quietly, resting her hand on her heaving twin-filled belly.

"I could have guessed," Brooke chuckled, looking over at Dylan. "Dylan, what's up with you? Did you get knocked up too?"

Dylan blushed and held his hands together, trying to cover up his midsection. "I-I've got an illness. I'm going to the doctor to check it out." And with that, he was out of the room.

"Hmm," Brooke said, walking up to Samantha. Brooke was already much taller, so she was literally looked down on the 50-something pregnant woman. From Samantha's perspective, Brooke's face was partially obscured by her big breasts. "So how far along are you?"

"I'm not quite sure," Samantha said, rubbing one hand against her belly gently. "My babies seem to be getting big pretty fast so it's hard to tell. They're already kicking."

"I wouldn't be surprised, with a belly this big," Brooke said, aggressively rubbing Samantha's belly, even rolling up her shirt some. "Huh. No stretch marks. I'd figure you'd be covered in them."

"And I'm sure you don't have any," Samantha smiled back sarcastically.

"Nope," Brooke said. "I have a feeling I'm going to carry this pregnancy very nicely." Samantha's fake smile slowly turned back to a look of annoyance. She certainly hadn't planned for all her coworkers to become pregnant, but when the possibility crossed her mind, she looked forward to the perky, sexy Brooke DD getting fat and saggy with child. But just the opposite happened. Brooke had never looked better and she now had a glowing, motherly aura about her.

"By the way, I'm carrying twins," Samantha said, trying to jut her belly out a little. "And did you hear that Lisa's pregnant too?"

"Really?" Brooke said, now rubbing her own small bump with her wide open palm. "Well it's going to be a very interesting next couple of months, isn't it?" With that, Brooke strolled out of the room, off to traumatize some young boys and girls with developing hormones.

Months? The way things have been going, it'll be an interesting couple of days, Samantha thought as Brooke walked out the door.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Brooke

choices: The test concluded, the time getting away from her. To the mall!
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha (Day 6) I Chris (Day 3) I Brooke, Dylan, Lisa (Day 3) <- - For future reference


Samantha watched Brooke leave, Brooke's incredibly sexy maternal figure nearly strutting down the hallway, almost emitting a siren's call to the few single and many married men of the school.

A firm KICK from one of her occupants brought her out of her mindless trance, reminding her that she had a job to do and a family to take care of, and most importantly, shopping to do. "Well, I guess we better go huh kids? Mommy's got some work to do and then we'll go to the mall with Aunty Nina. If your very good, Mommy will give you some ice cream" she said to herself with a smile, her hands exploring that vast expanse of her midsection.

"And even if you aren't Mommy's still going to have ice cream" Samantha said with a chuckle. It was all still surreal to her; being pregnant. She never in a hundred years thought she would be, and her she was 55, single, and pregnant with twins. But then again, she never thought she would come across a magical coin that caused pregnancy and seemed to be working it's magic on her co-workers, men included.

She laughed to herself, knowing there was nothing she could do about it now, and walked (although now turning more into a full-on waddle) to class. Today was a test day, one that she had been preparing her students for. The state wanted test results, and the only way to get test results was to well... test.

Samantha was crazy about the state testing kids of useless stuff for the purpose of whether or not the kids were learning, it was a waste of time to her. She would much rather spend the day teaching them instead of sitting at her desk with a book. But luckily for her today, the fates seemed to be aligning for the single pregnant over fifty teacher. She could actually sit down for a while (standing this long seemed to be taking a toll on her) and after words, she could head out to the mall to get what she needed for two little bundles of... Samantha wouldn't call it joy right now, but she was getting there.

Standing outside the door to her classroom, she took a deep breath, caressed her belly, and said to herself "Here we go". She didn't know how she was going to tell her students that their single teacher was having a baby, but it wasn't like she could hide it anymore.

Opening the door and stepping through, it took mere seconds for the children's attention to turn from say, general chaos, to their teacher's ample midsection. Their mouths hung agape as Samantha slowly entered in, placing her hands in the small of her back for emphasis. "Good morning class."
Samantha said, slightly sweaty from both her nerves and her current condition.

"I'm sorry I wasn't in yesterday, but well.." Samantha slowly smiled, trying to get her point across without having to say the words.
One hand slowly moved from the small of her back to the small sliver of belly-flesh that hung out from the shirt she was wearing. Slowly, still smiling, she slowly lifted up the hemline of her shirt to reveal her massive twin-filled belly to her class.

"I'm having a baby.. Well two babies to be exact.." Almost on cue, her unborn son and daughter went into a kicking overdrive, their tiny pokes and jabs very visible under her very ample amounts of pregnant skin. Her class just stared on in silence.

"Now, class any questions?" Samantha said, slowly pulling her shirt down over her belly, well as far as it would go.
EVERY hand in her class went up at once.
"I thought you said you weren't having a baby!" One student said.
"Aren't you too old to have a baby?" Another student asked.
"When are we going to meet the babies?" A third student asked.
"Don't you have to have a daddy to have a baby? You don't have a daddy in your life Ms. Peters" A fourth student asked.
"Why are all the ladies here having babies? The principal and the gym teacher are having babies as well!" Another student said.

A smile crossed the edges of her face. This went alot better than she thought it would.

"While those are all great questions, I think maybe your parents would be better answering some of those than me. Just know that I'm having twins and I'm very excited and nervous. Yes, I'm older than most mommies, but I'm going to do my best. I didn't want anyone to know right away because, when a older lady has a baby there are.. risks, but I found out that my babies are perfectly healthy, and growing very fast" Samantha said.

A little too fast Samantha thought. "Now, are you guys ready for your test? Once you're done, put your answer cards on my desk and wait until 12:30 to be excused to go home. Now, don't forget to do your homework this afternoon. Now that I'm going to be a mom, I'll have a special sense that will tell me when you're homework is done or not" Samantha said, half-joking.

Samantha waddled back to her desk and sat down with a sigh of relief. The students took our their pencils and test books and began working while Samantha sat there, rubbing her belly, watching her students. Soon, her children would be born, and in a couple of years,they would be students just like them.

I wonder if I can have my own children as students. Hmm. They'd totally hate that Samantha thought with a smile on her face. Mothers knows best ran threw her head.

Time went by, the scribbles and scratches of pencils filling in answers and doing work the only sound in the classroom as Samantha sat awkwardly at her desk, browsing up pregnancy information. She still wasn't use to her ever-growing belly, but she was compensating.

As she was reading articles on child-rearing and what to expect as her pregnancy continued...
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Life goes on.

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha (Day 6) I Chris (Day 3) I Brooke, Dylan, Lisa (Day 3) <- - For future reference

BRRRRINNNG! With a shill ring, the time for test taking had come to a swift end, the students finishing up scribbling down their answers and placing the pencils down.
Awakening from a daze of pregnancy information, and rubbing the soft bare skin of her pregnant belly (deciding to loosen the strain on her poor shirt, lifting it up somewhat during the test), Samantha heaved (and their were no other words around it. She was now heaving herself out in and out of seats) out of her chair, placing one hand in the small of her arching back, the other bracing her standing action against the desk.

After coming to a complete stand, she took one hand and stretched out her shirt all the way down it could go, as her students handed in their tests, Samantha smiled, For this once brief moment in her life, she was truly happy. She was doing her job, she was pregnant, and she not a care in the world. She didn't worry about the bizarre changes her body was going through on a daily basis, she didn't have to worry about trying to care for two-children at her advanced age. She didn't need to worry about doctor's visits, bills, temper tantrums, college savings or anything of that. For this brief little moment in time, it was just her, her job, and her pregnant belly, with her son and daughter locked away inside.

"Goodbye Ms. Peters! Goodbye Ms. Peter's babies!" Amy said with a smile, placing a hand of the ample middle of her teacher with a smile. "Ohh. Thank you Amy. But in the future, you ask a pregnant lady if you can feel her belly okay?" Samantha said with a smile. "Okay" Amy said, taking her hand away and leaving the classroom to be dropped off by her bus.

Laughing to herself, hoping that her own children would be as smart and polite and kind as Amy, she gathered the tests up in her arm. "Well then, I guess it's time for Mommy to shop for you two hmm?" Samantha said looking down at her midsection with a smile. Gathering up her belongings, she filled the tests away, leaving them in a stack for Lisa to collect.

Samantha thought about the current situation with Lisa. She seemed happy enough to be pregnant, even at her age (Samantha laughed in her head at the phrase "at her age" since she was younger than Samantha) but she was worried that she, like Samantha, might be underestimating how hard it would be to be a single mother at their age.

Her mind drifted to Brooke, who seemed to not only mind being pregnant, but would undoubtedly be able to take care of herself and her child, probably with the help of her parents, who would probably spoil their grandchild as badly as they spoiled Brooke.

Walking towards her car, she caught sight of Dylan, his button up t-shirt tight against his small belly, his hand absentmindedly placed against the side of it, his face showing great concern as to what was happening to him. This "mysterious pregnancy" as Samantha had dubbed it, was the one that gave her the most regret. Dylan was a man, he couldn't possibly be pregnant, yet as she watched struggle to bend over to pick up something, and watched his movements, it was clear to her, he WAS pregnant.

Dylan was going to be a dad.. or a mom. Samantha hadn't quite figured out the exact way to define this situation, but it was a situation none the less. Did Dylan know what was happening to him? Was he taking proper care of himself and his unborn child? What happened when he had to give birth? If he went to a hospital, they would take his child and lock him in a lab somewhere.. Then Samantha's eyes went wide as her train of thought went back to Chris and her next door neighbor. She used the coin on them, could it be happening to them as well?

What had she done? She wanted to tell them, wanted to call them up, apologize profusely, but would they believe her? They just had to take a look at themselves, and seeing is believing right? Even if it's the impossible? A firm kick from one of her children drew her thoughts to her immediate needs, Dylan could wait.

Walking back to her car, she eased herself inside, adjusting her seat. Funny, it almost seemed like she was growing by the hour. "I'm probably going to need a new car first. Maybe a mini-van" She said to herself, adjusting the seatbelt over her pregnant belly. "Oh god, I'm truly going full-on Mom in this case huh?" She said, looking down to her stomach.

Turning the key to the ignition, the engine roared to life and she set course for the mall. After having a long conversation with herself over what she needed (although Samantha would argue that she was asking her children for their input on things), she pulled into a parking space. Unbuckling her seatbelt, she heaved her self out of the car, checking, double checking and then triple checking that she would have everything she would need for this prenatal shopping spree.

Walking (though more waddling) into the mall, she found her way to Baby Universe, and waited outside patently for Nina and Chris to show up. She waited, and waited, and waited some more, frequently swapping her hands from her belly to the small of her back.

Finally, after sometime waiting, she was finally met at Baby Universe by..
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: To The Mall!

choices: The pregnant ladies (and guy) lick the food court clean.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha looked around, hand on her belly, as she saw Thomas and Christina, his pregnant mistress, heading her way. Samantha froze, realizing that he had no idea that she was pregnant, and with twins no less.

Tom noticed Samantha, and led Christina towards her. "Samantha, how are yo--OH MY GOD!" he screamed, observing her pregnant state. "Are you--" "Pregnant? Yes, I am." she said, rubbing her rounding stomach as her babies kicked inside.

"But you weren't this big a few days ago. In fact, you weren't even showing." Thomas said, still in disbelief. "Well, I am having twins, after all." she said with a smirk. "TWINS?! But what, whatever happened to you saying you didn't want any children? Any now you're having twins right off the bat?" he asked, becoming more and more dumbfounded as the conversation progressed.

"I don't know what to tell you, Thomas. I really don't. Sometimes things happen for a reason without any explanation." she said. Christina stepped in. "Congrats, Samantha. You actually look a bit bigger than me! How far along are you?" Christina asked.

"Yes, how far along are you, Samantha? And who's the father?" Thomas asked.

Flip me said the alien voice yet again. On cue, Samantha grabbed the coin out of her pocket and gave it a flip, staring at Thomas. She looked at the coin as it hit her hand.

Tails! No reality change! the voice boomed. Suddenly, Thomas's stomach began to rapidly expand, as the buttons of his shirt were popping.

His belly kept growing, up until the point where he looked nearly eight months pregnant. "OHMYGOD OHMYGOD OHMYGOD!" both Thomas and Christina shouted. "We need to take you to a hospital!" Christina yelled, putting a hand over Thomas's pregnant belly. "I know that, Christina!" he shouted back. The two waddled away, leaving the mall as fast as they could. Samantha wasn't surprised at all by this occurrence. In fact, she had gotten used to it.

After that situation, Nina and Chris appeared. Nina was still wearing sweatpants and a belly-baring shirt, but Chris was wearing a large jacket, which was weird, considering how warm it was outside. They finally reached Samantha after a few minutes of Nina's waddling.

"Hey, Sammy! Wow, look at you! You're bigger than you were yesterday! Those twins must be growing fast!" Nina said, placing a hand on Samantha's belly. "H-hey Samantha." Chris said sheepishly, keeping his distance. "Oof! She's right on my bladder! We'll go shopping right after I hit the restroom, ok?" Nina asked, before waddling away.

"Hey, Samantha. Could we talk for a second? In private?" Chris asked. "Sure, what's up?" she asked, following Chris to a secluded area. "I think...I think I'm pregnant..." he trailed off. "What? Pregnant? Come on, Chris, men don't get pregnant!" she said, trying to calm him down, even though she knew that that statement wasn't true. "I mean, what do you mean you're pregnant? You don't look pregnant." she said. "Oh really?" he said, looking around. After making sure the coast was clear, he unbuttoned his coat.

He was right. His stomach was large, giving him the appearance of someone who was seven, going on eight months pregnant. His belly button was shallow, and would no doubt stick out soon. "Oh my God, Chris..." Samantha said, not really knowing what to say. She knew that he was already on edge with Nina having a baby, but she had no idea how he felt now that he looked to be adding at least one more to the bunch.

"Did this happen...three days ago?" she asked, ignoring her babies' kicking as she felt Chris's taut stomach. To her surprise, she could feel some slight kicks and jabs in numerous places. "That sounds about right. Samantha...what should I do?" he asked. "You should definitely go to a doctor. I mean, I'm your size and I'm only having twins, so..." Samantha replied. "But what about Nina? What should I say?" he asked. "Well, you're going to have to tell her at some point, so better now than later." she said. Chris gave out an audible gulp, placing a hand on his very pregnant-looking belly.

"Okay, I'm back! Ready, Samantha?" asked Nina, finally back from her bathroom break. Chris quickly buttoned his coat, but Nina wasn't paying attention. Nina led the way into Baby Universe, as Samantha and Chris followed.

Nina helped Samantha make purchases, from maternity clothes to baby supplies. After making their purchases, they headed to checkout. The cashier was a goth girl, which they both thought was odd, considering they both assumed that goths ate babies for breakfast. "Thanks for shopping at Baby Universe. I hope that everything was okay for you." the goth said in a monotone voice.

Flip me! the voice boomed yet again. Samantha once again grabbed the coin and flipped, keeping her eyes on the goth girl. She looked at the coin after it landed in her hand.

Heads! Reality change! the voice rang out. The goth's belly sprouted outwards, stretching the limits of her tight corset. Her belly grew until she was about Thomas's size, and the corset had given way to her belly, baring it for Nina and Samantha to see. "Have a good day." she said, as if nothing had happened, and in reality, nothing did.

Samantha, Nina, and Chris all exited the store, and their bellies groaned in unison, Chris's the loudest of the three. The babies began to kick and move around in Samantha's belly, which she didn't really expect. "Oof! Boy, I'm STARVING!" she said. "Me too!" Nina replied, rubbing her belly. The three then made their way to the food court, and prepared themselves for the feast that they soon would have.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Her Ex-Husband and his Mistress?!

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha and Nina stood at the entrance of the food court, prepared to conquer anything edible in their path. And by anything, everything was probably a better term. From Chinese to Italian, the two pregnant women got as much as they could fill their plates with.

Instead of paying for food at each individual restaurant, there was just one checkout station in the middle of the food court. Since Chris was still getting food, Samantha and Nina waddled to pay for their food.

They approached the cashier, who was a blue-eyed brunette who looked to be around 18 or 19. She saw them waddling towards her, and noticed that they both were quite obviously pregnant. "Oh-Em-Gee you guys are both pregnant at the same time? That's, like, totally amazing!" she said in a high-pitched voice.

"Yeah, I guess you could say that..." Samantha said. Her thoughts were interrupted once again. Flip me! the voice rang out. She grabbed the coin and gave it a flip. It was almost becoming a routine for her. Samantha noted that the cashier's name was Kellie, as her badge indicated. Looking into her hand as the coin landed, she saw the outcome.

Tails! No reality change! the voice boomed. Nina payed for their food, as Kellie's face turned pale. "Excuse me, I have to, like, use the restroom. Enjoy your--MRMPH" she trailed, one hand covering her mouth, her other on her stomach, as she ran to the nearest restroom.

"Okay, that was weird." Nina chuckled. "Yeah, let's find somewhere to seat." Samantha said, trying to change the subject. They found a table that would be able to accommodate their growing bellies and took a seat. They ate their food at a speedy rate, as Chris joined them a minute later with a tray with more food than Nina and Samantha combined. He began to devour his food as soon as he took a seat. "Jeez, Chris, I'm beginning to think that you're the one who's pregnant..." Nina said, watching Chris chow down.

Chris let out a nervous laugh. "Yeah...yeah right..." he said, before continuing his binge. Samantha remained silent. Chris was pregnant, and it was pretty obvious. But she had to let him approach Nina about it. She thought that that was what's right. She gave a fake laugh as well. A few minutes later, the pregnant trio finished their meals. As they reached the mall's exit, they gave their farewells.

"Okay, Sammy. I'll call you soon, alright?" Nina asked, one hand on her belly. "Sounds good. See you guys." Samantha said, as they went to their cars. Samantha put the multiple bags into her trunk and drove home.

As she parked in the driveway, Mark and Beth were just arriving home from work. Samantha exited the car and waddled to the trunk, all the while trying to get her neighbors' attention. "Boy, being pregnant with twins and having to carry all of these heavy bags sure is hard!" she shouted, just loud enough for them to hear. "Need some help, Samantha?" Mark asked dryly. "I'd greatly appreciate it." Samantha responded with a smile.

Mark and Beth approached her, and Samantha noticed their own slightly rounded middles, about the same size as it was earlier in the day. They both grabbed a few bags each, leaving Samantha with only two to carry. They took the bags up to the babies' rooms, or what would become their rooms.

Samantha milked her condition for all it was worth, constantly rubbing her belly in front of them. "They're kicking up a storm right now. Wanna feel?" she asked as Mark and Beth were about to leave. "No." Mark said bluntly. "Uh...sure!" Beth said in a somewhat excited tone. Mark scoffed as his wife approached Samantha's belly. She took a few minutes to feel the kicks and punches from Samantha's occupants. "Wow...that was..." trailed. "Too much?" Mark asked, obviously annoyed.

"No...just...I don't know." she smiled, one hand resting on her "bloated" stomach. Mark grabbed Beth's shoulder and led her out of the house, not even giving Samantha a goodbye. The silence afterward was broken by a loud grumble coming directly from Samantha's large stomach.

Her cravings were getting the best of her, and she was craving...

Dylan was the same size as her, so hopefully he'd be in the same boat. But Brooke was bigger than them. What was she having? Twins? Triplets? More than that? Before Samantha could continue to think, the doorbell rang.

Samantha waddled back downstairs, and paid for her food. She brought it over to her couch, and turned on the TV. "Pfft, yeah, like a magical pregnancy could ever happen...oh, right..."she said, feeling a few kicks.

Hey, everyone. Don't forget that tomorrow is the date of our annual parent-teacher conference, so be sure to be extra nice to your students tomorrow! That means you too, Brooke. - Lisa (and Ian) Jacobs, Principal, Twin Hills Elementary School

She knew that her bed would be most comfortable to her, but she couldn't bring herself to walk up those stairs again tonight. Instead, she decided to sleep on the couch. After grabbing a few spare pillows to make her feel more comfortable, she was able to get into a position to fall asleep.

A few faint kicks rolled across her round dome of a stomach, which comforted Samantha. "Good night, little ones. You'll probably be bigger in the morning..."she noted, her eyes slowly closing. "And so will I..."she said, drifting off into sleep.

Samantha was at the center of attention, and she loved it.

Flip me, Samantha

It was perfectly spherical, not a stretch mark to be seen. Brooke tried to push her hand into her rounding belly, but it had no give. Samantha didn't even let Samantha answer, as the bell rang. Brooke pulled her shirt down as far as she could. "See you later, loser." she said, bumping into her with her stomach.

Samantha waddled to her classroom as the children flooded into the room. Samantha stood in the front of the room, as the children stared at her size in awe. "Gather round, kids. I have an announcement to make. I am indeed pregnant." she said, as some of the children's jaws dropped.

"But you were as big as my mommy two days ago. How come you're bigger than her now Ms Peters?" said one child. ''Well, I'm having more than one baby. It's twins. A boy and a girl." "Really?"said Amy excitedly. "Yes really. They're actually kicking right now. Would you all like to feel?" she asked.

Samantha rolled up her shirt as the children approached. The children took their time feeling and rubbing her belly, feeling her children kick. This made Samantha feel incredibly happy and more maternal than she had ever felt. The lunch bell rang, and Samantha waddled her way there.

In the cafeteria, Samantha picked up the tray of a chicken sandwich, tater tots, and sliced fruit, and looked for a table. Surprisingly, Dylan was not there, nor was Lisa. But Brooke was, stuffing her face with the food on the tray, which appeared to be her second one of that lunch. Samantha decided to take a seat next to the large gym teacher. "Hey, Brooke. Where's Dylan and Lisa?" she asked. "They're having a meeting." she said, scarfing down the food. Samantha began to eat her food with determination.

Brooke leaned back in her chair, pulling up her shirt to rub her belly. "Well, it's gonna be tough to lose this weight when the food is so damn addictive here. It's so unhealthy, though."she moaned, rubbing her belly. Suddenly, she jolted upright in a shock. "Wh-what?" she asked, moving her hands around her swollen belly. "Brooke what's wrong?" Samantha asked, concerned. "N-n-nothing...just...this food's trying to digest and it's moving around a bit...I think..."Brooke said, eyes widening. Samantha placed her hands on Brooke's belly to see what the fuss was about. Indeed, something was moving in there, and it could even be seen under the surface of Brooke's tight belly, but Samantha was sure that there was more than food in there.

Brooke is pregnant! But why is she so big? How many kids is she having? she thought. Samantha knew she couldn't have Brooke freak out in the middle of lunch. "Yeah, it's just some bad digestion, I think. It should stop soon." she said, reassuring Brooke.

The rest of the half-day Samantha spent teaching her class. As the bell rang, Samantha waddled to the parking lot. There, Brooke was hitting her car. "Damn it! I hate this car!" she said. "Car troubles?" Samantha asked. Brooke turned to her. "Yes, loser! I...I'm sorry, it's just...I need a favor. Could you please take me to my doctor?"she asked desperately. "Me? The loser? Why can't you get someone else to take you?"Samantha asked, in total control of the situation. "Are you kidding me? Most people here are jealous of me, Lisa has a lamaze class, and Dylan has been acting weird lately. Please. I need you." Samantha sighed, rubbing her belly as her children kicked inside. "Why do you even need to go to the doctor's anyway?"

"I think I'm pregnant."
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Bigger Brooke

choices: On the way, Samantha and Brooke talk
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha was tempted to say no right off the bat. Really tempted. She and Brooke had never gotten along, even before all the awful things the blonde bombshell had said to and about her recently. Her attitude was appalling, her dress was indecent, and her flirtatiousness was infuriating. She also didn't like the way that the gym teacher had been going after Dylan (conveniently ignoring the fact that she wouldn't mind going after him herself). Yes, Samantha had very little reason to say yes to Brooke's request. But any refusal she would have made died in her throat when she saw the look on her face. It was a look full of confusion, shock, fear, anxiety, and more. It was a look of a person who was desperately trying to deny what was happening to them, but was increasingly unable to. It was the look of someone who was afraid not only that their suspicions about their situation were true, but of what the truth would mean for their future.

And, before she had finally come to terms with it, that look had been on Samantha's face too.

For the first time, Samantha felt a great sympathy for Brooke. Not too long ago, she had been in the exact same situation that the woman in front of her was in now. How could she ignore the predicament she was in? And there was the risk of her or the babies (there had to be more than one, given her size, she thought) getting hurt or worse. Even without the feeling of empathy she now had, she didn't hate the woman enough to wish physical harm upon her. No, she couldn't refuse, her conscience (and possible maternal urges) wouldn't let her.

"Yeah, okay. Come with me," she said, waddling off to her car. Brooke stood there for a moment, then followed after her.
1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.title: Samantha agrees to take her

1212121111212212112111211211121222111112.content:
Samantha pulled out of the parking lot as Brooke adjusted the passenger seat. "So...Samantha...how far along are you?" Brooke asked. "To be honest, I'm not really sure. I'm getting bigger every day, but I think it's because I'm having twins." Samantha replied, as kindly as possible.

It was strange to see a different, kinder side to Brooke, but maybe that was her maternal instincts kicking in. Samantha didn't know how long Brooke would be this calm, so she decided to milk it for all it was worth. "How many babies do you think I'm having?" Brooke asked, giving her belly a rub. Samantha tried to reassure her. "Well, we need to make sure you're actually first." Brooke just sighed. "Come on, Samantha! Do you see THIS?" she asked, giving her rounding middle a light slap.

"Good point. I really don't know. I mean, you're nearly bigger than me, so I'd guess twins, at least." Samantha replied, with a weak smile, her children kicking as she mentioned them. "Shit. I can't be pregnant! I haven't had sex in months! And how am I supposed to support a child? Or more?" she huffed. "Who's your doctor?" Samantha asked, trying to change the subject as best as she could. "Kristen Harper." Brooke replied, looking down at her belly. Good, we have the same doctor. Maybe I can talk to her to see why I'm growing so much. Samantha thought.

Samantha and Brooke sat in an examination room, waiting for Dr. Harper to arrive. Minutes later, the door opened. "Sorry, for being late. It's hard to get from place to place with this big belly here!" Dr. Harper said, rubbing her belly for emphasis. Samantha, long time no see!" she joked, then turning to Brooke. "Wow...big...uhhh. So, Brooke, would you mind telling me how you got this way?" she asked.

"Two days ago, I got sick at work, so I went home. I was throwing up, but I was so hungry. When I fell asleep, I had a weird dream. I was pregnant, as big as a house. I woke up in the morning, and I was extremely bloated, and my boobs were bigger. I was still super hungry, and I had weird cravings. Basically all yesterday I stayed home and ate, and I finally decided to go back to work today." she said, taking heavy breaths.

"That actually sounds somewhat in line to what Samantha was saying. Lay down for a moment?" Dr. Harper said, as she pulled over the ultrasound machine that was sitting in the corner of the room. Brooke pulled her shirt up, and Dr. Harper began to apply gel to Brooke's rotund middle.

"Whoa. No wonder you're so big! You're having quintuplets! They look to be around three months!" Dr. Harper said, excitedly. Brooke let out a small yell. She obviously did not want to be in this situation. Dr. Harper gave Brooke a few pamphlets, and sent her on her way. Samantha almost forgot about talking to Dr. Harper. "Hey Brooke, would you mind waiting in the car? I need to talk to Dr. Harper about something." Samantha said.

Samantha opened the door of the examination room, where the doctor was taking a look at Brooke's ultrasound. "Can I talk to you for a second, doctor?" Samantha asked. "Sure, Samantha! What about?" "Do I look...bigger to you than yesterday?" she asks. "Yeah, you do, actually. Let me give you another ultrasound." Dr. Harper rubbed the wand over Samantha's belly. "Huh. The babies appear to be a little over six months along, but they were five months yesterday. Odd. Tell, you what, come back in two days, and bring Brooke along with you. Okay?" Samantha agreed, and said goodbye to the very pregnant doctor.

The car ride to Brooke's house was silent, as she was still in shock. Samantha dropped her off and headed to the mall.

12221.content:
A flash of warmth traveling through her body.

Suddenly, the air seemed to grow heavy around her, the faint smell of dust prevalent, her whole body seemed to tingle with electricity. As the tingling sensation worked up to its peak throughout her body, Nina doubled over and moaned in pain clinching her belly.

She gasped out weakly, “wh what’s happening to me..”

No one around her reacted at first to her bending over in pain not even her husband Chris. Who was standing directly across from her, her belly started to distend expanding as she filled with a babe.

Rushing liquid flowed into her womb, gradually filling her with amniotic fluid her flesh began to round up quickly into a small baby bump. Her chest started to follow swelling up a cup size, nipples hardening and starting to become erect. B tits becoming cupped tighter into her bra, her belly bugles under her t shirt creaking farther into a visibility pregnant swell.

Nina whined weakly in disbelief, her eyes clinched shut a rush of sensation shooting through her.

As milk bloated her breast into a c cup, bra strap getting tighter more amniotic fluid rising her womb. Her t shirt was starting to push up the cloth, climbing forward into five months.

Warmth pooling in her core, a snapping noise echoed around her. A groan of relief escaped Nina, her bra broke apart the fabric ripping in the back, her breast flopping onto her raising belly. They jiggled at a greater size of double DDS, her shirt was peaking up revealing a bit of skin.

Samantha snapped back to reality. She looked at her friend, and noticed that, she was bent over her belly was growing ….growing?!

Her belly was pushing out, breast doing the same at a frightening pace.

“OH my God!”, she exclaimed in shock, Samatha could only watch in horror as Nina continued to expand.

The swollen flesh groaned, more amniotic fluid stretching her outwards into six months. Her womb crawling downwards with the weight from the coming babe.

Distending belly greatly stuck out a clear foot in front of of her, as her t shirt traveled up the length of her swell. Getting caught atop around her navel which poked out halfway into the open.

Nina cried out in horror, “ it’s not stopping! Why isn’t it stopping what is happening?!”

She grew increasingly more swelling into the second trimester, bigger rounder fuller Nina’ s sided popped out again her will.

Her navel thumped out, the baby distending her belly greatly it stuck out proudly atop her taut tight gut. The pink haired teens knees quivered from the oncoming weight.

She grew increasingly more pregnant, swelling into the second trimester, bigger, rounded, fuller Sakura’s sides popped out against her will. Her belly forced her t shirt up higher, it slid all the way the engorged flesh leaving her belly out in the open.

The shirt came to rest heavily under her milk filled breast. Her jeans hugged her wider frame, which were wider thighs plumper to support the oncoming weight.

She moaned shaking hand coming to cradle her engorging mound she was at least seven month pregnant now.
Just from how far her belly was from her body, sweat dropped down her face and her hair clung down on her forehead.

Panting from the strain she was feeling due to her growth, Nina’s eyes slipped open her huge breast taking up her vision.

When had she closed her eyes? Finally her growth was slowing down skin creaking one last time. Her navel thumped out, signaling her descent into eight months pregnant. Her eyes widen in disbelief and horror as the 44 year old woman took in her new form.

She had a huge set of bigger boobs, a wide fat belly rounder sides and a thumb sized navel atop it.

Just then the button on her pants popped off and zipped down as her belly sagged in it conquest for more space. She gasped taking all the changes on her body, breast extremely swollen with what she could only guess was milk.

They sat atop her expansive womb, glass hanging out so wide it could have been a couch cushion.

“Holy hell!” , two voices exclaimed at the same time as Chris finally saw what had happened to his wife. While Samantha tried to grasp what had just occurred to her friend.

She glanced down at the coin in her hand, then back up at Nina’s eight month pregnant belly.

She tried to pull her shirt back down over the swell, but it only slid back up her belly stopping just above her poked out navel.

Which she was rubbing back and forth with her left hand glancing up at her she replied, “ I … I think so, I’m not sure what happened but I think I’m pregnant.”

124.content:
A SUPERNATURAL PREGNANCY.


Samantha flipped the gold coin and in the crowd Samantha saw Inez Taylor, a girl from her high school senior basketball team. Inez was the star player. Samantha hadn't seen her since their class reunion ten years earlier. Amazing that Inez still looked young; her red hair was bright so it must have come from a bottle, but she was as slender as when she played center on the basketball team.

Samantha quickly pushed through the crowd to catch up with Inez who appeared to be headed toward the gate to leave the flea market. "Inez. Inez," called Samantha.

Inez turned around. She saw the older blonde rushing toward her. When she drew closer, Inez recognized Samantha. "Hey, Samantha! I never dreamed I'd see you here, or anyplace other than a class reunion." The two women shared a hug.

Samantha laughed. "I couldn't believe it was you, Inez. You've been on my mind a lot lately." She seemed flustered for a moment. "Oh, gosh, I completely forgot the coin." She looked around. "I just had an old coin and flipped it, but before it hit the ground I saw you. I wonder if it landed heads or if it was tails. Oh, well, it doesn't matter. It was just an old coin I paid a buck for."

Inez smiled. "It must have been magical because I've been thinking of you lately. Let's go have a drink and catch up on things."

"Okay," Samantha said. "Let me tell my friends who I came with so they won't worry about me. Oh, there they are. I'll be right back." She hurried to where her friends were. "Hey, you guys, I'm going for a drink with an old school pal. Glad you brought me here today." She started to walk away. "Oh, you can keep the coin. I'm no longer interested."

Her friends waved and shouted. "The happy face was up so that was good." Not knowing anything about the coin, Samantha didn't know it meant Inez would soon be dealing with being pregnant. She hurried back to Inez.

"Sam, I'm glad you found me today. It's some kind of miracle." Inez drove toward downtown. "Where would you like to go? I like the Rainbow, but if another place fits you better, say the word."

"Oh, the Rainbow bar's fine. I've been there with gay friends at times." Samantha smiled.

Inez was curious. Learning that Samantha had been to the Rainbow might mean something special. "I haven't seen you when I've been there. Sam, have you come out as a lesbian? I have."

Samantha was stunned for a moment. She looked out the side window at some children playing in the park. "Well, I've thought about it. When I think about my life, who I married, my decision to end the marriage, and things like that, I wonder about my heart. Actually, Inez, my happiest years was in high school and being on the team, not just basketball, but softball, field hockey and tennis." She twirled a strand of hair as she looked at Inez. "I had a crush on Jeannie in ninth grade and you in twelfth; but maybe I just enjoyed good friendships. And, I never really felt love's excitement in my heart all the years with my husband. He said it was because I didn't want his kids, but I think it was that I really wanted to be with a woman. I might be a lesbian. What about you?"

"Girl, I know I am. I came out after my thirtieth birthday and have lived happily ever since. Of course, my parents disowned me but I did fine and had a wonderful wife for eight years. She died of breast cancer and I still miss her. This might surprise you." Inez stopped at a red light and looked into Samantha's eyes, "I had a crush on you all my senior year and, my Mary even looked like you. That may have been the reason I fell in love with her when I did."

"Inez, really? You did? Too bad we couldn't act on our girl crush back then. Maybe we'd have gotten together. One thing I'll do right now is to say 'I am a lesbian; always was; always will be.'" She smiled. "Wow, a big weight just lifted off of me. I'm finally free."

Inez and Samantha went inside the bar and ordered drinks. After she took a drink from her glass, Inez put her hand on her stomach. "Excuse me. I've gotta run; I think I'm going to throw up." She hurried to the rest room where she 'lost' her lunch and felt queasy.

Samantha followed Inez. "You look peeked, so white. Are you okay?"

"I'll be fine. Who knows, maybe I'm pregnant." She laughed. "As if that were possible; no man's been inside me; not ever!" Inez stared laughing.

"Oh sure," said Samantha as she laughed with her friend. "Sure, you're a virgin and pregnant. That'd be some kind of miracle."

"Of course I'm not." Inez led Samantha back to their table. "What kind of coin did you say you bought?"

"It was gold and had a smiley face on one side and a frowning face on the other. Didn't meant anything to me."

"Sam, that's the coin. We're pregnant if you looked straight at me when you flipped it. Everyone's been talking about such a coin and we joked about someone here at the bar finding and flipping it. I can't believe this." Inez paused for a minute. "Okay, Sam, we're in this together. You gotta go with me to the doctor tomorrow to find out. There must be a wonderful reason both of us were at the flea market today."

"Inez, you mean we suddenly see each other after all this time, know we're lesbians who had a girl crush on each other and now are bound by the coin. That makes me happy. Wow! Makes me happy." Samantha grabbed Inez, pulled her close and kissed her.

Inez relaxed in Samantha's arms. "Even if the coin thing and being pregnant mean nothing, Sam, I want to marry you and be with you for the rest of my life."

Samantha laughed. "I've heard about the coin but figured it was a myth. How could such a thing be real?"

Inez laughed with her. "Honey! I hope it's not a myth. I'd love to have a baby and to have you as my wife. If wonders can happen, let it be. Let's go home and make heavenly love tonight."

Samantha smiled. "Sounds wonderful! Let's go." She put a tip by their glasses and left the bar hand in hand.

Inez drove to her home. "Welcome to your new home, Sam."

Inside, Inez started dinner. "Sam, even if this pregnancy thing is a myth and I'm not pregnant, I want to spend the rest of my life with you."

Samantha looked into her eyes. "That's what I want. I've never forgotten you and how much I wished we could have been more than friends. I have peace in my heart about acknowledging I'm a lesbian. And, I want to always be with you. What will we name her if she's a girl?"

Inez laughed. "Any name you choose as long as its our middle names; that would be Lou Ann. What if its a stinkin' sweet little boy?"

Samantha laughed. "We can flip a coin, maybe a penny and if it's head, we'll name him Lincoln."

"Sounds perfect."

Inez took Samantha by the hand and led her to the bedroom. "Let's shower together then I want to make love to you. Your first time as a lesbian with a lesbian who loves you."

Moments later, both women were under the warm spray of the shower sharing kisses, hugs and enjoying soft touching as their bodies drew together.

Two days later, Inez went to the doctor and learned that, indeed, she was pregnant. She stopped at the gift shop and bought two little dolls to present to Samantha that evening.

At the end of dinner, Inez presented a wrapped gift to Samantha. "Something special just for you."

When Samantha opened the box, she shouted gleefully. "Wonderful! Wonderful! we're going to be mama's. I love the idea of sharing a baby with you, Honey."

They kissed and went to bed that evening with loving to share and dreams of joy in their minds.

Inez awoke every morning to rush to the bathroom, throw up, then laugh because she was pregnant and was happy to share the baby with her wife.

Quickly, Inez's clothes no longer fit her; strangely she got bigger faster than any pregnancy she had ever heard of. She worried. "Sam, this is too weird. It's happening so fast. What do people say about that myth?"

"Inez, I've heard the pregnancy takes nine days instead of nine months. Maybe we need to buy things for the nursery right away. Let's go tonight." Samantha picked up her car keys. "Let's go to Target tonight."

"Okay, let's do." She followed Inez out the door.

The two mothers-to-be had fun selecting a crib, bathinette, baby clothes and other supplies at Target. The store clerk asked them, "Usually, the mom-to-be brings her husband with her to buy things for the nursery. Why isn't he with you?"

The mothers-to-be laughed.

They stayed up late that evening putting things together in the nursery.

Lying in lovers' arms, Inez and Samantha slept peacefully that night.

The ninth day, Inez began to have labor pains. "Honey, it's time. I'm in labor. Let's go to the hospital. You've got to be with me every minute."

At the hospital, the Admitting Nurse wheeled Inez's to the birthing room. Just before they got there, Samantha told her, "Honey, I need to run back to the car for something. I'll be right back."

She walked as fast as she could to the parking lot, opened the trunk of the car to get a gift she had purchased for Inez. It was something special for the birthmother. Just before she closed the trunk, she spotted something gold and shiny. It was the coin. "Oh my God!" She picked it up and saw it was in fact the same coin so she held it tightly as she walked back into the hospital.

She got upstairs just in time to watch Lou Ann drop from her mother's body. She smiled and whispered in Inez's ear, "Lou Ann is here not." The mothers shared a kiss then reached to touch the tiny little girl placed on her mommy's tummy.

13.content:
Eric Shaffer looked at herself in the dressing room mirror again and gave a contented sigh, no doubt she was on her way up. After months of appearing in ads for creams to fix embarrassing problems, most of which she did not have, she finally landed herself a lead in a film that was due to start filming in a few weeks.

She had returned to her home town to visit her mother and celebrate the exciting news, Erica was in such a good mood she even agreed to take on the role of Juliet in the town’s production of the Shakespeare classic, after the last actress twisted her ankle during rehearsal. She had done this play half a dozen times before, so learning the lines on such short notice wouldn’t be a problem for her.
She had just finished her first rehearsal with the group which also happened to be the first dress rehearsal. She thought that most of the performances by the other actors, many of which had been people she had originally known from school, were pretty poor but she was confident that she would be able to make the show a night to remember. With the opening night just over a week away there were rehearsals most evenings.

When she had finished changing out of her costume and into her regular jeans and shirt, when there was a knock at the door.
“Who is it?” she trilled coyly, some of the guys had been eyeing her all rehearsal, she had no intention of anything more than suggestive flirtation, after all in a few months’ time she would in the company of more attractive men.
There was no answer, “anyone there?” she asked after a while, still no answer.

She got up and swept (something as an actress she spent years learning to do) over to the door and opened it. There was no one outside; she was just about to close the door when something caught her eye. It was a coin, ‘a gift from a fan’ she thought to herself and picked it up. She examined it whilst closing the door, on either side of the coin was a couple of pregnant…’women’ she thought to herself as the alternative seemed impossible.

She finished packing up and was just about to go when a alien thought shot through her head.
Flip me
Erica took the coin out of her pocket, looked at it for a second, then she gave a shrug and flipped it. Time seemed to slow down as the coin sailed through the air before she caught it deftly.
Look Erica said the voice.

Erica looked and saw…

13121.content:
After a moment the sensation past, Erica gave another shrug pocketed the coin and made her way home.

When Erica arrived home her mother, Katelyn, was waiting at the door for her.
“Darling, how was the rehearsal ?” she said embracing her daughter. At that moment it easy to see where Erica got her looks from, as her mother looked a lot like her except slightly padded with age, her red hair was heavily streaked with grey and she lack Erica’s youthful glow.

“Are you ready to go out for dinner?”
Erica started, “I need to finish getting my stuff unpacked.”
“I’ve already done it.”
“Oh, ok,” said Erica knowing that she would never find some of her clothes again.
“I’ve already book at the place,” said her mom not picking up on the tone in Erica’s voice.
“Where?”
“Hungry Joe’s.”
“The all you can eat place? Mom just because I’m on holiday doesn’t mean I can stop my diet.”
“They have a salad bar,” her mother said weakly.
“Good, because you don’t get figure like this,” Erica gestured at her washboard flat stomach, which gave a groan, “without c…ugh…” she clasped a hand to her mouth whilst pushing her mother with the other as she ran into the house.

“Are you ok honey? ...If you’re not we don’t have to go...,” said Erica’s mother through the bathroom door. A couple of seconds later said door opened and Erica emerged her eyes still slightly red.
“Are you ok honey? You were throwing up for quite a while.”
“I’m fine Mom,” replied Erica.
“Are you sure because we don’t ha…”
“I actually feel hungrier than I did before,” said Erica pointedly.

“You never answered me before about rehearsal,” said Erica’s mother as she drove her daughter and herself to Hungry Joe’s.
Erica rolled her eyes whilst remembering this evening's performance, “Put it this way, even as soon as I said I’ll do it I was obvious that was the best performer.”
“Oh,” said her mother, who having raised Erica raised by herself, was a kind generous person, and despite her happiness in her daughter’s success didn’t like how prideful she was. “Did you see Peter?”
Peter was the dark haired, pale skinned, slightly overweight young man who played the piano, he was in the same grade as Erica at school.
“It’s hard to miss him,” said Erica.
“Don’t say that, it’s cruel and he’s only a bit chubby. What about Simon?”
“Of course I saw him, he’s organizing the whole thing and he’s the director.”
Simon was a few years older than Erica, had curly brown hair, wore glasses and had the stressed, flustered attitude that was mandatory for any director.
“I thought he was playing the prince?” said Erica’s mother slightly perplexed.
“He’s doing that to,” said Erica exasperatedly.
“Have you got a chance to see Ashley and see how she going? Twisting her ankle in her first play out of school must been hard on her.”
“She helping Simon out with production and she’s agreed to do the lighting.”
“And she’s ok with that?”
“She’s fine, her nickname at high school was Sunny for a reason, Samantha could do to take a leaf from her book.”
Samantha was the same age as Simon, in fact they were in the same drama class at school together, she was tall thin with pale blond hair, in stark contrast to Sunny who was petite with dark hair, whilst they both have relatively light skin tones their personalities were as different to each other as the rest of them. Samantha was normally quite bitter and snarky before and now she was even more so since she lost out on the role of Juliet not once but twice and was playing the role of Lady Capulet.
“Why is…” Erica’s mother began.
“I don’t want to talk about them, there are just nobodies who will remain nobodies,” interjected Erica, and they sat in the rest of the journey in complete silence.

Erica had trouble at dinner, as her stomach was demanding, quite noisily, that is wanted sustenance then what she was giving it.
“Erica you’re starving yourself,” said her mother.
“I am not,” retorted Erica, her stomach groaned loudly.
“Your body says otherwise.”
Just then….

131211.content:
It was not the groaning from her stomach, that bothered Erica Shaffer, it was the nagging desire to flip the strange coin.
As her mother lectured her about "not starving herself to keep up Hollywood's image of beauty", she fingered the strange coin that lay resting in the pocket of her jeans.
As she ran her finger over it, she could feel every small engraved detail, the two pregnant figures on the front, the deep scratches elsewhere on the coin, the image of the coin blocking out almost all thought in her head.

Flip Me Erica a voice not her own whispered to her in head. It was calm, soft, seductive.

"I know you're excited about getting the lead in that new movie that's filming soon, but you have to Erica. I've seen those photos of other actresses your age online. skinny as a rail, ribcage visible. It's not healthy. You should eat something else other than a salad. You're going to need the energy. The play is in nine days, and then after that you're leaving back to California to shoot that movie." Katelyn lectured, her age and wisdom echoing through her words.

Erica looked at her mother. Time had been semi-kind to her, because despite being in her mid-fifties, the great beauty on her face was still visible, even if hidden behind wrinkles, grey hairs, and sagging body parts.

"Mom, I know. But, I'm okay really. I'm not going to starve myself, my stomach is probably just a little upset from whatever that was this afternoon" Erica says, thinking back to her recent losing bout to vomiting.

What as that? Erica thought, but her train of thought was derailed by another thought that came charging through her head.

Flip Me Erica.

Without thinking, she reached into the pocket of her jeans, grabbed the coin, and placed it into her hand.

"I just want you to be careful Erica. You're my only child, and I'm concerned, especially since you moved away to Hollywood. It's a whole different world out there. I mean, I see you on TV all the time for the skin commercials, so I know you're doing fine, but it's when your commercials are not on that I worry. I watch those reality shows during my lunch break at the bank all the time. I see what's it really like out there. I just want you to be careful!" Katelyn said, her voice ripe with motherly concern.

"Mom, Hollywood is nothing like those tv shows. Besides, what are you doing watching TV in the break room? I thought as manager you're supposed to make sure those slackers are doing their jobs" Erica says with a smart, smug tone in her voice.
"Oh Erica, I'm the HEAD manager for the branch. I'm the queen of that castle, and I decided that a happy worker is a productive worker. So I managed to convince the higher ups that a TV in the break-room would help. They can have their lunch hour and watch a little TV." Katelyn says.
"Yet, it's always on trashy California reality shows?" Erica asks.
"Tracy always gets the remote before everyone else. It's the only rule on the TV, who gets the remote first, picks what's on. Although, I swear the woman must have bought another one, because she ALWAYS has it" Katelyn says with a smile on her face.

Flip Me. the voice commanded her, asking her to do it's bidding.
Finally she did.

Absentmindedly, the coin found it's way onto her thumb, and with a mighty flick, she sent the coin flying high into the air. Without even thinking, she snatched the coin from midair, closing her fist around it.

Look Erica the thought commanded.
She did.

131211112221.content:
Rays of light interrupted Erica's deep sleep. She was lying on her bed, on top of her covers. On instinct, she tried to get up quickly, but she was slightly weighed down. Her previously flat stomach had been replaced by a bloated belly, between three to four months pregnant, if she actually were. Running a hand over her new-found belly, she was surprised that it was very firm.

Erica was shocked that her shirt and unbuttoned jeans could not contain her belly. "Ugh...thank God I don't have rehearsal toda-URMPFF!" she said, clutching her mouth and stomach as a wave of nausea hit her like a truck. She ran to the bathroom in a hurry.

A minute later, she had finished throwing up. I must still be sick...she thought to herself, as her belly rumbled. Making her way downstairs, she saw her pregnant mother at the table, eating a large breakfast. Wearing pajamas, her shirt revealed most of her large belly, as she gave it a rub. "Oof! That was a big one!" her mother said. Mom's really pregnant, I guess. she thought, entering the kitchen.

Her mother looked up from her plate. "Oh, hello Erica. I didn't know you were awake," she said, as her eyes were drawn to Erica's own belly. "Look at you! Still bloated from last night, I see. You should have eaten you dinner!" Katelyn said. Erica glared at her pregnant mother. "I've told you five times I wasn't hungry. But I kinda am now..." she said, as her belly grumbled.

She didn't want to eat much. She COULD NOT gain weight before the play. It couldn't happen. But she was SO hungry. She cooked up a meal of sausage and eggs and joined her mother at the kitchen table. Erica began to scarf down the meal, almost against her own will. Her mother eyed her suspiciously. "I thought you were trying to watch your weight?" she said, rubbing her belly. "I know. I'm going to go to the gym after this to try to work this off." Erica said, patting her belly, which was nearing the four months mark.

"Mom? It's weird, but...yesterday you weren't pregnant and now...well, you are. I feel like I'm going crazy." Katelyn eyed her daughter suspiciously. "As I've told you before, eight months ago, I went on a date. This guy gets me drunk, and the next thing you know, I'm knocked up, and I've never heard from the sleaze bag since." she said, rubbing her belly. Erica thought for a moment. "Eight months ago? I thought that helping me move to Los Angeles eight months ago. You stayed there with me for a month. Besides, you haven't had a date in years." Erica said. "No, silly. You moved all by yourself!" her mother said.

Confused, Erica went to her bedroom to get ready for the gym.

Erica felt self-conscious, it was a feeling she hadn’t felt in years, not properly anyway, she had felt self-conscious about her skin or hair but that was more nit picking, and whilst she felt self-conscious about being bloated in the past but never this much, she felt huge. Whilst she still had a body that many would kill for it was this self-conscious feeling at her belly which caused her to dress in sweats rather than her usual spandex short and singlet.

After covering herself Erica made her way to the gym, the trip wasn’t pleasant one. First even through the thick sweats Erica could feel the seat belt pressing into her belly reminding her how much it stuck out, secondly the seat belt also was pressing into breasts which felt unusually tender, and finally her belly next to the steering wheel was making her feel cramped and bigger then she really was. Even though she felt it as soon as she entered the car Erica wasn’t going to readjust the seat though, that would be admitting to something.

When she got to the gym and made her way in Erica was greeted by a familiar face, “Hi and welcome to…Erica is that you?”
Jules was somewhere between five and ten years older than Erica, with blonde hair done up in a bun and the kind of svelte body that someone gets for living a balanced lifestyle.
“Hi Jules,” said Erica flashing her old membership card and tried to move along before…
“Haven’t seen you here in a while, I tried that cream and…”
“Yes, yes, yes,” said Erica as politely she could (which wasn’t as much as she thought), that was the other embarrassment she had, right now she would only be known for ointments and creams for…stuff, but that had payed off and would soon be forgotten in a few months after her movie.
This embarrassment on the other hand would be dealt with right now, thought Erica whilst mentally touching her belly, she would never really touch it for the same reason she tried not to look at it, plus what if someone notice.
“Do you and help or do you know what you doing?” asked Jules.
“I’m fine,” said Erica.

It didn’t help that Jules was athletically showing one of the guests how to use one of the exercise machine, a metal contraption crossed between a dentist’s chair and something a blacksmith might use.

She left restrooms and to her shock that Samantha had arrived at the gym. Samantha was not pretty but elegant which is an artificial form of pretty, and Erica did not want Samantha to see her like this, especially in sweats.
