The coin works differently for Viktoria
145331112212112211111121212311211.content:
The person that Nicole and Betty were going to see had the unlikely but genuine name of Viktoria von Frankenstein. Nicole always thought that she should have sued her parents over that one, but apparently she came from an old German family that had once been something back in the days of the Holy Roman Empire, and they were quite proud of the name. Viktoria was a genius and the only member of their social circle to take a genuine interest in developing her intellect. She was also a cold, emotionless woman. When Nicole had compared her to a Vulcan, Betty, who was something of a sci-fi nerd, had corrected her and saidthat she was more like a Cyberman. Betty and Nicole had judged that Viktoria would be unlikely to object to Nicole's "Evil Plan", if only because Viktoria cared so very little about what happened to her fellow humans.

Viktoria had also been at Chloe's party, not because she cared for such things in and of themselves, but largely because her mother nagged her to maintain social connections, and her mother was one of the few people listened to, if only because she had to.

The two friends made their way to the university library.

"I've heard she's studying child psychology", said Betty", "although I can't really imagine her caring for a child one way or another. Anyway, she's probably here in the psychology section."

They found Viktoria almost buried in a pile of books, studying one intently while taking copious notes. Viktoria was a petite brunette who might have been pretty, had she cared to be.

Nicole looked at her, and said, "A. Hem."

Viktoria looked up, a severe expression on her face.

"Winters. O'Donnell", she said coldly. "What are you two doing here?"

"Oh, you know", smirked Nicole, patting her bulging belly, "Just looking for books on child care."

"Liar", said Viktoria. "You're both lazy women at the best of times, and in your conditions, coming all the way here for such a reason would be far too much effort. You'd look up whatever information you wanted on-line, or, at most, go to your local library, or perhaps Barnes & Noble. Why are you really here?"

"Fine, you got us", said Nicole. "I'll tell you the truth, but you might find it even harder to believe."

Nicole nodded to Betty, and the duo pulled over some chairs, and sat down.

"Viktoria, the truth is, we've come to consult you on a scientific matter", said Nicole.

"You're right", said Viktoria, "That is harder to believe."

"Look, you're the smartest person we know", said Betty, "and we've found something that we cheerfully admit is beyond us."

"That covers a lot of ground", said Viktoria.

"Why, Freiin von Frankenstein", said Nicole, "Was that sarcasm? Careful, you'll be cracking jokes, next!"

"Your 'scientific matter'", said Viktoria, "Get to it."

"Fine", said Nicole, and told her the whole story of the coin as best she could remember it, from when she'd first found it, up to the present moment.

Viktoria absorbed, the story in silence, and then said:

"Interesting. All scientifically impossible, of course, but even two ignoramuses like you would know that. You admit your respect for my intelligence, so you couldn't possibly have expected me to believe you. So, why come all the way here? Too much effort for a joke that would have too little payoff. I wonder... Of course, the only way to convince me is the way you, Winters, claim to have convinced O'Donnell. Let me see this coin."

Nicole handed the coin to Viktoria, who studied it, carefully.

"Hmm", said Viktoria , "It seems to be made of gold, but I'd need to test it, to be sure. Well, have either of you a mirror?"

Betty provided a hand mirror from her purse. Viktoria held it up in front of her face with one hand, and held the coin in the other.

"You're going to test it on yourself?"

"Yes", said Viktoria. "On the infinitesimal chance that your story is true. I have been developing my own theory of child-rearing. I cannot reasonably expect anyone to give me their child to test my theory on, but if I had a child of my own, I could do as I thought best."

"You'd use your own kid as a test subject?", asked Nicole.

"I believe it would be for their own good", said Viktoria.

This chilled even the relatively amoral Nicole, to the point where she considered trying to grab the coin back. But it was too late!
145331112212112211111121212311211.title: "..University library

1453311122121122111111212123112111.content:
Viktoria flipped the coin, and heard the words....

REALITY CHANGE!

Her mouth dropped open as her body began to tingle all over. Her belly expanded, and her breasts and other parts of her body became larger. She was now eight months pregnant. Her clothing had morphed to suit her new bodily dimensions. Divergent memories entered her mind. Part of her remembered that eight months ago she had tried and failed to bribe a cousin who worked for a sperm bank into providing her with the "material" she needed to artificially inseminate herself, but another part of her remembered succeeding in doing just that!

After she'd sat speechless for several minutes, Nicole nudged her, and said, "Hey, Frankenstein, are you OK?"

"I am experiencing an emotional reaction", explained Viktoria. "'Shock', I think. "It's all true. Good God, it's all true! I'm-I'm pregnant!"

"Well of course you are", said Betty. "You were pregnant when we got here. To be honest, I was surprised. I never imagined you letting a man touch you."

"I didn't", said Viktoria. "I used artificial insemination."

"Betty, don't you get it?", said Nicole. "She used the coin on herself!"

"Very good, Winters", said Viktoria. "Perhaps you're not quite so brainless as I thought you were"

"Thanks so much", said Nicole.

"Do you mind if I use it a few times more?", asked Viktoria.

"Knock yourself out", said Nicole.

Viktoria looked around for a subject. To her left, she saw a tall redhead, maybe around nineteen or twenty years old, sitting at a computer terminal. She had headphones on, and appeared to be listening to an on-line lecture.

Viktoria flipped the coin.

She heard: REALITY CHANGE!

The redhead's belly expanded and her clothing altered. She was now three months pregnant by the looks of her, and didn't seem to have noticed a thing.

Viktoria looked to her right. At another table, a woman in her mid-thirties or thereabouts, of Korean or perhaps Chinese descent, was reading a book.

Viktoria flipped the coin.

Again: REALITY CHANGE!

At first, Viktoria saw no change at all, but when the woman shifted in her seat, she revealed only the faintest hint of a baby bump. She was probably no more than one month along.

Interesting, she thought. I wonder what determines how far along each woman is? Perhaps it somehow reviews each woman's life and chooses the moment at which she was most likely to get pregnant? Foolish to theorize without more data.

At that moment, she heard a familiar voice. She looked up to see a heavyset woman in her late 40's, chatting with a teenage girl who strongly resembled her. They were several rows away, and at such an angle that they could not see Nicole, Betty and Viktoria.

"Who's that?", asked Nicole.

"Hilda Waterhouse, my physics Professor", explained Viktoria. "That's her daughter, Sheila,with her. Oh, I've got to do her!"

Viktoria looked at Hilda and flipped the coin.

REALITY CHANGE!

Hilda grew and grew, becoming downright huge,surely no more than two weeks away from giving birth.

"Wow, that broad looks ready to pop", said Nicole

"I should do the daughter, too", said Viktoria. She looked at Sheila, and flipped the coin, but this time there were no words, no change, nothing.

"Huh", said Viktoria.

"What's wrong?", asked Nicole.

"I tried to use the coin on young Sheila, there, and nothing happened", said Viktoria.

Nicole looked nonplussed, and asked, "Did you break it?"

"I don't know", said Viktoria. "Let me try it again."

She looked at Sheila, and flipped the coin, again with no result.

"Maybe there's something about her", said Viktoria. "Let me try someone else."

She looked around and spotted Angela Perez, a dark-haired girl who was one of her classmates. Not exactly a friend, but someone whose conversation was tolerable. She flipped the coin, REALITY CHANGE!, and Angela was now six months pregnant. Viktoria now had new memories of conversations with Angela about their respective pregnancies.

"No, it's still working", said Viktoria.

"How old is the daughter?", asked Betty.

"As a matter of fact, she turns eighteen tomorrow. Hilda's already let us know that she's taking tomorrow off to spend the day with her. Are you theorizing an age limit, O'Donnell?"

"Uh, yeah", said Betty.

"If it's true, then it must be an arbitrary limit", said Viktoria. "After all, 'younger than she are happy mothers made'", as Shakespeare said.

"Well, if we see her again in a day or so, we could try then and see", said Nicole.

"Yes", said Viktoria. "I can't help wondering - who made this thing, and why?"

"That's what we were hoping you could tell us", said Betty. "You know, in case the government was going to come looking for it, or something."

"No government made this", said Viktoria, "At least, no present-day, terrestrial government. This represents a science beyond current human understanding."

"'Science", said Nicole. "You don't think it could be magic?"

"I don't believe in magic", said Viktoria. "Are you familiar with Clarke's Third Law?"

Betty surprised them both by quoting, "'Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic'."

"Correct", said Viktoria, approvingly. "I'll need to research this."

She took out her smartphone, and took a picture of both sides of the coin, before handing it back to Nicole.

"The 'Evil Plan' you described. What was the point of it, again?", asked Viktoria.

"Just my own amusement", replied Nicole. "And a certain curiosity to see how my 'social circle' reacts when I've changed Chloe's little get-together from a run-of-the-mill 'beach bash' to a 'decadent orgy' at which female attendee got knocked up."

"You have a strange sense of humor", said Viktoria. "It's quite similar to my own. I'd almost like to see that, myself. You're going to try to do all 53 women that were there, without exception?"

"How did you know that number so exactly?", asked Nicole.

"I have an excellent memory, and I've trained to make it as reliable as possible. Let's exchange contact info. I'll send you a complete list as soon as I can. In return, please text me if anything unusual happens with the coin, or if you learn anything new about it yourselves. I'll let you know the results of my research in a few days."

"Great, thanks", said Nicole.

When they'd exchanged info with Viktoria, the two friends returned to Nicole's car.

"Where to next?", said Betty.

Nicole said:
1453311122121122111111212123112111.title: The coin works the same for Viktoria as it did ...

14533111221211221111112121231121112.content:
"Let's go to the beauty parlor", said Nicole. "I feel like getiting prettied up, don't you? Plus some of our intended victims may be there."

"OK", said Betty. "But you're paying."

"Fine", said Nicole. "I owe you that much."

Together, they drove to Giselle's, the most expensive salon in town -but it was worth it. Giselle herself came out to greet them. She was an aging beauty - fifty if she was a day - and one of the most pretentious women Nicole had ever known, but she and her staff did good work.

"Oh, my darlings", she said, "How absolutely wonderful to see you both again! How our can our humble establishment help you today?"

"We're here for the works, today", said Betty. ("The works" meant hair, face and nail treatments.) "My dear Nicole is treating me, today."

While Giselle was facing Betty, Nicole quickly flipped the coin. REALITY CHANGE!, and Giselle was suddenly four months pregnant.

"Quite right, too", said Giselle. "After all, even though we're enceinte, we still must be beautiful!"

Giselle ushered them into a luxurious waiting room, with promises of only a brief delay.

JACKPOT!, thought Nicole. Two of the women in the waiting room were Henrietta van Dijn and Gwendolyn Astor. While Betty made small talk with them, Nicole surreptitiously flipped the coin twice. Henrietta and Gwen each got a REALITY CHANGE! and each became eight months pregnant.

After the other two had been summoned from the waiting room, Betty leaned over and said, "You did those two, right?"

"Right", said Nicole, "And Giselle."

"Why Giselle?", asked Betty.

"Why not?", asked Nicole.

Nicole looked at the big screen TV on the wall of the waiting room. A woman reporter was giving a live report about a traffic accident that was likely to affect the commutes of people who actually had to work for a living. As an experiment, Nicole looked at the reporter on the screen and flipped the coin.
14533111221211221111112121231121112.title: "The beauty salon."

145331112212112211111121212311211122.content:
Nothing happened.

Interesting, it doesn't work on TV images. She sent Viktoria a terse message to that effect, and received an immediate terse thanks.

Soon, Nicole and Betty were called into the salon. As Nicole had hoped, many women who had been at the beach party were at the salon that afternoon. The advantages of having a social circle without much imagination, thought Nicole. Their habits are easily predicted.

By careful coordination, passing the coin back and forth, Nicole and Betty made another dozen women eight months' pregnant: Hanako and Tomoko Tokugawa, Annamaria Dell'Aosta, Jennifer Anastasakis, Ingrid Swenson, Dahlia Svenson, Azalea and Hyacinth Cartier, Stephanie Lincoln-Hayes, Svetlana Orlova, Charlotte Nguyen and Juana Borbon. Including themselves and Viktoria they'd done twenty-two out of the fifty-three women that had been at the party! By the time they were done, wild new memories of the party had come into their heads. Couples had been sneaking off to every conceivable hding place to go at it - a few hadn't even bothered to hide all that much!

Wow, thought Nicole, What's it going to have been like when I'm done?

Finally they were done. As they paid their bill, Nicole gave the cashier a REALITY CHANGE! and a three months along pregnancy as well.

"Wow, we were busy in there, weren't we?", said Betty. "Where to next?"

Nicole said:
145331112212112211111121212311211122.title: It doesn't work

1453311122121122111111212123112111221.content:
Betty was hungry as well, so they headed off to Mastroianni's, an exclusive Italian restaurant. Nicole smiled when she saw two other party-goers, Kathy Stilton and Cathy Fitzgerald - at the next table, with Cathy's mother, Maureen. Two quick coin flips, and Cathy and Kathy were both eight months pregnant.

What the heck, thought Nicole, might as well do the old lady, as well. Another coin flip, and Mama Maureen was four months pregnant with Cathy's new younger sibling.

While they were waiting for their meal, Nicole noticed a pregnant woman sitting at another table. She looked to be maybe about six months pregnant.

Nicole leaned over to Betty, and said: "We didn't do her, did we?"

"No", said Betty. "I've never seen her before."

"OK", said Nicole. "I'm gonna try something, but I gotta check something first."

Nicole got up as if to go to the ladies' room. When she passed the expectant woman, she smiled at her and struck up a conversation of the "So, when are you due?" variety. She ascertained that the woman was carrying a single baby, and was indeed six months along. She then headed on to the ladies' room.


Once she'd returned to her table, Nicole flipped the coin.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221.title: "FOOD! MUCH HUNGRY!"

14533111221211221111112121231121112211.content:
She heard REALITY CHANGE!, and the woman's belly became even larger. Nicole now remembered the woman having said that she was carrying twins.

On a whim, Nicole flipped the coin again. REALITY CHANGE!, and her even larger belly now contained triplets.

Flip! REALITY CHANGE! Quadruplets!

Flip! REALITY CHANGE! Quintuplets!

By now the woman's belly was enormous, insanely large. Nicole decided to have pity on her, and stop while she could still stand up by herself.

Just then, another woman came and sat with the mother of five-to-be. The very expectant mother seemed happy to see her friend. The newcomer was ridiculously thin, and looked even thinner next to her friend. Nicole suddenly had an idea. She looked at the thin woman and flipped the coin five times, watching as her belly grew and grew, until she, too, was pregnant with quintuplets!

Nicole told Betty what she had done, and then texted Viktoria with this in formation, with the same curt thanks in response.
14533111221211221111112121231121112211.title: Something happened

choices: Louis becomes Louise the pregnant woman!
Louis becomes Louis the pregnant man!
145331112212112211111121212311211122111.content:
As they started to eat, they heard a grating voice say, "Hey, careless sluts!" It was Betty's cousin Louis, a tall, heavy-set, sandy-haired man in his late 20's, and possibly the single most annoying man Betty knew. She returned his greeting with a hostile grunt.

He laughed, and said, "I love you, too, cuz! No, no, don't ask me to join you, I know you love me as much as I love you, but I'm meeting someone much more interesting that you two this evening."

Betty glared at his retreating back, let out a long hiss of air, and said, "Coin me. It's my turn to try an experiment."

"Really?", said Nicole, handing the coin to her friend. "I hadn't planned on going there, myself. But, hey, why not?"
145331112212112211111121212311211122111.title: During dinner

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Betty flipped the coin, and heard REALITY CHANGE!

She watched in awe as her cousin's body morphed into that of a heavy-set woman with shoulder-length sandy hair. Louis' 70]'s-relic leisure suit became a far-too-tight little black maternity dress covering a five-months pregnant belly. New memories came into Betty's head of her cousin Louise, who was every inch as obnoxious as Louis had been, only in a slightly different way. She now remembered Louise coming into the restaurant and greeting them with "Hey, fellow careless sluts!", but otherwise there wasn't as much difference as she would have liked.

"Well, that didn't help much. Still, now we know...", said Betty.

"Now, we know what?", asked Nicole. "Oh, did you use the coin on her?"

"No, said Betty, "I used the coin on him."

"Oh", said Nicole. Oh. Ooooohhhh. Wow, that's wild! I gotta try it, gimme!"

Betty handed the coin back to her.

Nicole looked around for a potential target. Finally, she saw what looked like two businessmen having dinner together. They seemed to be discussing something very intently. Nicole looked at the older of the two men, and flipped the coin.

REALITY CHANGE!

Nicole watched in amusement as he transformed into a businesswoman, albeit one that appeared to be about five months pregnant. Nicole smiled – s/he'd changed in mid-sentence, without missing a beat.

Nicole texted this latest result to Viktoria. However, instead of her usual brief reply, Viktoria surprised her with an enthusiastic “REALLY? Could you meet me for lunch tomorrow? My treat!”

Nicole consulted with Betty, and replied in the affirmative.

“I wonder what that’s all about?”, asked Betty.

“Who knows?”, replied Nicole. Just then, their food arrived. They devoted themselves to their food.

When they were done, Nicole said, “So, you wanna hang out tonight, or are you gonna head home?”

Betty thought about it, and said….
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Louis becomes Louise the pregnant woman!

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"I really should see how my Mom is doing. I'll hook up with you in the morning."

"OK", said Nicole. "Tell Bridget I said 'Hi!'."

After dropping her friend off at her home, Nicole went back to her condo. She went on-line to check her messages. Sure enough, there was an e-mail from Viktoria with a list of all the girls who had been at Chloe's party attached. The first eight names - the ones Viktoria had known about - were checked off. Nicole updated the list for the additional girls she had done, and then printed it out for future reference.

She also noticed that she had a reminder that she had accepted an invitation to a baby shower for Tiffany Donne-Forbes tomorrow afternoon at 2:30. Thinking about it, she dimly remembered accepting the invite. Using the coin so many times had re-written her own personal history that she wasn't always sure what was real. Thinking some more, she remembered that Betty was going, too.

She sent a quick text to Viktoria cc'ing Betty: "I've just remembered that Betty and I have to be somewhere at 2:30 tomorrow, is that going to be a problem?"

She received a quick reply from Viktoria: "No problem, we can eat quickly, and I only need a brief amount of your time."

That settled, Nicole thought about what she wanted to do with the rest of her evening. Was there anything else she wanted to do, or should she just veg out in front of the TV?
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Nah, I'm gonna head home."

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole sat down in front of her TV with a plate of snacks.Just as she'd gotten comfortable, she heard her doorbell ring. she gave serious thought to ignoring it, but ultimately decided to go and see who it was. She went to the door, and looked out through the eyehole.

It was...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Someone comes to visit her!

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
The person at the door was her mother, Abigail Winters! Of course! In the world as Nicole had re-written it using the coin,,Nicole and her mother were on speaking times again. When Nicole had been the only girl to get pregnant at Chloe's party, Abigail had seen it as a unique stain on their family name. Now that half the girls in attendance - all of them from good families - had gotten pregnant, Abigail had been less outraged by what had happened to Nicole, and had soon gotten over her initial anger, and had put the thing down to "just the way girls are nowadays."


While it was good to be on good terms with her mother again, it also meant that Nicole got these occasional "I just happened to be in the neighborhood" visits from her mom.

Sure enough, when Nicole opened her condo door, her mother said, "Hello, dear, I just happened to be in the neighborhood, so I thought I'd stop by to see how you were doing, and to drop off a few things for you."

Abigail had brought a bag of groceries for Nicole. Well, Nicole had to admit that the groceries weren't unwelcome.

As Abigail started in with her usual mom talk, Nicole found herself fingering the magic coin. Did she actually want to use it on her own mother?
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Her mother

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
In the end, there was no question about it. When her mother wasn’t looking, Nicole flipped the coin. One REALITY CHANGE! Later, and Abigail’s belly grew until it was obvious that she was maybe about two months pregnant. Oddly, the only new memories that Nicole got told her that she hadn’t seen her mother in about a month.

“Nicole”, Abigail said, “There’s something I need to tell you.”

Here it comes, thought Nicole.

“The thing is – well, I’m pregnant.”

“Really?”. Nicole did her best to feign surprise.

“Really”, said Abigail.

“Wow”, said Nicole, still trying to seem surprised. “To be honest I’m kind of - well, that is…”

“Out with it”, said Abigail.

“Well”, said Nicole, “I didn’t think you and Daddy… well, sorry, but, I didn’t think you two were still, you know, ‘interested’ in each other that way.”

“We aren’t” said Abigail. “He hasn’t touched me...that way… in over ten years. And frankly, I haven’t missed it all that much.”

“But, then”, said Nicole, “It can’t be…”

“His? No”, said Abigail. “It’s not.”

“Damn”, said Nicole. “Does he know?”

“Yes”, said Abigail. “I told him. Even a man as unobservant as he is would have noticed soon.”

“What are you going to do?”, asked Nicole.

“We’re going to divorce, quietly”, said Abigail. “He’s been sleeping with his secretary Jane for years. I’ve had proof for a long time, I could have cleaned him out if I’d wanted to, but as long as he was discreet and didn’t embarrass me, I didn’t care. And of course, it also meant that he couldn’t say much if I ‘amused’ myself occasionally.”

“But this”, she patted her belly, “evens the playing field a bit. Anyway, we’re going to be civilized about it, and split everything amicably. What you need to know is that we’re going to be selling the house. He’s going to be moving into the penthouse he’s kept downtown for ‘late night business meetings’, and I’m going to be moving into the lake house. We’ll be boxing up the stuff you left there. Try and let me know within the next month where you want it shipped to, whether here or storage or wherever. Oh, and if there’s any of the furniture there you always wanted, put your claim in, we’re probably going to be getting rid of most of it.”

“OK, Mom, I will”, said Nicole. “Say, I gotta ask: Who’s the father?”

Abigail smirked, and said, "Let's put it this way: You didn't really think I liked tennis all that much, did you?"

"ISTVAN?", said Nicole. This time her surprise was unfeigned. Istvan was the pro at her mother's tennis club.

He was an attractive, muscular, blonde-haired man in his early thirties.

"Wow, Mom, that's a pretty good score for an old woman like you!"

"I'm not that old", sniffed Abigail in mock indignation. "And there are certain advantages to being 'experienced'. We mature women know some tricks that you young trollops haven't learned yet."

"Trollops"?, thought Nicole. Aloud, she said:

"Have you told him about the baby?"

"Yes", said Abigail, and this time her indignation was real. "The little rat made himself scarce. No one's seen him for a week." She sighed. "Maybe it's just as well. He was fun to play with, but I wouldn't have wanted to marry him, or anything. Listen to this: He said that what first attracted him to me was that I looked like his mother!"

"Ew, really?", said Nicole.

"Believe it or not", said Abigail, "there are lots of Oedipus wannabes out there. He used to make me spank him for being a bad boy!"

"OK, mother, we are now ending this portion of the conversation,"

Abigail laughed. At that. She and Nicole chatted for a while before she finally decided she had to head home.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Yes!

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Before she went to bed, Nicole decided to try experimenting with the coin a little more.

I wonder if it's got a range limitation?, she thought.

She dug out the pair of binoculars that one of her uncles had - for some inexplicable reason - given her as a birthday present when she was little. She turned off the lights in her condo, and let her eyes adjust to the darkness.

First she looked out the window without the binoculars. She saw her next door neighbor, Suzie Whatsherface, in her kitchen, making a snack. One coin-flip, one REALITY CHANGE!, and Suzie was snacking for two.

Nicole went up to the second floor, where she could see farther. She looked outside. About three blocks away, she saw two young women standing next to a car. Two coin-flips, two REALITY CHANGE! es, and both of them were pregnant.

Nicole looked further up the street, as far as she could see unaided. There was...a figure...in the distance. She wasn't even sure it was a person. she flipped the coin. No response. She looked through the binoculars, and saw that what she had thought might be a person was in fact a movie poster in a store window. She looked around using the binoculars. She focused on a woman that was just on the limits of her range of vision, and flipped the coin. REALITY CHANGE! The woman was now pregnant. So, there didn't seem to be a limit except your field of vision.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Before bedtime

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole used the coin on four more random passersby - three women and one man. all became pregnant women after a REALITY CHANGE! She was about to turn in when she saw another woman walking up to her building - it was Beverly Griffiths, who lived in the next unit in her condominium! She'd been at Chloe's party!


Score!, thought Nicole, as she flipped the coin. One REALITY CHANGE, and Beverly was eight months pregnant. However, Nicole was distracted from this by the fact that the coin began to glow brightly, dazzling her. When her eyes recovered, she turned on a lamp, and saw to her surprise that the coin had grown in size! Before it had been about the size of a Kennedy half-dollar, but now it was the size of the old silver dollar that her grandfather carried as a good luck piece. What could have caused this? She thought about it for a while, until it occurred to her that it might be the number of time she'd used it, or the number of people she'd used it on. she did some quick math - if she only counted the two women she'd given quintuplets as one each, then Beverly was the fiftieth person she'd used the coin on. Was that it? what would happen when she hit a hundred?

She texted the information to Viktoria, who, as usual, texted back immediately:

"Interesting stuff, But hadn't better get to bed, Nicki? You and your baby need your rest, dear! love ya, Vik "

Nicole was more stunned by Viktoria's response than she had been by the coin's sudden growth.


"Nicki"? "Dear"? An emoticon? "Love?" "Vik"? For that matter: Concern for another person's well-being? Is pregnancy affecting her brain?

Nicole texted back: "Practice what you preach, little mama! - Nic"

Now...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: More experiments

choices: Stay home until she HAD to go out
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole woke up at 5:00 a.m., owing to a combination of having gone to bed earlier than usual, and needing to pee really bad. Once she was up, she had breakfast, showered, and got dressed. She had hours to kill until she was scheduled to go pick up Betty and head over to Viktoria's for their planned lunch.

She supposed she ought to make some productive use of her time. But how?
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Something else

choices: Nicole uses the coin on her father
Nicole does not use the coin on her father
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
After thinking about it a bit, she decided to go to her parents' house to scout out whether there was any of her parent's furniture that she wanted for herself, and really, to have one last look at the house she grew up in. She drove herself over to the house and let herself in. She wasn't the sentimental sort, but she found herself tearing up a bit as she walked around the place.

When she'd been there about fifteen minutes, she heard someone else letting themselves into the house. Returning to the foyer, she saw that it was her father and his secretary, Jane, a shapely young blonde not much older than Nicole herself.

So, he's been messing around on Mom with her?, she thought.

Aloud, she said, "Hi, Daddy! Hi, Jane."

"Hello, Nicole", said her father. "What brings you here?"

"I had a visit from Mom last night", she replied.

"I see", he said. "Do you...do you want to talk about it?"

"Should I go in the other room?", asked Jane.

"Nah, don't bother", said Nicole. "I'm not up for making a scene right now. I just came to get a look at the place. Mom said you had some of my stuff still here?"

"Yes", said her father, "It's all in your old room. Most of it was already in boxes, anyway. Was there any other of the stuff here that you especially wanted?"

While she was discussing the keepsakes that she wanted, Nicole decided to have a little "fun" with Jane. Walking around the room, she positioned herself so she could see Jane but Jane and her father wouldn't be able to see her hands. She got out the coin and began to flip it.

One REALITY CHANGE!

Two REALITY CHANGE!

Three REALITY CHANGE!

Four REALITY CHANGE!

Five REALITY CHANGE!

Jane's belly ballooned up and her clothing changed, as she was now carrying quintuplets. Nicole, now remembered her conversation with her mother somewhat differently, her mom now gloating about how huge Jane had become.

A wild thought occurred to her: What if she used the coin on her father? If he got turned into a pregnant woman, would her parents become a lesbian couple? what would happen to her - would she become the product of artsem? What if she ceased to exist? Still, part of her really wanted to do it, just to see what wowuld happen.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Go to her parents' house

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole decided against using the coin on her father. Instead, she talked to her father and Jane for a while, and then left to head over to Betty's house to pick her up. She drove to her friend's home uneventfully, and found her waiting.

On the drive to Viktoria's house, Nicole brought her friend up to speed on what she'd done since they'd seen each other the day before. They rang Viktoria's doorbell, and she promptly answered the door. To their surprise, Viktoria smiled at them happily, and said, "Nicole! Elizabeth! Thank you so much for coming!", before pulling them into a group hug, and kissing them both on the cheek.

Flustered, Nicole said, "What a greeting! anyone would think we were friends! Freiin von Frankenstein, are you - have you - did you...did you develop human feelings?"

"Do you know, I think I have", said Viktoria. "And here I thought I was above such things! But all morning, I've been impatient for you two to get here. I think...I think... I think I've started to think of you two as...friends! It's very strange. I've never had friends before!"

"You know, having friends is a good thing, actually", said Betty.

"I hope so", said Viktoria. she patted her belly. "And as for this baby, I find I can no longer think of it as an experiment in child-rearing. I can't wait to hold it in my arms. I want to care for it, protect it, make sure it has everything it could ever possibly need. Is this... is this 'maternal instinct'?"

"Yes, I rather think it is", said Nicole. ""I've had bouts of it, myself."

"Is this how my mother feels about me?", asked Viktoria. "No wonder she was such a pest."

At that moment, her doorbell rang. She answered it, and it was...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Nicole does not use the coin on her father

choices: Shook her head, and handed it back
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
It was her sister, Hiltrud. Hiltrud was one year younger than Viktoria, and not one of her favorite people.

"Hey, sis, can I come in?", she asked.

"I suppose", said Viktoria. "What do you want? Why are you here?"

"I need to get away from Mom", said Hiltrud. "She's in Stalker Mode, and this is the one place I know she won't come. You always complained that I was her favorite, but the price I pay is to have her constantly trying to run my life. You were so smart to be the weird kid that she didn't like!"

Nicole watched as Viktoria glared at her sister. She could almost see steam coming out of her friend's ears. She tapped Viktoria on the shoulder, handed her the coin, and nodded towards Hiltrud.

Viktoria smirked,and..
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Her sister

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
REALITY CHANGE!

Viktoria watched as her sister's belly expanded, until she was four months pregnant. New memories came into her mind of her hearing from her father that her sister had gotten careless with her boyfriend.

Hiltrud was continuing to complain:

"..Ever since I got knocked up , Mom's been in Stalker Mode 24/7. I wish she'd get mad at me, or something, any thing to get her off my back!"

"This is all very well and good, Trudi", said Viktoria, "But what do you want me to do about it?"

"Please, please, please, can I stay here for a while? I'll stay out of your way, I promise - I just want some place to sit quietly. I even brought my own snacks!"

She pointed to a bag that hadn't been there before her REALITY CHANGE!

"Well, look, we're going out now", said Viktoria.

"That's OK", said Trudi, "like I said, I just someplace I can sit quietly. PLEEEEZ?"

"Oh, very well", said Viktoria. "Try not to make a mess. I'll be back in the late afternoon. Lock the place up if you leave before I get back."

She astonished her sister by hugging her and kissing her on the cheek.

"Come on, ladies, let's go", she said.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Flipped the coin

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Once they were in Nicole's car, Viktoria gave her directions to the restaurant where she was planning to have lunch.

"I hope you don't mind German food", she said. "I get periodic urges for the stuff, and this place does it well. Since getting my mother to cook it for me is out of the question, this place fills the need nicely."

The other two agreed that that was fine, especially since Viktoria was paying.

"Any luck with your research?", asked Betty.

"None so far", admitted Viktoria, "but I still have a few sources I'd like to check. Perhaps we could get together at the university library tomorrow afternoon to discuss it? Would you be free around four?"

Nicole and Betty checked their schedules and agreed to the meeting.

They arrived at the Wursthaus, and were soon seated.

"There's another reason I wanted to come here today", said Viktoria."There's a student at the university, Larry Something, his name is. He's been pestering me with 'romantic' atentions and sexual innuendoes since I started school, even though I've made it quite clear that I'm not interested. He's clever, he's never quite done anything that I could bring the police in over, but I'm tired of his harassment. Anyway, he's recently discovered that I like to lunch here, so I have to take action. Ah, there he is, now. The coin, please."

Nicole obeyed. She and Betty did not need Larry pointed out to them. He was a tall, thin, dark-haired, skeevy-looking man with a
pencil-thin mustache, and was wearing a lime-green leisure suit thathe must have found in his grandfather's closet, probably after the old man had died from shame from having such a loathsome grandson.

Viktoria flipped the coin.

"Dammlt!", she said, as their waitress got in the way at the critical moment., and earned herself a REALITY CHANGE! that left her five months pregnant.


Viktoria looked at Larry again just as he noticed her and grinned hisunspeakable grin. She flipped the coin again. One REALITY CHANGE!, and Larry was now a tall skanky-looking woman, rail-thin except for the obvious bulge of her pregnancy. She was wearing a lime-green cocktail dress that was painfully not designed as maternity wear. Vik's revulsion
at this sight was offset by new memories of a life in which she'd never known Larry. She smiled, and then handed the coin back to Nicole. Then she had to explain why she'd had it in the first place, since her two friends no longer remembered Larry. After that, the trio enjoyed a nice leisurely lunch.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Lunch

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
After lunch, they made their to the Ritz-Cowsills, the local luxury hotel, where Tiffany's family had reserved the largest ballroom.

When they arrived, they discovered to their annoyance that the shower was not simply for Tiffany, but was instead a surprise shower for all of the pregnant attendees, the three of them included. They thus found themselves the center of more attention than they would have liked.


However, Nicole couldn't complain too much. Among the guests were included many of the girls that had been at Chloe's party that Nicole hadn't had a chance to use the coin on yet. Nicole, Betty and Viktoria kept busy, and between them, gave twenty-three girls a REALITY CHANGE!, leaving them all eight months pregnant.

For the record, Janet Van Arsdale, Margaret O'Houlihan, Jessica Philpott, her sister Jessamine, Lorraine Braganza, Joyce Hubbard, Elvira Goldman, Moira Pak, Deborah Dinsdale, Odosiaku Nsukka, Indira Patel, Josephine Brown #1, Josephine Brown #2 (two unrelated girls of the same name), Midori Hayes, Rachel Hamilton, Loretta Jackson, Clarissa Davies, Maryam
Al-Qadry, Zinnia Wilcox, Theresa Lee, Mary-Anne Grant, Ginger Summers and Lucille Queen all joined the guests of honor.

Just five to go, thought Nicole. New memories came into her mind: Chloe's party now had been an undisguised orgy, with couples not even bothering to find private places to, well, "couple".

Just for fun, Nicole also handed out pregnancies to Tiffany's mother, two of her aunts, one of her younger sisters, and two of her older sisters. Nicole tried the coin on Tiffany's grandmother, but nothing happened.

"There must be an upper age limit", mused Viktoria. "I wonder what it is..."

During a lull in conversation, Viktoria moaned wordlessly.

"What's the matter, Vik?", asked Betty.

"It's my mother", Viktoria replied.

Elspeth Von Frankenstein approached the table where her daughter sat with her friends.

"Hello, Viktoria", she said, "I trust you are keeping well, for your baby's sake?"

"Yes, Mother", said Viktoria.

Elspeth scanned Nicole and Betty.

"And who are you, and how did you get stuck with my spawn, here?"

"Mother, these are my friends, Nicole Winters and Elizabeth O'Donnell."

"'Your friends'?", said Elspeth. "You have friends?"

"It's quite true, ma'am", said Betty. "We both love Vik very much. She's sweet and generous, and a lot of fun to be with."

Behind her mother's back, Viktoria beamed at Betty. Nicole surreptitiously handed VIk the coin.

"Are you quite well, dear?", said Elspeth, putting a hand to Betty's forehead. "A woman in your condition must take good care of herself, you know."

Viktoria didn't hesitate. She flipped the coin. One REALITY CHANGE!, and Elspeth's belly developed the slight bump of a woman who was about a month-and-a-half pregnant.

Elspeth continued: "I suppose my other ungrateful offspring is hiding somewhere." She patted her stomach. "Perhaps this child will appreciate what I do for it."

"So you're pregnant, Mother?", said Viktoria. "Got Father drunk again, did you?"

Elspeth glared at Viktoria and stalked off without a word.

"Wow", said Nicole.

Viktoria smiled at her friends. Thank you both", she said.

When the shower was over, Nicole drove her two friends home.

"Betty, I have something I want to do in the morning, but I'll pick
you up around 3:30 to go to the library", she said.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: The Shower

choices: "Did you find anything out with your research?
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
That evening, Nicole did some research. She had an idea on how to test the coin's upper age limit, and to cause a little trouble in the bargain. Once her research was done, she ate a light supper and went to bed early.

The next morning, she got up early, ate breakfast, showered, dressed and hit the road. She drove from her hometown of
East Cowsills to the state capital, an hour's drive. As she had determined the night before, the state legislature was in session.

She had printed out the ages of all the legislators. She sat in the public viewing gallery, and, using the information she had gathered, tested the coin on the law-makers,seeing which ones it worked on. In a short while, she had determined that
the coin's upper age limit was 58. It would not work on anyone 59 or older. In the process, she had turned 16 members of the state's legislature into pregnant women. She could have done more, but she was pretty sure that she'd used the coin on 99 people, and she wanted to save the hundredth for when she was with Betty and Vikki. Instead, she texted the results of her experiment to Viktoria, and enjoyed the new memories as they came into her head, and mused on the new political
reality she'd created.

I've got to work out a way to visit Congress, she thought.

She grabbed a quick lunch, and then drove back to East Cowsills. For the first time in her life, she listened to political talk radio on her way home.

Once home, she grabbed a quick nap, and then went to pick up Betty, explaining to her friend how she'd spent het morning.


They met up with Viktoria at the library, in the same spot where they'd met her before.

After they'd exchanged greetings, Nicole said, "Say, there's that Professor Waterhouse and her daughter, I wanna try the coin on the daughter again, now that she's one day over eighteen. Oh, and if it works, she'll be the hundredth person we've made pregnant with this thing, so let me know if you see anything odd."

She looked at the younger Waterhouse, and flipped the coin. She heard the REALITY CHANGE!, and there was a bright flash of light. When her eyes cleared, she saw that the coin had again doubled in size. She looked at Betty and Vikki and saw them blinking in surprise.

"Did you two see that?", she asked.

"Yes", said Viktoria, "and what's more, I heard the voice this time, even though I wasn't the one who flipped it."

"Yeah, me, too", said Betty.

"Look at the Professor's daughter", said Viktoria.

"She doesn't look any different", said Nicole.

"I wonder", said Viktoria, "if the lower age is retroactive?"

"Huh?", said Nicole. "Ohh, you mean because she only turned 18 yesterday, she can't be more than a day pregnant, so no retroactive underage hanky-panky?"

"Essentially", said Viktoria. "I imagine that she now remembers 'celebrating' her coming-of-age with some guy during the last 24
hours. She's probably only a few hours pregnant."

"Interesting", said Nicole...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: That Evening

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Hey, look at the coin!", said Betty. "It's not only bigger, it looks different, too!"

Nicole looked at the coin. The "heads" side now showed the face of a smiling woman who looked a lot like her mother.

"Hey, she looks like my mom!", she said.

Viktoria leaned over to look. "Actually, I think she looks like my mother."

"Really? I think she looks like mine", said Betty.

"Weird", said Nicole. "Let's check out the other side."

She flipped the coin over. It showed merely the outline of the figure of a pregnant woman.

"Well, time to experiment again", said Nicole.

She looked around and saw a library worker, a tall, dark-haired woman in her early thirties. She was shelving books. Nicole pointed her out to Viktoria and Betty, then flipped the coin.

REALITY CHANGE!

The three watched as the woman's belly expanded and her clothing morphed into maternity wear. She looked to be about five months pregnant.

"So, you both heard - and saw - this time?", asked Nicole.

Betty and Viktoria replied in the affirmative.

"No one else seems to have heard or noticed", said Viktoria. "So it seems only we three did, perhaps because we're the only ones who've touched the coin."

"So, anyway, Vikki", said Nicole, "Have you discovered anything in your research?"

Viktoria looked at her, and said...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Something Else

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"It's irritating", said Viktoria, "But I couldn't find any reference to a coin like this, anywhere."

"Wow", said Nicole. "I wonder if we'll ever know where it came from?"

"Your guess is as good as mine", said Viktoria. "It represents a technology far beyond ours, but we can't have any idea of its cultural significance. It could be a vital element in someone's fertility cult, or the intergalactic equivalent of a joy buzzer. Unless and until we find out where it came from and what it is, we have know way of knowing."

"What I wonder", said Nicole, "Is whether it was left here deliberately, or if someone lost it, and if they lost it, will they be coming back for it?"

"That gets back to something we don't know - how important it is. If you got home and realized you'd dropped a penny somewhere, you wouldn't bother going back for it. But if you'd lost a diamond, you would."

"On the other hand", said Betty, "If it was left here, does that mean that who ever left it is watching us now to see what we do with it? And did they leave as a serious experiment, or were they just messing around, like Ryuk in Death Note?"

"Who can say?", said Viktoria. "If they are watching, I very much doubt we'd be able to detect them unless they chose to reveal themselves. Anyway, I'm hungry. Are you hungry? You wanna go get some dinner?"
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "No, not a thing."

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Sounds good!", said Nicole. Betty agreed, so they set off together in Nicole's car.

"Where shall we go?", asked Nicole.


"I have an idea", said Viktoria, "Let's go to Halfbax."

"Isn't that just a sort-themed Bennigan's?", asked Betty.

"It's a little better than that", said Viktoria. "And I'm in the mood for a grease burger and fries."

"Why not?", said Betty. "It's not as though either of us is a health food nut?"

Nicole drove them Halfbax. It was still a little early for dinner, so they were quickly seated.

"Hey, look!", said Nicole. "There's Paulette Colbert and Claudette Goddard. Two more for my list."

Paulette and Claudette had been at Chloe's party. They had been jockettes back in high school - Paulette had been captain of the girls' field hockey team and Claudette had been captain of the girls' lacrosse team. It stood to reason that if anyone they knew would come to a place like this, it would be those two.

Two quick coin flips, and Paulette and Claudette were both eight months pregnant.

"Just three more to go", said Nicole.

"What will you do if you get everyone that was at the party?", said Betty.

"Who knows? I'll think of something. Or maybe one of you two will think of something."

"Could be", said Viktoria.

"Always assuming that who ever owns the coin doesn't show up", said Betty.

"I'm not gonna worry about it", said Nicole. "No point in getting worked up over things I can't control."

While they enjoyed their meal, the three friends took turns using the coin. By the time they were done, six waitresses were pregnant, three waiters were now pregnant women, seventeen female diners were pregnant, and nineteen formerly male diners were now also expectant mothers. New memories came into her head - Halfbax was now famous as a place that catered to expectant mothers. Sure enough, the decor had changed to reflect a "maternal" theme.

"Well, what next?", asked Betty.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: The girls go to dinner

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Say, why don't you tow come over to my place for a bit?", said Viktoria. "I've never actually had friends over before."

"OK", said Bridget.

"Sure, why not?", said Nicole.

"Just one thing", said Viktoria. "How many people have we done so far?"

"Let me check my list", said Nicole. "Oh, I made a mistake. I only did fifteen people at the legislature, not sixteen. So, we've done 148."

"If the coin follows the pattern, it'll change again somehow when we hit 150", said Viktoria. "Do we want to do the next two here, or at my place?"

Nicole thought about it, and said:
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: One thing

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole, Betty and Viktoria set out for the latter's apartment, stopping only at a convenience store to pick up snacks.

With her friends' silent consent, Nicole gave the cashier a REALITY CHANGE!, changing him into a pretty girl with a belly indicative of three months' pregnancy.

That left one "victim" to go until 150.

Once they got to Vik's home, they debated who their next subject would be. Since no one came to mind, they looked out the front window. The first person they saw was a short, rail-thin girl with pigtails.

"Do her!", said Viktoria.

"Why?", said Nicole. "It'll never work on her, she can't be a day over twelve. She looks like she should be wearing a Brownie uniform."

"I know what she looks like, Nic", replied Viktoria, "but I happen to know that she's older than we are, twenty-five, in fact. She's just one of those women that's going to be carded until she's forty."

Wow", said Betty. "It must suck to be her age and know that you're never going to have any boobs to speak of."

"Well, let's see what we can do for her", said Nicole, flipping the coin. There was a flash of light and a REALITY CHANGE!, and when their eyes cleared, they saw that Vik's neighbor now looked like a twelve year-old who had somehow swallowed a watermelon whole.


When they looked at the coin, they saw that it had only gotten a little bit bigger, but that the woman's image on the "heads" side now was three-dimensional and quite realistic. In fact, it looked alive! On the "tails" side there was now an intricate symbol that none of them recognized. Viktoria took the coin and scanned the symbol into her computer.

"I'll research this later", she said, "but I have a sneaking suspicion I won't find anything."

"I wonder if we can do anything new with the coin?", asked Betty.

A thought came into Nicole's mind.

"Hey, Vik, turn on the TV, and put on a news channel, something likely to have a live report."

Vik complied, and the English language service of the NHK appeared on the screen. A young woman presenter was interviewing members of an Osaka-based lesbian support group.

Nicole looked at the presenter and flipped the coin. To her delight, there was a REALITY CHANGE! and the young interviewer was now four months pregnant.

"Well, that's something new", said Nicole.

The three friends took turns with the coin, and soon, seven of the Osaka lesbians were now expectant mothers. Nicole and her friends flipped channels excitedly, and soon seventeen TV journalists (eight born women and nine former men) were now "enjoying" various stages of pregnancy.

"Say, I wonder if this would work over Skype, or whatever?", asked Betty.

"One way to find out", said Nicole. "Where's your computer, Vik?"

Viktoria led them to her computer desk.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "At your place"

"This will work out well", said Viktoria. "I was planning to reach to one of my on-line friends this evening, anyway. Sheila's a woman I met through a physics discussion group. We initially started out discussing quantum mechanics, and became friends. She's really my only friend besides you two. She lives in Sydney, Australia, is in her early thirties and is married to a marine biologist. I thought of her because she's mentioned in the past that she and Steve have been trying to have a baby, but without much success. So, we'll be doing her a favor. Let's see, it's about 10:00 a.m. down there, so she should be available."

Soon enough, Sheila's face soon appeared on Vik's computer screen. Nicole listened as Viktoria chatted with Sheila. Sheila was pleasant woman, who sounded to Nic more like an educated Englishwoman than what Nicole would have thought an Australian would sound like. As Viktoria introduced her and Betty to Sheila, Nicole flipped the coin. One REALITY CHANGE! later, and Sheila was excitedly telling Viktoria about how she had just found out that she was two months pregnant. They had a nice conversation, focused largely on the travails of impending motherhood.

Afterwards, Nicole yawned. "Wow, I'm beat", she said.

"Me, too", said Betty. "I'm not even sure I can stay awake to drive home."

"Why don't you two stay the night?" said Viktoria. "I've got guest rooms in this place I've never used, but they should be quite comfortable."

Betty and Nicole thought about it, and.

Nicole and Betty both decided to stay. They didn't have anywhere they need to be in the morning. Viktoria found some robes they could change into, and they settled in for an evening of watching television and just generally hanging out. They didn't use the coin again, until the eleven o'clock news came on, and they used it to make six more newscasters into pregnant women. Eventually, they turned in.

As they ate breakfast the next morning, Viktoria said, "I have to go in to school this morning, what are you two up to today?"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:

"My first class is at ten, so I'll need to leave soon", replied Viktoria.

"Say, Betty", said Nicole. "Let's go in with her. You know, the science building there is named after my great-grandfather. I always meant to go take a look at the place."

"OK", said Betty, "But I wish we had a change of clothes with us."

"I've got some stuff you can wear", said Viktoria. "Since I've been pregnant,, I've had people sending me maternity wear, and a lot of it is the wrong size. Some of it is bound to fit you two."

The trio rummaged around, and found some clothes that fit, more or less. There weren't the height of fashion, but it was comfortable.

"Do you two ever wish you'd gone on to college?", asked Viktoria

"It's true, Bet", said Nicole, affectionately. "You are a moron."

Betty laughed, and gave her friend an affectionate punch on the arm.

"OW!", said Nicole, then, smiling and rubbing her arm, she said, "As for me, my dad wanted me to go to school, but I'm way too lazy. I hated every minute of school, and couldn't wait to get out of it. If I need some thinking done, I'll pay someone."

"Alright", said Viktoria. "Are we ready?"

The three agreed to meet outside the cafeteria at one. Once Viktoria had headed off to class, Betty said, "OK, what shall we do first?"

Nicole thought about it, and said...

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole and Betty got directions to the science building from a passing student. As a "reward", Nicole flipped the coin and gave the helpful student a REALITY CHANGE! that left her four months pregnant.

The directions led them to an impressive-looking building which bore a sign proclaiming it the "Hiram P. Winters Memorial Science Building".

"Was he a scientist, your great-grandfather?", asked Betty.

"Oh, good God, no", said Nicole. "Just a rich guy who liked showing what a great 'patron of education' he was. There's supposed to be a portrait of him in here somewhere. I wonder where it is."

She accosted a passing student, who gave her directions to the science library on the building's second floor. This student, a weedy-looking young man, also received a REALITY CHANGE! from Nicole, being transformed into a weedy-looking young woman who was seven months pregnant.

Nicole and Betty rode up to the second floor in an elevator so ancient that they thought it must have been installed by Fred Flintstone, and powered by a dinosaur on a treadmill. They got into the library and saw that there were six students there. When Betty saw Nicole take out the coin again, she said, "Hey, let me play!"

Nicole shrugged, and handed Betty the coin. One by one, Betty gave the six students a REALITY CHANGE!, and soon, everyone in the library was pregnant.

"There's Great-Grandpa", said Nicole, pointing to a portrait hanging on the far wall. Betty looked at it critically. Hiram was a stuffy-looking fellow, wearing early Twentieth Century clothing.

"I can believe that's one of your family", said Betty.

"How so?", said Nicole.

"He's got that same smirk you get when you think you've had a good idea."

"Hah!", said Nicole. "We're full of good ideas in my family."

"Well, your family's full of something, anyhow", said Betty, laughing.

They looked around the science library for a while, until it was around eleven.

"Where to next?", said Nicole.

Betty said...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Let's go see the science building."

"OK", said Nicole.

"Really?", asked Nicole. "Where?"

"It's a surprise", said Betty. "Just get as much rest as you can during the middle of the day, because the three of us are going out tomorrow night."

"Alright, fine", said Nicole. "Ah, here's the gym."
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "The gym"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
As Nicole and Betty approached the gym, they stopped to watch two young women sprinting around the track. They had the lean, muscular frames of experienced runners, and didn't have an ounce of fat on them.

"Those two need to slow down and enjoy life", said Nicole. She flipped the coin twice, giving them each a REALITY CHANGE!. One after the other, they went from swift running to leisurely walking, as their bellies expanded until one was three months pregnant and the other five.

"There, that's better", said Nicole.

Inside the gym, they saw three girls - one with black hair, one blonde, and one whose hair was dyed purple - watching and critiquing as a fourth girl, a redhead, used the parallel bars.

"I wanna try something", said Nicole. She looked at the redhead, and flipped the coin. When the REALITY CHANGE! hit, the redhead disappeared from the bars and reappeared - now eight months pregnant - where the blonde girl had been standing. The blonde girl reappeared on the bars.

Nicole flipped the coin again, and this time, the now-pregnant blonde girl switched places with the black-haired girl. Another flip, and the black-haired girl switched places with the purple-haired girl. A fourth flip, and all four gymnasts disappeared.


"Where'd they go?", asked Betty.

"Well, think about it. The coin doesn't just make people pregnant, it re-writes lives. Since all four of them are pregnant, they wouldn't've come here to use the parallel bars. They're off somewhere doing something else. Speaking of which, where shall we go next?"
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Before they go into the gym

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Get something delivered."

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole decided to turn in early after an hour of watching TV. The next morning, she got up early, bathed and had a quick breakfast. She drove to the Overseas Arrivals area, and soon spotted Boadicea Josephine Worthington-Bailey. Boadie was eighteen years old with long blonde hair She looked like a princess trying not very hard to disguise what an Important Person she was. She was accompanied by a bored-looking man in a chauffeur's uniform, and a tired-looking woman in a maid's uniform.

"Hey, Boadie", she said. "Waiting to pick up Glory? She's coming back from France today, isn't she?"

"Oh,hi, Nic", said Boadie. "That's right. What brings you to the airport, today?"

"Oh, I was just bored", said Nicole. "So I decided to come in and look at the airport."

"Ah,Nicole", said Boadie, "You put the 'idle' in 'idle rich'."

"Too true", replied Nicole. "You must admit, it's nice not having to do anything you don't want to do."

While she chatted with Boadie, Nicole grasped the coin in her pocket, and gave Boadie a REALITY CHANGE!, watching with quiet amusement as Boadie's belly expanded until she was three months pregnant. The maternity clothing she was now wearing was the most elegant Nic had ever seen. Another REALITY CHANGE!, and the chauffeur was now a chauffeuse with only the slightest of baby bumps. One more, and the maid was now seven months pregnant.

Nicole and Boadie chatted until her sister's plane began unloading its passengers. If Boadie looked like a princess, her older sister, Gloriana Roxanne Worthington-Bailey looked like a queen. Nicole gave her a REALITY CHANGE! the moment she saw her. Glory's baby bump indicated a two-month pregnancy. Nicole gave a REALITY CHANGE! to Glory's personal maid, another to Glory's friend (Beryllium or something, Nicole couldn't remember), and {her/i} personal maid.

Nicole chatted with the sisters briefly, and then left them to their reunion.She wandered around the airport for a while, using the coin on another nineteen people - some travelers and some airport employees - before deciding to leave.

Shall I go home and rest up for whatever Betty's surprise is tonight, or shall I go do something else?, thought Nicole
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Go to bed

choices: "I am the Spirit of the Coin!"
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole went home and had an early lunch.Then she sat down in her favorite chair and snoozed for several hours. Around four, she got up and started getting ready. Betty and Viktoria came to her apartment. They had brought dinner with them. After they ate, they got ready to leave for the "surprise". Betty insisted on driving, and Viktoria insisted on blindfolding her.

After a ten minute ride, Viktoria whipped off the blindfold, and said, "It's a little early, but 'Happy Birthday!'"

Nicole gasped when she saw they were at the Opera House.

"Oh, my God, you got tickets for this show!"

The show in question was a one-night appearance by the Atherton Women's String Quintet,Nicole's favorite musical group.

"Oh, wow, thank you so much!", said Nicole, hugging her friend.Betty smiled. She had actually gotten tickets for herself and Nicole months ago. When they had become friends with Viktoria, she had used a desperate combination of bribery and coercion to score a ticket for her, as well. She knew Vik wouldn't have complained at being left out, but she had wanted to include their new friend.

"Say", said Nicole, "What does this have to do with Astrid and Raylene?"

"Oh", said Betty. "I happened to know that they were coming to the show tonight. In fact, there they are now."

She pointed to the two approaching young women. In her mind, Betty had often compared Astrid Lang and Raylene Ayanami to the anime characters Asuka Soryu Langley and Rei Ayanami, and not just because of the similarities in their names, Astrid was tall, with fiery red hair. Fortunately, she did not have Asuka's fiery temper. Raylene looked l just like Rei, even down to dyeing her hair light blue. However, her heavy Texas accent kind of spoiled the illusion.

Raylene spotted them first, and said, "Howdy gals, how you doin'?"

Nicole shared a smile with Betty and Viktoria, and Astrid and Raylene soon received a REALITY CHANGE! each. Soon both women were eight months pregnant. Nicole had completed her plan at last! Thanks to her, every girl who had been at Chloe's party was pregnant. New memories came into her head. the party had been an unabashed orgy, with people going at it shamelessly without the least concern as to who was watching. The neighbors had called the police, and only the fact that between them the girls' families pretty owned the city had kept the story out of the news media.

The five women chatted for a while, and then went in to the show. Nicole enjoyed the show immensely, but couldn't resist using the coin on the five musicians. At the end of the concert, the group's leader said, "This will be our last live show for a while. As you can see, we've been 'busy' off-stage. But don't worry, we'll be back as soon as we can after our babies are born."


After the concert, there was a brief get-together where some of the attendees - Nicole, Betty and Viktoria among them - got to meet-and-greet with the musicians. Nicole was overjoyed to actually get to speak with her idols. That didn't stop her from using the coin on the group's agent and two of their "roadies".

"Stopping there?", asked Betty, when she saw Nicole put the coin away.

"Yeah", said Nicole. "We're at 249. I'll wait to do number 250 when we're alone and can focus."

After the get-together, Betty and Viktoria went back to Nicole's condo with her.

"So, you ready for 250?", asked Nicole.

The other two assented. Nicole handed the coin to Viktoria. "Here, you do one!"

Viktoria accepted the coin, and walked over to the window and looked out. Her eyes lit on a young couple who were kissing passionately in a doorway across the street. Viktoria focused on the man, and gave him a REALITY CHANGE! and then there were two girls kissing, one of them very pregnant.

She turned, and the three of them looked at the coin. It was now the size of a dinner plate. The woman on the "Heads" side spoke, and this time, the trio heard her voice. She said:
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Go home

choices: "I hope you two don't mind sharing a bed."
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
The Coin's voice was warm and melodious. The three friends instinctively wanted to trust it.

"Who are you?", asked Viktoria. "What are you? Who made you? What are you for?"


"I don't know", said the Coin. "I have been locked away for so long, my own origins are lost in the mists of time. I sometimes have flashes of memory, memory of a time when I had a physical form like yours, but I do not know how I came to be as I am now."

"We've noticed that for every fifty people we use you on, you grow larger and more powerful. Is it possible that if we use you enough, you might become human again?"

"Possibly, I really do not know."

"Say, ladies", said Nicole,"Why don't you two stay the night, I've got clothes you can wear. Tomorrow's Saturday, so you don't have school tomorrow, Vik."

The other two assented.

Nicole left the coin on her dining room table, and led Betty and Viktoria to her guest room, where she said:
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "I am the Spirit of the Coin!"

choices: Keep using the coin, and be cautious
Explain their concerns to the coin
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Nicole waved Betty and Vik to sit down on the bed while she got more blankets out of a closet.

"What do you tow make of what Coinie said back there?", she asked.

"You think she was lying?", asked Betty.

"Maybe", said Nicole. "It's hard to say."

"I suppose it's possible she could be using us", said Viktoria. "Maybe has been all long."

"But why?", asked Betty. "What could she want?"

"Who knows?",said Nicole. "It might not even be a sinister reason. I suppose she might be playing her cards close."

"What do you think we should do?", asked Betty.

"Well", said Viktoria, "I can see three possibilities: One, we can just stop using the coin. Lock it away, somewhere. Two, we can keep using it, and see what happens, being as cautious as we can. Or three, we can explain our concerns to her and see what she says."

They talked it over, and decided to...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Ladies, let's talk."

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
The three friends went out to where Nicole had left the coin.

"Coinie", she said, "We need to talk."


"I know", she said. "In the interests of honesty, I should tell you, I can read your thoughts, probably because we've spent so much time together. I understand your concerns, but I don't know what to tell you. I know that I'm not lying to you, but I currently have no way of proving that to you. I'm grateful to you for using me so much, you've helped me become strong enough to think and speak again. I truly don't know what will happen if you continue to use me. Given what's happened so far, I suspect I'll become strong enough to free myself from my current form. I hop that I'll also remember who or what I am, and how I came to be. Right now, I'm still in your power, and am subject to your judgement. I won't pretend: I want you to keep using me, I want to become stronger. The only thing I can promise you is that it becomes within my power to do so,, I will reward you the best way I can."

"OK", sighed Nicole. "So we're back to this decision: Do we continue to use Coinie, or do we stop now?"

"Maybe we should sleep on it"., asked Betty.

In the end, they...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Explain their concerns to the coin

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content: Nicole said, "Coinie, we've decided..."
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Decided right away

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"We'll be careful - at least to the extent that we can - but we all admit that we're way too curious to see what happens next."


"Speaking of which", said Betty, "Apart form being able to talk to Coinie, I wonder if there's anything new we can do with the latest 'upgrade'?"

"Dunno", said Nicole. "I'm kind of 'coined out' for the evening. Shall we wait until tomorrow? What do you think, Vikster?"

Viktoria thought about it, and said...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "To go on using you"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Sorry, Coinie", said Nicole. "Looks like you'll have to wait."

"It's alright", said the coin. "I've waited this long, I can wait a little longer."

The three friends settled down to chat for a while, having the sort of "sleepover" they hadn't had since high school.

"Say, tomorrow being Saturday, you don't have school or anything, do you, Vik?", asked Nicole.

"No", replied Viktoria. "Tomorrow's my relaxation day."

"How about you, Bet?" asked Nicole.

"No, I'm free", said Betty. "What'll we do?"

"How about we..."
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Let's wait until tomorrow."

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
the next morning, the three friends slept in late, and then had a leisurely breakfast. They stopped by Betty and Viktoria's places so they could pick up a few things. Nicole actually got all domestic and packed a picnic lunch.

They got to the beach, settled down into a comfy spot. They chatted a bit, and then Nicole took the coin out of the bag she'd been carrying it in.

"OK, Coinie", she said, "Let's see what's new."

Nicole looked around for potential subjects/victims. Twelve girls playing beach volleyball caught her eye. She'd intended to do them one by one, but when the coin twitched, all twelve young women got a REALITY CHANGE! at once! The volleyball equipment disappeared, and all twelve of them - now all heavily pregnant, were sitting down chatting and eating snacks.

"Hey, we can do multiples at once now", she said. she Betty, and Viktoria took turns using the coin on random beachgoers, until they had done 37 in total between them.

"That's 299, total", said Nicole. "The next one's gonna be 300, and somehow I feel that's gonna be a big one."

She looked around the beach. Their particular looked like a pod of whales had beached themselves there.

"Well, ladies", she said, "Are we ready to take the next step?"

The three friends talked it over, and the general consensus was...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Go to the beach?"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Even though it was a little early for lunch, the three friends set to with gusto. Afterwards, Nicole said:

"OK, ladies,no more delays. Here comes number three hundred."


She looked around, and fixed on a lifeguard, sitting on his chair. Coinie twitched in her hand. She just saw the lifeguard begin to transform, and then there was a soundless explosion of light, and...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Let's have lunch first!"

choices: "...I can tell you who I am!"
"...I can carry out my plan to save this world!"
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
When their eyes cleared, the coin was gone, and the three friends saw a woman standing before them It was Coinie, in the flesh!

For the briefest of seconds, Nicole had the impression that Coinie was nude, but then a modest one-piece bathing suit materialized around her body. Even as a live woman, Coinie still had the same effect of looking like everyone's mother at the same time. Oddly, no one but Nicole, Betty and Viktoria seemed to have noticed Coinie's sudden appearance.

Coinie gave the three friends a dazzling smile. "Oh, thank you, so much!", she said, wrapping them in a bearhug, and kissing them each on the forehead.

For Nicole, it was like the warmest, most joyous maternal hug she'd ever had, multiplied by a million. Tears began to run down her cheeks as she felt a wave a filial affection for Coinie, more even than she'd ever felt for her own mother. Judging by the tears on Betty and Nicole's faces, they felt likewise.

Finally, Coinie kissed them each again, and released them from her embrace.

She smiled again, and said, "Now that I'm free..."
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Coinie is free!

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Coinie motioned for the three friends to sit down. A fourth beach chair had appeared, as if from nowhere, and Coinie sat down in it.

"Where to begin?", she said.

"At the beginning?", said Betty..

"The beginning was a long time ago" replied Coinie. "Longer than time, really, as you understand time. You see, I'm a member of a race that originated in the universe before yours, before what you call the Big Bang."


"Before the Big Bang?", asked Viktoria.

"Yes", said Coinie. Universes come and go, rise and fall, are born and die. Our universe lived before yours, and there was a universe before ours. Possibly any number before ours. Someday your universe will end, and another will succeed it,and another after it. Anyway, my species evolved in the universe before yours. We were genetically identical to you humans - or rather, you're genetically identical to us. I'll get to that in a moment. At any rate, our race evolved over millions of years, becoming incredibly powerful, with vast psychic powers, powers that might seem god-like to less-developed beings. Time passed, and we came to understand that our universe was drawing towards its end. Many of our race were resigned to this, believing that things had a natural beginning and a natural end, and that our end time had come. But a few of us decided we wanted to live on, so we developed a way to project ourselves outside of space-time. We survived the end of our universe and the beginning of yours. We emerged into the new universe and began to explore. In time, we found the world that would become your Earth. At the time, it was lifeless and primitive. Our leader proposed that we jump start the beginning of life on your world, plant the seeds of life as it had been on our old world, so that in time, a race like ours - a race that would be genetically identical to what we had once been, would arise. However, one of us objected to this plan."

"You?", asked Nicole.

"Me", replied Coinie. "I said it was pointless merely to recreate the same race all over again. I wanted us to try something new!"

"Like what, Coinie?", asked Betty. "Say, do you mind us calling you 'Coinie'? Do you have a real name?"

"'Coinie' is fine", the elder being replied . "I don't really have a name as you understand it. My people know each other by our brain patterns. Anyway, I told our leader that it was foolish to create a race that reproduced sexually. Just as you have, in our primitive days, we had endless trouble over sex. Men fighting over women, women fighting over men, men oppressing women, people oppressing people they thought of a 'sexual deviants'. How much better it would be to have a world where people reproduced asexually! The leader condescended to put my idea to a vote, but they all voted against me. I was so angry."

"What did you do?", asked Nicole.

"I attempted to sabotage their plan", said Coinie. "I got caught. They condensed my entire being down into what looked to you like a coin."

"Oh, my God!", said Betty. "Did it hurt? What did it feel like?"
"No", said Coinie. "I didn't feel a thing. My mind was entirely shut down. Their idea of mercy. I was placed in a special container, and left at the scene of my 'crime'.
