I would remain sealed away and 'shut down' until their experiment - the human race - came to fruition. I would be freed, and shown how well the experiment I had opposed had succeeded."

"I take it you weren't supposed to be freed yet?", asked Nicole.

"No", said Coinie. "Seismic shifts over the millennia damaged the container I was stored in. Even our technology isn't perfect. Eventually, I must have been knocked loose, and kicked around util you found,me, Nicole."

"I remember having an urge to pick you up and flip you", said Nicole.

"I'm sure that was my mind reaching out to you on an unconscious level", said Coinie. "And the transformations and the pregnancies were me carrying out my deepest desire, to make this world what I want it to be. I'm afraid I manipulated you three on a subconscious level, making you want to use me more and more. Sorry about that, it wasn't deliberate. But each time you did, I grew a little stronger, and woke up more and more. It was only when I was freed that I really understood what had happened."

"Will your people realize what happened?", asked Betty.

"There's a good chance, yes", said Coinie. "I've no idea where they are. They're not in this galaxy, I'd know it if they were., but I've no way of telling how far away they might be, so it's best I get on with my plans. Fortunately, it won't take long."

"Does it matter?", asked Nicole. "Won't they just undo whatever you do anyway?"

"No", said Coinie. "You might, but they wouldn't. Disrupting an experiment is a big crime with us, remember? If they catch me, they'll punish me for disrupting their experiment, but they won't disrupt my experiment. To them, that would make them as 'bad' as they think I am. So, all I have to do is present them with a fait accompli, and no matter happens to me, Earth will be the Paradiise I always knew it could be!"

"They won't kill you, will they?", asked Betty.

"No, probably just lock me up again, someplace more secure this time. Anyway, while they might not be here for a thousand years, they might be here in an hour, so I'd better get my but tin gear, as you folks like to say."

"Wait, Coinie, what are you going to do?", asked Viktoria.


"Watch and see", said Coinie. She gestured, and....
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "...I can tell you who I am!"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
A circle of light expanded from Coinie's, growing larger and larger until it had vanished beyond the horizon.

"Coinie, what did you do?", asked Nicole.

Coinie smiled and sat down again. "What I always wanted to do - created my asexual paradise. I've turned everyone on Earth that wasn't already a woman or girl into a woman or girl. Every woman from 18 to 58 who wasn't already pregnant is now pregnant. Everyone under 18 will become pregnant the day they turn 18. Everyone that lives will know the joy of being a mother without any need for sex, or any of its associated hang-ups. Don't worry, I've cured all their physical or mental disabilities, and eliminated all hereditary diseases and conditions. Everyone's baby will be born healthy in mind and body. There will never again be what you called 'birth defects'. And of course, their babies will all be daughters. I've introduced special 'regulators' into humanity's DNA. Everyone will have at least one daughter, but women will have additional children as needed to keep the population at needed levels. Be happy! Never again will you suffer the disruptions caused by gender. Also, I've re-written everyone's memories - except for you three - no one now remembers that there ever was such a thing as men. For them, an asexual world is how it's always been"

"You know", said Nicole, "Some of us liked men. Some of us liked sex."

"Yeah", said Betty, "You've taken all the romance out of the world!"

"I know, dears, it'll be hard for you three", said Coinie. "But you'll see. It'll be a much better world. There'll still be love and romance of different kindsin the world, just a lot less of the madness that sex and lust brought. Anyway, I better get a move on, I can sense that my 'friends' are on their way. But before I go, I've got to give you three your rewards for freeing me!"

"What rewards?", asked Viktoria.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Coinie makes big changes

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Coinie grabbed the three of them in a big hug, and kissed each of them on the lips. As Coinie kissed her, Nicole felt....something...pass into her. Judging from the expressions on Betty's and Viktoria's faces, they'd felt something similar.

"What did you do?", asked Viktoria.

"Oh, I just planted some seeds", said Coinie, stepping back from them.

"What does that mean?", asked Betty.

"You'll see", said Coinie. With a wink, she disappeared. No one but the three friends seemed to notice.

"Well, great", said Nicole. "I really wish I could have a drink right now." She noticed Betty giving her a stern look. "Don't worry, 'Mom', I won't."

Viktoria seemed to be deep in thought, so Betty and Nicole chatted quietly as they looked around the beach. Sure enough, there were no men in sight. Just older women, young girls, and lots of women in various states of pregnancy. So Coinie had really done it. But what had she done to them?

At that moment, a man in a red suit appeared on the beach, materializing in much the same way that Coinie had dematerialized. Again, no one but the three friends seemed to notice him.

"Hello, ladies", he said.

"Hello", said Nicole. "I'm guessing that you're one of Coinie's people?"

"'Coinie;?", he said. "Oh, yes, 'Coinie'. Ha-ha, I like that. Yes, I'm one of Coinie's people."

"I'm afraid you just missed her", said Nicole.

"I know", he said. "That's OK, we'll catch up with her, eventually."

"What will you do to her?", asked Betty.

"We're still debating that", he said. "Don't worry, we won't hurt her or anything like that."

"What will you do with us?", asked Viktoria.
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Something

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Nothing", said Red Suit.

"You're not gonna undo what Coinie did?", asked Nicole.

"No", he replied. "It's true she disrupted our experiment, but what's done is done. If we disrupt her experiment, we'd be no better than she is."

"So, you're gonna leave things as they are?", asked Betty.

"That's right", he said.

"Can I ask you something?", said Viktoria. Red Suit nodded.

"Coinie said she 'planted some seeds' in us? What does that mean?"

Red Suit looked at them, closely, almost seeming to look in to them.

"Well, what she did to you won't really take effect until after your daughters are born...", he said.

"But what did she do?", asked Viktoria.

"Well, once your daughters are born, your evolution will start to accelerate, until in about a thousand years, you will be as we are."

"A thousand years?", said Nicole.

"Yes", said Red Suit. "That's the fastest possible safe rate."

"We're going to live a thousand years?", asked Betty.

"You're going to live a lot longer than that", said Red. "A thousand years is just how long it's going to take you to reach your full power."

"And you're going to let that stand?", asked Nicole.

"Yes", said Red. "It's not something we would have approved, but since she's started the experiment, we have to let it play out."

"Suppose when we reach our full powers, we decide to bring men back, will you go after us for violating her experiment?"
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "Nothing"

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
"Well, no", said Red. "You're part of her experiment, so what you do will part of it, too."

He smiled, and continued, "Well, I'll leave you to it. When you reach your full power, you'll be able to find us, wherever we are. Bye."

Red Suit vanished with no further word.

"Well, what do you make of that?", asked Nicole.

"He didn't even ask us if we wanted to be immortal", said Betty.

"You heard him", said Viktoria. "He wouldn't've done anything even if we'd asked him to undo what Coinie did. Besides, don't you want to be immortal?"

"I...I really don't know", said Betty..

The three friends sat and looked around the beach. Many of the women were naked, others wearing clothing that would have been considered indecent an hour before.

Of course, thought Viktoria. With lust gone from the world, people wear clothes as they see fit, covering up only when they want to, or when the weather necessitates it.

New memories drifted into their minds, memories of a world in which men had never existed. Only the three of them remembered otherwise.

The three friends went back to their lives in the new world. There was, as Coinie had hoped, a lot less conflict in the world, although it was not quite the Paradise she had hoped for. In many ways, it was similar to the old world. One afternoon, when the three were together, Nicole asked Viktoria:

"Do you think Coinie really re-wrote all of human history?"

"I don't think so", said Viktoria. I suspect she merely re-wrote people's memories and made the necessary physical alterations. For such a major change, the 'new' world seems too similar to the 'old' one."

Soon, the time came for the three friends to give birth. One of the characteristics of the new world was that maternity wards were much larger and better funded. Of course, being rich, the three friends went to a special private facility. They encountered many of the other girls from Chloe's party who were there at the same time. Nicole named her daughter "Samantha", Betty named her daughter "Patricia", and Viktoria named her daughter "Bernadette".

About a month after they gave birth, they noticed the first effects of Coinie's "gift".
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: "No."

choices: Re-shape Earth in a new way
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content:
Viktoria noticed it when the solution to an advanced mathematics problem that had eluded her for years suddenly became crystal clear to her. Moreover, the beginnings of a whole new school of physics began to develop in her mind.

Betty, being a huge fan of manga and anime, had been studying Japanese on and off for several years. She'd never found it easy, and had never made much progress. Now she found herself soaring through Japanese lessons, and had memorized thousands of characters in a week.

Nicole, who had never been "mechanical", found herself developing an instinctive understanding of how machinery worked. Buying a set of tools, she took apart every device in her home, putting them back together, only with improvements that made them operate more efficiently. She soon found herself inventing things that had never existed before.

One afternoon, Nicole and Betty (with Samantha and Patricia) went to visit Viktoria (and Bernadette). They chatted about various things for a while.

Nicole picked up Vikki's toaster and began re-inventing it. She said:

"I guess Coinie's 'gift' is starting to kick in".

"Yes", said Viktoria. "I'm starting to think that I won't bother going back to the university. I've learned pretty much everything I could learn there in the last month."

"I've gotten fluent in Japanese", said Betty. "And I've started learning Korean and Chinese."

Nicole set down Viktoria's toaster. It said: "Mistress, would you or your guests like some toast?"

"Did you just bring my toaster to life?", asked Viktoria.

"For a certain definition of 'life'", said Nicole. "Good, isn't it? Goddess, this is nuts! What are we going to become?"

"I'm just glad I have you two in this with me", said Betty. "Imagine going through this alone."

The three friends soon noticed physical changes, as well. Without even exercising, they quickly lost the weight they'd gained during pregnancy, and instead, soon became quite buff. They didn't bulk up, but were soon quite fit, fitter than they'd ever been in their lives. They found themselves able to lift quite heavy objects ,and run marathon distances at sprinting speeds and were now possessed of incredible stamina and endurance, able to easily get by on an hour of sleep a night - traits that were very handy for them as new mothers. However, after a few months, the changes tapered off, leaving them as super-geniuses with Olympic-level athletic skills.

"Well", said Nicole, "Red Suit did say that the complete transformation would take a thousand years. Maybe it's going to be in stages, with a pause between changes so we can acclimate."

Viktoria allowed as that seemed like a logical idea.

They pooled their resources and bought a house together, one with a lab for Viktoria, a workshop for Nicole, and an extensive library, where Betty spent a great deal of time. Over the next few years, while they were caring for their daughters, Betty became fluent in over a hundred languages, and began turning out literary masterpieces in most of them. Nicole turned out dozens of world-changing inventions, and Viktoria perfected gravity control which allowed easy colonization of the Solar System. They were soon world-famous and even richer than they had been.

By the time their daughters reached adulthood, Betty had mastered every human language, Nicole had advanced the general level of human technology by about two hundred years, and Viktoria had designed and built starships, and was working on designing a teleporta tion system. She and Nicole had agreed to work together to develop time travel once the teleporter was done.

When their daughters turned eighteen, they became pregnant, and so Nicole, Betty and Viktoria took time out to play doting grandmothers, although because they hadn't aged, they were very young-looking grandmas. Once their grand-daughters reached adulthood and had children of their own, the three friends withdrew form the world. They had invented a time machine, and had gone back before Coinie's arrival, only to discover that she had re-written all of human history after all! The thought that they would have that level of power someday boggled their minds.

After a few decades, they began to evolve some more. They found they were able to read each other's minds, after first just superficially, but then on very profound levels, so that soon they no longer had to speak to one another. They also began developing telekinetic abilities, being able to move larger and larger objects just be thinking it. Their minds began to expand beyond human limitations as they began to have intimations regarding the underlying nature of reality that humans could never have understood.

As more time went by, they were able to read the minds of the women around them, and even to compel them to obey them if they wished. They didn't do much of this, not just out of their basic decency, but because they didn't really need anything done for them. They no longer needed to eat or sleep, nor did heat or cold affect them.

As the centuries passed, and they continued to evolve, they continued to keep an eye on human progress, but they seldom interacted with individual humans. Before they knew it, a thousand years has passed, and they reached the height of their evolution. They now possessed goddess-like powers. When they chose to manifest physically, they had the same quality they'd noticed in Coinie - the humans that saw them said they looked like everyone' mothers at the same time. They could re-shape reality on a global scale.

They had debated what they would do for a long time. When the time came, they decided to...
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: Both

1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.content: Who left and who stayed?
1453311122121122111111212123112111221111.title: One decided to stay, and one decided to leave

choices: "Sorry, I haven't got time for the likes of you."
145331112212112211112.content:
Nicole restrained herself from using the coin, instead putting it into her purse and taking a fuller part in the conversation. Later, she and Betty walked back to Betty's place. After another quick snack, she drove home. Once she was there, she spent some time on-line trying to find information about the coin. Coming up dry, she thought about who to call for help. The only person she knew that knew anything much about magic or the supernatural was Alice Wang, a girl she'd known in high school. Alice was obsessed with studying anything to do with the supernatural or the paranormal. She was also a thoroughgoing skeptic, and had already helped to debunk a number of fraudulent claims. She would be the ideal person to ask. The only problem was that Alice had good reason to dislike Nicole and her friends - they had often mocked her when they were in school together.

Nicole decided to try. She knew that Alice worked at the local campus library, so she called there.

"Hello, Campus Library Information Desk."

"Hello, may I speak to Alice Wang, please?"

"One moment, please."

Hold music played for a moment.

"Hello, this is Alice."

"Alice, this is Nicole Winters."

"Nicole?" said Alice, the surprise in her voice quite evident. "To what do I owe the privilege?"

"Look, I'm awful sorry to bother you, but could I see you this evening? I know you have good reason not to like me much, but I'm at my wit's end. I've found something - unusual - and you're the only person I know that might be able to identify it. Please, I know we're not friends, but I really need your help."

Alice thought about it for a long moment, and said...
145331112212112211112.title: ...Seeking some advice

choices: TAILS - NO REALITY CHANGE for Alice
1453311122121122111121.content:
Alice agreed to meet with Nicole when she finished her shift at the library at 4:00 p.m. Nicole arrived outside the building at 3:45 p.m. She thought of what she knew about the girl she was going to meet. Alice was a short, Chinese-American girl with log, black hair. Her parents had both died in a car accident when she was 15. She'd lived the next few years with an aunt that she wasn't close to, and had moved out the minute she turned 18. she was now putting herself through college.

When she saw Alice come out of the library, Nicole waved her over to her car.

"Hey, Alice! Thanks very much for agreeing to see me! Can we grab something to eat, and then go someplace private to talk? Offspring here demands to be fed."

"OK", said Alice, getting into the car. "We can go to my apartment. there's a sandwich shop on the way."

The two bought some sandwiches and then went back to Alice's small, somewhat dingy apartment. Alice watched in astonishment as Nicole scarfed her meal. Then she spoke.

"Alright, Nicole, what's this all about?"

Nicole sighed, and said, "Let me tell you up front that this is going to sound crazy. Hell, it sounds crazy to me, and I lived it." She then told Alice the whole story,from finding the coin down to the present.

After listening to the story, Alice sighed and said, "You were right. It does sound crazy. Look, Nicole, I'm sorry, I really am, but there's no such thing as magic coins. I'm not saying this to be mean, or to get back at you for the way you girls treated me in school, it's just the truth. You're going through a very tough time right now. I can't imagine what it's like for you, I really can't But I know that pregnancy is a very stressful thing at the best of times. Listen, my mother told me how she had vivid nightmares when she was carrying me. Giant rabbits were trying to kill her. She even started seeing them when she was awake. My father ended up sending her to a shrink."


"So you think I'm delusional?"

"i'm sorry, but, yeah."


"But I'm not! Really, I wish I was. It would make life so much simpler...Can I ask you one thing? Will you at least look at the coin, and see if it looks like anything you've seen before?"

"OK, sure."

Nicole took out the coin and handed it to Alice. Alice took it and looked at it closely. It didn't look like anything she'd ever seen before. there was something creepy about it somehow. No wonder it had freaked Nicole out! She felt a sudden urge to flip it. She shook her head and spoke to Nicole.

"I've never seen anything like it. It doesn't really look that old, you know. It's probably something someone ran up as a gag, or something."

A thought struck her.

"Look, Nicole, I'm gonna prove to you that there's nothing magical about this coin. I'm going to flip it while looking at myself in that mirror over there."

"No", said Nicole "You'll end up getting pregnant!"

"No, I won't, Nicole. You'll see, nothing's going to happen."

Before Nicole could say anything further, Alice walked over to the mirror, and flipped the coin. It came up...
1453311122121122111121.title: "Alright, I'll see you."

14533111221211221111212.content:
NO REALITY CHANGE

"What was that?" thought Alice. "Cripes, listening to that story of Nicole's has got me hearing things! Poor thing, I wonder if maybe I should have a talk with that friend of hers - Betty, wasn't it?"


Aloud, she said, "Hey, it came up TAILS!"

Then she felt a brief shiver, and it was...
14533111221211221111212.title: TAILS - NO REALITY CHANGE for Alice

145331112212112211112122.content:
.After a brief shiver, like a cold wind had gone through the room, Alice felt normal again. she turned back to Nicole, handing her the coin.

"You see, Nicole, nothing happened."

Nicole put the coin back into her pocket.

"I guess not. Or maybe that's what it means when it comes up TAILS." She saw Alice's skeptical look. "I know, I know, I won't bother to try to convince you anymore right now. Can I call you you if I think of a better way to prove it to you?"

"I suppose so, but I really think you should talk to your doctor about this."

"I know", said Nicole. "I'd better go now." She pulled out a notepad and wrote her phone number on it. She handed the paper to Alice, and said, "Look, if anything weird or unusual does happen to you over the next few days, will you call me? Maybe TAILS means some kind of a delayed reaction."

"OK, Nicole, I will."

"Good night, Alice, and thanks again."

"Good night, Nicole."

After Nicole had left, Alice suddenly felt ravenous. She'd eaten a sandwich with Nicole, but now her stomach felt empty. She went out to the kitchen to fix herself something to eat. It was 6:00 p.m. Alice had just begun Day One.
145331112212112211112122.title: ...FAST PREGNANCY for Alice

1453311122121122111121221.content:
After preparing and eating a hearty meal, Alice went into her bedroom and changed into the sweats that she typically wore when she was sitting around alone. She noticed a little spotting when she took off her panties, but didn't think much of it. While "that time of the month" wasn't due for a couple of weeks, she occasionally got a little spotting in between periods, as women sometimes did.

She did some schoolwork, and then sat down to watch some TV. Without even thinking about it, she'd pulled a gallon of ice cream out of the freezer and started methodically devouring it. She flipped channels and stopped on what appeared to be a movie about a lost kitten. Before she knew it, she was engrossed in the kitten's adventures, becoming more and more emotionally involved. The film ended with the kitten having a joyful reunion with its mother. Alice found herself weeping buckets. When she got a hold of herself, she looked down and noticed to her shock that the ice cream container was empty!

Oh, my God, she thought, I've become the cliched "single woman sitting at home alone crying into her ice cream"!


Drying her eyes, she cleaned up her room, and went to bed.

The next morning, Alice awoke feeling bloated and yet quite hungry. She ate a big breakfast, and then hopped in the shower. Afterwards, she looked at herself in the mirror. She couldn't decide whether she was getting a little pudgy or not. She'd have to watch that.

When she arrived at school, she found herself feeling a little irritable. When one of her classmates bumped into her, she snapped at him.

"Look out, you jerk, why don''t you watch where you're going!"

"Easy there, kiddo!" came a voice from behind her. It was Emiko Matsumoto, her closest - well, only close, really - friend. Emiko was a tall, sharp-looking meganekko with very dark red hair.

"Hi, Emi!" said Alice. "Sorry, I seem to be in a bit of a mood, today. We still on for this weekend?"

"Yup, I'll be there around 7:00." Emiko had agreed to spend the weekend at Alice's place so they could work on a presentation for their Medieval History class. It wasn't due for a while yet, but neither of them liked to wait until the last minute. Plus, they'd have fun hanging out, and it would get Emi out of the dorms for a while.

Alice made it through her classes that morning without further incident, and then headed to lunch. Despite her earlier good intentions she ate a very big lunch. That afternoon, she went to her shift at the library, and managed to keep her moodiness largely in check, having threatened to murder only one colleague, and only breaking into tears once.

On her way home, she picked up a bunch of snacks, some junk food and some healthy stuff. She didn't get any booze - neither she nor Emi were big drinkers. She thought about Nicole. she hoped the girl was OK. Despite their former enmity, she found herself concerned for her.

When she got home, she put her purchases away and started tidying up. It was just about 6:00 p.m. Emiko would be there in about an hour. And so Day One ended for Alice. Day Two was about to begin.
1453311122121122111121221.title: Day One With Alice

choices: Remember Nicole? Whatever Happened to Her?
14533111221211221111212211.content:
Shortly before 7:00, Alice suddenly felt ill. Racing to the toilet, she made it just in time before vomiting copiously. When she had finished, she rinsed out her mouth with some mouthwash.

Just then, she heard the doorbell ring. She ran to answer it. It was Emiko, as expected. She let her friend in. She decided not to tell her friend that she'd been ill. She was afraid she might not want to stay, and for some reason, she really didn't want to be alone this weekend. Emiko, however, seemed to have noticed something.

"Are you OK, Alice? You look a little flushed."

"Oh, no, I'm OK, I've just been zipping around all day, that's all."

"OK. Anyway, are you hungry? I'm really famished."

Alice, realized that even though she had thrown up only minutes before, she was now really quite hungry.

"Actually, I'm starving! I don't feel like cooking, though. Is it alright if we order out?"

"Sure, what do you have in mind?"

"How about Chinese?" asked Alice. "I could murder some pork fried rice!"

"Really? I thought you hated Chinese food!" It had long been a running joke between the two that even though Alice was of Chinese ancestry, she didn't like Chinese food all that much.

"I don't usually, but for some reason, tonight I've got a huge craving for pork fried rice. My mother used to make it pretty good, you know."

"A 'craving'?" said Emiko, jokingly. "You're not pregnant, are you?"

"NO, I am NOT pregnant!" said Alice, with more vehemence than she had intended. Noticing the surprise on her friend's face, she tried to turn it into a joke. "How could you think such a thing about me?", she said, in what she hoped was a humorous voice. At any rate,Emiko seemed to buy it.

"OK", said Emiko, "Chinese it is."

Alice phoned in a delivery order to the China Garden, and then said:

"While we're waiting for them, I'm going to change out of my work clothes."

"Me, too." said Emiko.

Alice went into her room to change. It was only when she took off her work pants that she realized how tight they had become. She thought about weighing herself, but was a little afraid to discover how much weight she'd put on. When she took off her bra, she noticed that her breasts were sore. Had her breasts finally decided to grow to a respectable size after all these years? She was a little old for a growth spurt. She put on a loose sweat shirt and sweat pants, and went out to the living room. Emiko had changed into sweats and a t-shirt that would have looked big on Andre the Giant.

"Why do you always insist on wearing tents?" asked Alice.

"I just like loose-fitting clothes, that's all", replied her friend.

"Loose-fitting is fine, but a family of three could live in that shirt."

Conversation went on in this vein until their food arrived. When it arrived, they took it into the living room and put on the TV. Alice did justice to a serving of pork fried rice and another of beef chow mein. She finished up with a fortune cookie. Her fortune read: "You will soon receive a big surprise."

After dinner, they worked on their presentation for a while. Their hearts weren't in it, so they stopped after an hour. They sat down to watch TV. Alice took out another gallon of ice cream which had somehow found its way into her freezer. After giving Emiko a generous bowlful, she proceeded to demolish the rest of it herself. Emiko was astonished at her friend's appetite, but elected not to say anything. She couldn't help commenting later when she caught Alice unconsciously massaging her sore breasts.

"Alice, why are you feeling yourself up?"

"Well, it's not as though I can get anyone else to do it. Why, are you volunteering?" said Alice, jokingly.

"Don't tempt me. it's the best offer I've had in far too long", said Emiko, ruefully. The two friends chatted amiably for a while. Eventually, bed time came. Alice opened up the couch bed for Emiko, and provided her with pillows and bedding, before retreating to her own room.

The next morning, Alice woke up at 5:00 a.m., feeling nauseated again. She went to the toilet and threw up. Fortunately, she didn't wake up Emiko, who famously slept like a stone. She went quietly back to bed and slept a few more hours.

After a light breakfast, the two friends showered and got dressed. Alice put on her loosest jeans, only to find that even they were a bit snug. When she came out of her room, Emiko complimented her on her skin.

"You're almost glowing", she said.

She and Emiko did more schoolwork for a while. At lunchtime, they went out to a local Italian restaurant. Alice threw up in the ladies' room, again managing to conceal the fact from Emiko. On their way back to Alice's apartment, she felt a craving for pickles. She stopped at a convenience store to pick up a jar. She deliberately forced the cultural significance of a craving for pickles out of her mind.

That afternoon, they did some serious work on their presentation, largely finishing it. Alice suddenly noticed an urgent need to pee. She stood up, and nearly fell over from dizziness.

"Are you OK?" asked Emiko.

"Yeah, I just stood up too fast."

When she came out of the bathroom, she noticed that it was nearly 6:00 p.m. on Saturday. Though she still didn't know it, she had just finished Day Two. Day Three was about to begin.
14533111221211221111212211.title: Day Two for Alice

145331112212112211112122111.content:
That evening, Emiko offered to cook supper. Feeling tired, Alice took her up on it. She went into her room to change. Stripping herself naked, she looked at her body in the mirror.

Her breasts definitely seemed to be larger, and she was undeniably getting a bit of a belly. The idea that it was the beginning of a baby bump occurred to her, but she defiantly thrust it away. That is NOT possible, she thought.

That evening, they didn't even make the pretense of doing schoolwork, and instead simply enjoyed being together. Emiko again chose to say nothing as Alice put away a prodigious amount of food, including the entire jar of pickles.

The next morning, Alice again woke up at 5:00, feeling queasy. She stumbled to the bathroom and vomited profusely. This time, Emiko heard her, and raced to the bathroom.

"Alice, are you alright?"

"Sorry, Emi. did I wake you? My stomach was just bothering me a bit."

Emiko looked at her friend. During the night, her breasts had gotten noticeably larger, and her belly had expanded into an unmistakable "baby bump".

"Oh, my God, Alice, you ARE pregnant!"

Alice sat on the bathroom floor and shouted hysterically, her voice almost becoming a shriek:

"I can't be pregnant! I can't ! I can't, I just can't!"

Emiko sat down next to her friend, and put her arm around her.

"I'm sorry, sweetie, but it sure looks like you are."

Alice's reply startled her.

"I can't be pregnant! Don't you see? If I'm pregnant, then magic is real!"

"What? Alice, who did this to you?" A horrible thought struck her. "Alice, honey, were you raped?"

"No", came her friend's miserable reply. "If anything, I did this to myself."

"Alice, what are you talking about?"

"If I tell you, you'll think I'm crazy."

"Alice, dear, I already think you're crazy. Come into the living room, and tell me all about it."

Emiko helped her friend to clean herself up, then brought her into the living room. Then she got her a glass of water, and sat down next to her.

"OK, Alice, tell me the whole story."

Emi listened in dismay as Alice told her the fantastic story about Nicole and the magical coin. When she finished, Alice smiled timidly at her friend.

"I thought Nicole was delusional, so I'll understand if you think so, too."

"Oh, Alice, I don't know what happened to you, but I hope you understand that I just can't believe in a magic coin that makes people pregnant."

Calmer now, Alice spoke again:

"OK, then, tell me bluntly what you think happened to me."

Emi sighed and thought for a moment.

"Alright, then, you're obviously pregnant. So, either someone artificially inseminated you, which seems unlikely, or some guy did this to you. Either way, it was so traumatic for you, that you went into deep denial. Along comes this Nicole, who sounds deeply delusional herself, and her story gives you a rationalization for your own condition, so you start to believe it yourself, maybe even unconsciously. I'm no psychology major, but even I've heard of shared delusions."

Alice sighed. "Emi, that's a perfectly plausible explanation. The only problem is, it's just not true!" She dissolved into tears again.

Emiko hugged her friend. "Alice, whatever has happened to you, I want you to understand that I'm your friend and I'm here for you, no matter what." Alice hugged her friend back fiercely, and began crying even harder. The two friends sat on the chair in each other's arms until they both drifted off for a while.

They got up around 7:00, and Emiko made breakfast.

"I wish you could meet Nicole", said Alice. "At least, talk to her a bit and hear her story for yourself."

"I would be interested to talk to her", said Emiko. "It's early now, we'll call her in a few hours. Have you been to a doctor since you realized you were pregnant?"

"No".

"We should make you an appointment, ASAP. You use Doctor Gomulka, same as me, don't you? Her office is closed on weekends,so we'll both blow off school and work on Monday and see if we can't get you an appointment that day. I'll go with you for moral support."

"Thanks, Emi, I appreciate that."

"Also, you're going to start having to make some hard choices. Do you want to keep this kid, or give it up for adoption? If you do keep it, you may have to drop out of school - at least for a while - and go to work full time. Maybe you can go to school par-time once the kid is old enough. Perhaps you'll even be able to convince Aunt Emiko to babysit someitmes."

"Thanks, Emi. God, I haven't even begun to think about stuff like that."

At 10:00 a.m., they called Nicole. She answered right away, and agreed to come to Alice's apartment around Noon.

She arrived puncutally, and gasped when she saw Alice's condition.

"Oh, God, Alice, I'm so sorry I dragged you into this! So, this is what TAILS means, a delayed reaction?"

"I guess", said Alice, "although I seem to be making up for lost time."

Alice ushered Nicole into her home, and introduced her to Emiko.

"So, Nicole", said Alice, "Have you used the coin again?"

"Only once", said Nicole, looking sheepish. "As long as it's socked away in a drawer, I'm fine. When I have it on me, I swear I can hear it begging me to use it. Anyway, I stopped to pick up a bottle of water on my way over here, and - you know Bunny Waterford?"

Alice nodded. Bunny was a stuck-up snob, worse than Nicole had ever been.

"When I pulled into the convenience store parking lot, she was there, and when she saw me, she started complaining to her boyfriend about how there were too many spots reserved for expectant mothers. I couldn't resist. One flip, and she was eight months pregnant, and complaining about how there weren't enough spots for expectant mothers."

Nicole noticed Emiko looking at her doubtfully.

"I suppose you must think I'm crazy, Emiko, and that I've made your friend crazy, too?"

"I wouldn't have put it that way, but, yeah."

"I don't blame you a bit. It all sounds nuts to me, and I'm living it."

"May I see the coins?" asked Emiko.

Nicole took the coin out of her purse and placed it on the table. Emiko picked it up.

"Careful, Emiko!" said Alice. "That thing's dangerous!"

Emiko waved a calming hand at her friend, and examined the coin, closely. There was something about it, She did feel an urge to flip it. But surely that was just psychological, wasn't it? She came to a decision.

"Ladies, I'm going to prove to you that this coin is not magical, the only way I can", she said, stripping off her out-sized shirt, so that only her bra covered her upper body. She then beckoned the two women to follow her into Alice's bathroom, where she stood in front of the mirror.

"Oh, Emi, NO!" said Alice, realizing her friend's intention.

"Emiko, this really isn't a good idea", added Nicole.

Emiko gestured for them to stand on either side of her.

"Alice, Nicole, nothing is going to happen, I assure you."

"Nothing happened to me at first, either", said Alice.

"Well", said Emiko, "If it comes up TAILS, we'll know in a day or so, won't we?"

Before the others could voice any further objections, Emiko looked at herself in the mirror and flipped the coin.


And then...
145331112212112211112122111.title: Day Three for Alice

1453311122121122111121221112.content:
NO REALITY CHANGE

Was that a voice?, thought Emiko. My God, what if there is something to this nonsense? No, that can't be!


As Alice and Nicole watched expectantly, Emiko felt a brief tingle, and then...
1453311122121122111121221112.title: NO REALITY CHANGE for Emiko

14533111221211221111212211122.content:
TAILS!


The three women gasped as Emiko's belly and breasts grew, the change stopping when she was three months pregnant, perhaps a little bigger than Alice. She began to shake, and controlled herself with an effort.

"Well, ladies", she said, "I have to admit that the whole 'magic pregnancy coin' theory is looking a whole lot more plausible to me right now. My apologies for doubting you."

She cupped her hands over her belly.

"It's going to be interesting explaining this to my parents."

Calmly, Emiko went and knelt down in front of the toilet.

"BLAHHH-AAAH-AAAH-AARRRRRGH!" she concluded.

Alice and Nicole helped her clean herself up, and guided her back out to the couch. Alice fetched her some water.

"Thank you", said Emiko. "I think I'm sort of in shock."

"I know exactly how you feel", said Nicole. "It was different for you, though. We all saw the change, and remembered it afterwards. and you only look about three months along, where I went straight to eight."

"Did you hear the voice?" asked Alice.

"Yes", said Emiko.

"I heard it, too", said Alice, "but I didn't want to admit it."

"I guess I'm in the same boat as you, Alice" said Emiko. "Or at least, a very similar boat. Now, I have to answer all the questions I told you you'd have to answer."

Now it was Alice's turn to comfort her friend. "Whatever comes, Emi, we'll face it together."

"Thanks, Alice" said Emi. " I do wish we knew more about this coin, though."

"I researched it as best I could", said Nicole, "But I couldn't find out anything."

"I did, too", said Alice, "and I came up empty, too."

Emiko sat and thought, "I've got it, we should call Sheila McKenzie!"

"Oh, no, not her!" said Alice.

"I know you think she's too ready to believe in things, but she has done a lot of good research."

Emiko turned to Nicole to explain. "Sheila's a grad student, a specialist in magic and the paranormal. She and Alice have had some big fights over the years."

"OK, fine" said Alice, "We might as well try every possible angle."

Emiko called Sheila, and without saying too much, asked if they could see her, soon. Sheila agreed to see them the next afternoon. Alice, Nicole, and Emiko had lunch together, and then Nicole left, saying that she'd see them the next day.

Afterwards, Alice and Emiko sat quietly together for a while. As much as they had to talk about, both needed some quiet time to absorb what was going on with them. For awhile, they tried to do some schoolwork, but they both found their vision blurring a bit. They put it down to tired eyes and decided to just relax. Before they knew it, it was nearly 6:00. For Alice, Day Three had ended. Day Four was about to begin.
14533111221211221111212211122.title: PREGNANT EXPANSION for Emiko

145331112212112211112122111221.content:
As the evening wore on, Alice found herself feeling increasingly energetic. Her stomach seemed to have finally settled, which was good, because her appetite was still quite hearty.

"So, Emiko, what would you like for dinner this evening?" she asked.

"I could murder a pizza", she said.

"Sounds good. What do you want on yours?"

"Pepperoni, please."

Alice called a local pizzeria and ordered two large pepperoni pies. They could have the leftovers cold for breakfast, if there were any.

When the food arrived, the two friends quickly polished it off. Alice reflected on the oddness of the situation. In just a few days, her whole life - her whole way of looking at life - had been turned on its head. But, somehow, now that she had accepted her predicament, she was oddly calm. She was still afraid, she was still unsure what she was going to do, but she was at peace. Whatever happened, would happen. Now it was Emiko that was freaking out, Emiko who needed comforting. It helped her to have someone to look after. Once dinner was over, Emiko began to speak.

"I have to call my parents."

Emiko's father worked for the Ibaraki Corporation, a Japanese conglomerate. The year before Emiko was born, he had been sent to work for their American branch. Because it was to be a long-term posting, he brought his wife with him. Emiko had been born their first year in the U.S. The year she turned 18, her parents had finally returned to Japan. Emiko, never having seen Japan, elected to remain in America. Claiming U.S. citizenship, she began working her way through college. Her parents hadn't been happy, but they had acquiesced.

"How do you think they'll react?"

"They won't be happy, especially when I tell them I don't know who the father is. Heh, there is no father! Is it parthenogenesis, do you think? Will our babies be little copies of us?"

"I don't know how I feel about having to raise up a little copy of me", mused Alice.

"My mom will be disappointed, and worried", continued Emiko, "But I'm not worried about her. It's my dad who'll go ballistic. He still thinks of me as his little baby girl. Ah, well, no point in delaying. It'll be about 10:30 a.m, Sunday over there, so they should both be home. Wish me luck."

Alice held her friend's hand as she called her parents. The conversation was in Japanese, so she didn't know precisely what was said, but it was obviously very emotional. Before it was over, there was both shouting and tears. When it was over, Emiko buried her face in Alice's shoulder. When she finally raised her head, Alice asked her how it went.

"About how I expected. Mama was disappointed, Daddy was heartbroken. He couldn't make up his mind between insisting on flying out here tonight and insisting that I fly there immediately. Mama talked him down off of that ledge, but then half talked herself into flying out here tonight. I talked her out of that, but she'll probably fly out here at some point. Anyway, they both still love me."

"You didn't think about telling them the truth?"

"No, I'm not that brave. They were glad that I had someone with me. Oh, man, I'm exhausted."

"Do you want to turn in early?"

"Yeah. Listen, don't take this the wrong way, but can I sleep with you tonight? I really don't want to be alone."

"OK, but no getting fresh!"

The next morning, Alice was woken by the sound of Emiko retching. She ran out to comfort her friend.

"You seem to be over your nausea", said Emiko, almost accusingly.

"Yeah", said Alice. "I'm just a little - BRRRAAARRRP- gassy."

"Ha!" said Emiko. "Only you could make me laugh at a time like this. I'm lucky to have a friend like you."

"Oh, so sweet", said Alice. Smirking, she continued, "I'd say it was enough to make me puke, but under the circumstances..."

The two friends ate breakfast. When Alice went to get dressed, she realized that her midsection had expanded further. She wasn't surprised - she felt a good deal heavier. None of her regular pants or jeans fit her. Even her baggiest sweat pants were snug on her. She had to go without bra and panties - none of her underwear fit her properly. She had to wear her loosest shirt.

"Going casual?" said Emiko.

"It's all I've got that fits. I got fatter overnight. At this rate, I don't see how I'm going to last nine months. It can't be normal to get this big this fast."

"I think we've established that this isn't a normal pregnancy."

"Yeah. You know, I think my skin's a little darker."

I've heard of that happening to pregnant women."

The two friends spent a relaxed morning, talking about their plans for the future. Nicole arrived around Noon, and the three had lunch together before driving over to Sheila's house. Nicole had the coin with her, but had resisted the urge to use it. Sheila answered her door, smiling. She was a large, busty blonde woman about 25 years old, built like a Valkyrie.

"Ah, my two little skeptics, and who's your friend?"

Emiko introduced Nicole.

"Come on in", said Sheila, leading them into a spacious parlor filled with books.

"So, what brings you here today?"

Alice, Emiko, and Nicole told Sheila their whole story.

"Wow", said Sheila afterwards. "If anyone besides you two" she said, meaning Alice and Emiko, "came to me with a story like this, I'd throw them out. But whatever our differences, I know you two are too dedicated to the truth to lie about something like this. So, I believe that you believe what you're saying, at least."

Turning to Nicole, she said, "May I see the coin, please?'

"Alright", said Nicole, taking the coin out of her purse, "But be careful. I swear there's something in that thing. And whatever you do, don't flip it!"

Sheila picked up the coin. Nicole was right, there was something in it. She could almost hear it it calling out to her, begging her to flip it. With an effort, she put the coin down.

"Do you know", she said, "I...
145331112212112211112122111221.title: Day Four for Alice

1453311122121122111121221112211.content:
"Yes", said Sheila, "I'm sure I've heard something like this before. Wait right here." She left the room.

While they were waiting, Alice and Emiko chatted quietly, while Nicole looked around the room. On one wall, she spotted a large photograph. There were eight people in it - two of them were older, presumably Sheila's parents.With them were five younger women, one of whom was obviously Sheila, and a younger man. After a few minutes, Sheila came back in to the room, carrying an old leatherbound book. Nicole pointed to the photo.

"Is this your family, Sheila?"

"Yes, that's right. There's Mom and Dad, my older sisters Jean, Carla, Patricia, and Anne, me, and my little brother, Lou. Dad really wanted a son. Mom was game, but she kept producing girls. Finally they got lucky on the sixth try, and got Lou. Unfortunately, they spoiled him silly, and now he's a self-absorbed chauvinist brat. I often wonder how long my parents would have gone on if her hadn't come along."

She sat down with the book in her lap, and resumed speaking.

"My Great-Uncle Howard collected rare books. He probably had more rare books than the local campus library. When he died, he left me $500,000.00, and right of first refusal on his books. I used the money to buy this house, and then filled it with his books. I kept them all. Since then, my main hobby has been cataloguing them, sorting them, getting rid of the ones I don't want. This book is one of them. Have any of you ever heard of Durnovarius?"

The three mothers-to-be confessed that they had not.

"Durnovarius" said Sheila, unconsciously adopting a professorial tone, "Was the pen name of a man who lived in Dorchester, in England, in the 12th Century. His real name has not come down to us. He wrote extensive journals regarding what we would now call the paranormal, the inner secrets of reality. Eventually, he fell afoul of the Church, and learned the inner secret of what it felt like to be burned alive. In the late Eighteenth Century, a man named Oswald Montmorency claimed to have found one of Durnovarius' journals and transcribed it. Most people thought he'd made the whole thing up. Actually, most people thought he'd made Durnovarius up. let alone the journal. Anyway, this is a copy of of said transcription. The interesting thing is that there's a section in here that describes something that sounds an awful lot like your 'pregnancy coin'. It's all in Medieval Latin. Fortunately, I happen to be quite fluent in Medieval Latin."

Sheila looked up, obviously enjoying playing to her audience. She opened the book, and began.

"'A curious item which has come into my possession is the Coin of Gignerus' - he goes on to give a lengthy description that exactly matches your coin on the table there. To continue: 'The coin is said to be the prison of an ancient fertility spirit, a creature mischievous but not malevolent. When the coin is flipped, then whichever side comes up, the next person that they who flipped the coin lays eyes on - even if it be his or her own reflection - be they eligible, will be made pregnant in one of two ways. The first is that they shall suddenly find themselves at some point in a normal pregnancy, which shall then proceed as normal."

"I guess that' what happened to me", said Emiko

"Very likely, dear" said Sheila, continuing to read. "'The second possibility is that the one seen will be undergo an accelerated pregnancy, which will be complete in nine days, with each day counting as though one month of a normal pregnancy'."

"W-wait a minute!" said Alice."Is that what happened to me? I'm going to have a baby in nine days?"

"Actually", said Sheila, "When did you flip the coin?"

"Thursday, just before 6:00 p.m."

"And today's Monday..."

"Oh, yeah", said Alice. "I was supposed to call Doctor Gomulka's office this morning, wasn't I?"

"That's alright,dear" said Emiko. "We can both make appointments, later."

"Anyway", said Sheila, "It's 3:00 p.m. Monday, now, so you're almost at the end of your fourth day. I wouldn't make any plans for next Saturday, if I were you."

"Next Saturday, my God..."

Emiko put an arm around her friend. "Don't worry, dear, we'll get through it."

Sheila began reading again.

"'Now,when the coin is flipped, should it land smiling side up, events and memories shall be re-written, so that the pregnancy shall seem a naturally happening event, with none but the one who flipped the coin knowing the difference.'"

"I guess that's what happened to me", said Nicole.

Sheila read some more, "'If, however, the frowning side comes up, then the pregnancy will be seen as a sudden, unnatural event, a shock to all affected. As to the matter of eligibility, all humans 18 years of age, or older, may be affected. If a given person be physically incapable of bearing a child, they will be adapted to do so'."

"'Adapted'", said Alice, "I wonder what that means."

"Who knows?" said Sheila, " I wonder what happens if you use it on a woman that's already pregnant?'

"Let's not find out right now!" said Emiko. "Does it say anything else?"

"Just that the coin won't always follow the normal rules of probability. One user may get the same result over and over, another may never get the same result twice. Also that any pregnancies that result will be trouble-free, or at least have only the troubles that even the best pregnancy might have, and that the babies will be born healthy and wholesome, whatever that means. Finally, it warns that use of the coin can become compulsive, but that if the user is aware of the compulsion, it can be overcome."

Sheila sighed.

"It would be something to see it happen", she said. Without even noticing it, she was fingering the coin in her left hand.

"Well, there's a mirror on the wall over there, if you want to see it that bad", said Emiko, somewhat flippantly.

Sheila looked at the mirror. She felt a powerful urge to flip the coin. It really did seem to be speaking to her! Flip me. Flip me! FLIP ME!

In the end...
1453311122121122111121221112211.title: "...think I can help you."

14533111221211221111212211122111.content: Afterwards, Sheila was never quite sure how much her coin-flip was her own decision, and how much was the coin's compulsion. At the time, it just sort of happened. She braced herself, not knowing what to expect, not knowing what would happen. She wasn't entirely sure that anything would happen. She thought she felt a tingle, and...
14533111221211221111212211122111.title: ...She flipped the coin!

145331112212112211112122111221112.content:
Sheila shivered as her torso began to swell, to change. Fortunately, her clothes changed at the same time, becoming loose-fitting maternity wear. Looking at herself, she guessed that she must be around six months pregnant. At the same time, new memories began to flood into her mind:

Six months before, she'd attended a conference of medieval historians. She'd met Stephen Cortese, a dark-eyed handsome man. They'd hit it off, had a few drinks together, and one thing led to another, and they'd spent the night together.Nothing further had happened, and their time together had become simply a pleasant memory. Now, in her re-written history, about a month after the conference she'd realized that she was pregnant. She'd thought deeply over what she should do. She'd liked Stephen, but she hadn't loved him. Plus, he lived on the other side of the country. If she told him about the child, he'd feel obligated to be a part of its life, and probably to have a say in its upbringing. She didn't want that, for herself, or even for him. It would force them both to make decisions that would disrupt both their lives. So, she kept the secret of the child's paternity to herself. Her family weren't happy with it, but they'd come to accept it.

Sheila was shaken from her reverie by Emiko's voice.

"Hey, Sheila, are you OK? You're all spaced out."

"You - didn't see that?" she asked.

"See what?" asked Alice.

"I-I'm pregnant."

"You were pregnant when we came in", said Emiko.

"No, I wasn't", said Sheila.

"I get it", said Nicole. "You flipped the coin and the 'happy' side came up. So, that's what it's like when someone else does it. You don't even notice the difference."

"You used the coin on yourself?" said Alice.

"Yes", said Sheila. "I wanted to know what it was like. I -um - I can't believe it..." she took a moment to collect herself. "OK, now that I know it works, there's someone I know that I think would welcome being made pregnant. Can you ladies stick around for a while? We could have an early dinner."

The three friends agreed, and the four of them went to Sheila's kitchen, where they set about preparing themselves dinner. As they worked, Sheila explained what she had in mind.

"My oldest sister, Jean, and her husband, they're desperate to have kids. But they can't. Nobody's fault, but they can't. They've tried and tried, been to dozens of doctors, had all sorts of fertility drugs, artsem, the lot. Every legal treatment, and some 'questionable' ones. We've tried to convince them to adopt, but it's no go. They want a child of "'their own'. If anyone I know would welcome having this coin flipped at them, it would be her. I'd like to give her a call and have her come over here. Is tha tOk with all of you?"

"Sure", said Nicole.

"OK", said Emiko.

"Oh!" said Alice.

"What's up, dear?" said Emiko.

"I think I just felt 'Junior' kick! Oh, my God, there's someone living inside of me!"

"There's someone living inside all of us, Alice", said Emiko.

"I knew that, intellectually", said Alice, "But somehow this makes it more 'real'."

In the meanwhile, Sheila had been on the phone to her sister. "She'll be here in a little bit."

A short while, the foursome heard someone letting themselves in the front door.

"All of my sibs have keys", explained Sheila. Louder, she said, "We're in the kitchen!"


A figure came into the kitchen. It was...
145331112212112211112122111221112.title: ...PREGNANT EXPANSION for Sheila

1453311122121122111121221112211122.content:
Lou McKenzie bounded into his sister's kitchen, carrying two shopping bags. If Sheila was built like a Valkyrie, her brother was built like a Viking.

If I had a brother that looked like that, thought Nicole, I'd give serious thought to incest!



"Hey, Sis" said Lou, "Mom sent me over with some jars of her homemade strawberry preserves. You know her, she always makes way too much."

He looked around, noticing his sister's guests for the first time.

"Whatchu got here, a convention of preggos?"

"Lou...", said his sister, warningly.

"Hey, I'm all for it" he said. "I wish my Gail was eligible to join!"

He pulled out his phone and showed them all a picture of himself with a harassed-looking dark-haired woman and a smiling dark-haired man.

"That's me and Gail with her brother Brad, my best friend, and best man at our wedding. Anyway, good to see you ladies doing what women were put on this Earth for - havin' babies!"

White-hot with anger and red with embarrassment, Sheila found that somehow the coin was once again in her hand. Glaring at her brother, she flipped it without hesitation.

And then...
1453311122121122111121221112211122.title: Sheila's brother, Lou

14533111221211221111212211122111221.content:
Sheila heard the voice. I guess it's the voice of Gignerus? she thought.

REALITY CHANGE

She was a bit disappointed. The look on his face when he realized what was happening to him might have been pretty entertaining. Her brother seemed to shimmer a bit, and...
14533111221211221111212211122111221.title: REALITY CHANGE for Lou

145331112212112211112122111221112212.content: Sheila watched as her brother was definitely starting to shimmer, like a mirage in the desert. Sheila wondered what it would mean for a man to be "adapted" to bear a child. It looked as though she was about to find out. Lou was starting to blur. It's almost like a regeneration scene in Doctor Who, she thought, and then she saw what "adaptation" meant for Lou. Lou was now...
145331112212112211112122111221112212.title: PREGNANT EXPANSION for Lou

1453311122121122111121221112211122122.content:
Sheila looked on in awe as her brother Lou morphed and became her younger sister, Louise, as big and busty as Sheila was, and just as pregnant. They could almost be twins, only Louise was a little shorter, and had her her done up in a ponytail. New memories flooded into Sheila's mind.

Louis McKenzie had been replaced by Louise McKenzie. The arrival of another daughter had not lessened her parents' determination to have a son. After Louise, they had had six more daughters - Marie, June, Angela, Phyllis, Jennifer, and Gwendolyn - before her mother had finally said "No more!" Louise had married her long-time boyfriend about a year ago, and had announced her pregnancy shortly after Sheila had announced hers. Louise McKenzie was now Louise Carlson

Louise was showing the other a photo on her phone.

"This is me with my husband, Brad, and his sister, Gail, my best friend, and maid of honor at my wedding."

While Louise was talking to the others, Sheila looked a the family photo on the wall. There were now fourteen people in the photo - her parents and their twelve daughters. She looked at the six sisters that she had never seen before, but also had known all of their lives.

After Louise left, Sheila spoke to the others.

"Well, I did it again."

"You used the coin?" said Nicole. "You got your sister pregnant?"

"No, I got my brother pregnant. Wow, you don't say that often."

"But you don't have a brother", said Emiko.

"Five minutes ago, I had four sisters and a brother. Now, I have eleven sisters and no brother. The coin 'adapted' him by turning him into a woman. I'll miss him a little, but he was kind of a jerk. From my new memories, Louise seems to be nicer than Lou was. Maybe he's better off as a woman."

The foursome returned to Sheila's living room. Jean McKenzie McCormack arrived a short while later. She was a bit shorter than Sheila or Louise, her hair was somewhat darker, and she wore glasses, but she otherwise looked very similar to her sisters. Sheila introduced Alice, Emiko and Nicole, and then began to speak to the matter at hand.

"Jean, I want to apologize in advance. I've been discussing certain of your personal issues with people you don't know, without asking your permission. I promise you I wouldn't have done so if I didn't think there was a good reason."

"What 'personal issues'?", asked Jean, warily.

"Well, your inability to become pregnant."

"What? Why?"

"Because each of these women has been made pregnant by a method which I'm reasonably certain you can't have known about. I think it would work for you, too, if you were willing to try it."

"What method?"

Sheila sighed. "I'll tell you, but I warn you, that it's got something to do with my paranormal studies. It's going to sound a little 'out there'."

Jean laughed, "Sheila, bill and I have gone to two psychics, a faith healer and a self-proclaimed 'shamaness'. I'm not sure it could sound more out there than that."

"You'd be surprised."

With that, Sheila told Jean the story of the coin, with input from the others as needed. She decided to leave out the story of Lou/Louise, for fear it would muddy the waters.

"Wow", said Jean. "You were right, Sis, that story is definitely 'out there'. So, all I need to do is look in the mirror and flip the coin?"

"Yes", said Sheila", that's right."

"Well', anything's worth a shot. Here goes nothing."

Jean flipped the coin and...
1453311122121122111121221112211122122.title: Louise!

14533111221211221111212211122111221221.content:
REALITY CHANGE

What was that? It must be the Voice they talked about, thought Jean. Does that mean this is for real? What will I do if I get a "fast pregnancy" like Alice did? I doesn't matter, I just want a baby so bad, I really think I'll make a good mommy! Oh, please, God - Her body began to tingle. Was this it?
14533111221211221111212211122111221221.title: REALITY CHANGE for Jean

choices: What are some other folks up to?
145331112212112211112122111221112212212.content:
Jean watched in awe as her body began to change, to grow. Her breasts got bigger, and weight was added on in other places as well, but the most astonishing part was watching her belly begin to grow and grow and grow until it was that of a woman seven months pregnant. At the same time, her clothes changed, becoming maternity wear. New memories came into her head:

Several months before, after countless failed fertility treatments, after she'd given up hope, she'd found herself gaining weight, having odd cravings, and occasional bouts of nausea. At first, she hadn't believed it. She couldn't let herself believe, not after having had her hopes dashed so many times. finally, she'd gone to see Doctor Tonya Jackson, her physician.When Tonya confirmed her pregnancy, Jean had been so overjoyed that she'd kissed poor Tonya full on the lips, before heading home to tell her husband Bill the good news. there had been more kissing, too, and a good deal more than that, besides. Since then, she'd been walking on eggshells, making sure that nothing endangered her unborn child, but so far everything had gone swimmingly.

Jean snapped out of her reverie! "It worked! It worked! It worked!" She embraced her sister, joyfully.

"What worked?" said Sheila. Jean showed her the coin.

"Oh!" said Sheila. "You mean, you used the coin? That's so weird! I remember you telling me months ago that you were pregnant! This business of time being re-written is so disorienting!"

"I know what you mean", said Jean. "I have two sets of memories. Older memories telling that I came over today because you said you had something important to discuss with me, and newer memories telling me that I stopped by just because I was in the neighborhood. That coin is amazing. Nicole, what are you planning to do with it?"

"I don't know", said Nicole. It is amazing, but it's also dangerous. Using it becomes compulsive after a while. It could be used to help people, but it could also mess up a lot of people's lives."

"Nicole, can I make a suggestion?" asked Sheila. "Why don't you store the coin somewhere, while I research it some more? Let me see whether I can't find out more about it, maybe learn if there's some better way to control it."

"OK", said Nicole, "I'll be in touch."

Nicole drove Alice and Emiko back to Emiko's apartment, stopping at Emiko's dorm so she could pick up more of her things.

"Girls, I'd like to stay in touch with you two, as well" said Nicole. "I feel responsible for what happened to you. I know you flipped the coin yourselves, but you might never have even seen it if I hadn't brought it over here. God, when I think about what I've done to people's lives with that thing..."

Alice smiled at Nicole, "Of course, we'll stay in touch! Us mommies have to stick together!"

"And don't worry about it too much", said Emiko. "We'll get by, somehow. Drive safely, now, and don't get anyone pregnant on the way home!"

Later, Alice and Emiko sat down to eat.

"It's funny", said Alice. "I never thought I'd end up on such good terms with Nicole Winters. I guess people can/i} change!"

"I think impending motherhood may have had something to do with it", said Emiko.

Alice nodded and looked at the clock. It was after 6:00 p.m. Her fifth day had already begun!
145331112212112211112122111221112212212.title: PREGNANT EXPANSION for Jean

1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.content:
Later, Alice and Emiko began to think about their longer-term plans.

"I can't be pregnant in the dorms", said Emiko. "That's not gonna work. My parents will lhep, but my dad's liable to start insisting I move to Japan if he thinks I'm here with nowhere to live."

"Well, you're more than welcome to move in here", said Alice, "I don't imagine the landlord will squawk, as long as the rent gets paid. It'll be crowded in here with both of us and baby. And then later, your baby. Hmm, I guess I'll have to go in to work tomorrow and make my excuses. I guess I'll just have to be one of those women you hear about who didn't even know they were pregnant until the kid was practically dropping out of them. It's lame, but it'll have to do. I'm just a part-timer there, so I don't suppose they'll hold the job for me. God, I'll probably have to drop out of school, too, at least for a while."

"I"m hoping that I can make it out the school year" said Emiko. "And I can keep working at the cafe for a while yet, too. I think I will take you up on your generous offer to move in here. How are you fixed for money?"
"I've still got a certain amount left from when my parents died, but baby will go through that pretty quick. How about you?"

"I've got some savings, but probably less than you. We'll just have to do the best we can. Other women deal with unexpected pregnancies all the time, we can do it, too."

That evening they both spent time on-line researching pregnancy, and the resources available to new and expectant mothers. That night, Alice had a horrific nightmare. Giant rabbits were chasing her, just as her mother had described years before. She walked out and climbed on to the couch bed next to Emiko. She recounted her dream to her friend, who reached out to comfort her until she fell asleep in her arms.

The next day, Tuesday, they woke up early and had a leisurely breakfast. Alice found walking difficult - the weight gain had made her clumsy. Later in the morning, they went and discussed their situation with the library and school officials. It was awkward, but they managed to get through it. They called the doctor's office, but were unable to get appointments until Friday.

"Maybe it's just as well", said Alice.

"How so?" asked Emiko.

"Well, if I went in today, looking like I'm only five months pregnant, and show up at the hospital looking full-term on Saturday, that might raise a few uncomfortable questions."

"I suppose", said Emiko.

They ate lunch and then went to Emiko's dorm room to get more of her stuff. The girls there helped them get their things out to Emiko's clunky old car. They went back to Alice's apartment and spent the afternoon unloading Emiko's stuff. Unfortunately, Emiko had to do most of the work.

About 3:00 p.m., the phone rang. It was...
1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.title: Day Five for Alice

1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.content:
Alice answered the phone. It was Nicole.

"Hello, Nicole, what's up?

"Hi, Alice, I've been thinking about some things, and I was wondering if I could come over there and talk to you and Emiko."

"Sure, if you like, why don't you come over for dinner?"

"OK", said Nicole, "I'll be there in a little while."

"What did she want?"

"She wants to talk about something. I invited over for dinner."

"Oh."

Nicole arrived a little while later. Alice noticed that it was nearly 6:00 p.m.

So, I guess my sixth day has just started, thought Alice.

Alice and Emiko greeted Nicole. they made small talk for a while before Nicole got down to business.

"Ladies, I've been thinking. I know that sudden unexpected pregnancies must have been very hard on you. Not just emotionally, but financially as well, and I wanted to try to help. Look, I'm not trying to play Lady Bountiful here, nor to salve my own conscience. Also, I'm not trying to imply that you two can't survive without my gracious assistance. I really do want to help. My whole life I've looked out for myself, But - and maybe it's impending motherhood - I've finally reached a point in my life where I want to help someone other than myself. Anyway, what I was thinking was, I live in a two bedroom condo, more space than I could ever need. I wanted to offer for you two to come and stay with me. I wouldn't charge you rent, but if you didn't want to be beholden to me, we could leave it that you could pay me back whenever you got back on your feet again. It wouldn't be perfect, but it would enable you to at least have someplace to stay that you knew would be secure, although you would have to share a room, if you didn't mind that.. Plus, we could all help each other out once our kids arrive, and so on. Anyway, I understand if you don't want to answer right way, and I won't take it personally if you say no. It's just, in my own admittedly cement-headed way, I do want to help."

Alice and Emiko conferred briefly, and then Alice spoke.

"Nicole, we do appreciate you offer, and we'd like time to talk it over tonight. Do you mind if we stop tomorrow to take a look at your place?"

"Sure" said Nicole, " I thought you might. Why not come by around 10:00 a.m.?"

Alice and Emiko agreed, and then the three sat down to dinner. Later, after Nicole had left, Alice and Emiko discussed her offer. While both had some reservations, they agreed that the potential financial benefits were big enough that they couldn't dismiss it out of hand.

"Ugh", said Alice, "I swear my belly's gotten bigger just since dinner. My loosest shirt is too tight on me. I hate to buy maternity wear when I'm going to be giving birth in just a couple of days."

"Well, I should buy some", said Emiko. I'm going to be pregnant for months, yet. I'll pick some up tomorrow after we're done at Nicole's and you can use it, too. For now, you'll just have to wear one of my 'tents'."

They turned in early. That night, although neither of them said anything, Alice slept on the couch bed with Emiko. she seemed to feel an overwhelming need for human contact.


By the next morning, Alice's belly had swollen even further, so that even the biggest of Emiko's 'tents' barely fit over it.

"My hands and feet are swollen, too" she said. "And I'm thirsty. Emiko, get me a glass of water, would you?"

"Yes, 'Mom'", said Emiko, smirking.

They arrived at Nicole's place a few minutes early.

"Wow, it sure is a fancy-looking place", said Emiko.

"And big!" said Alice.

Nicole buzzed them in. She gave them a tour of her condo.

"So, what do you think of the place?" asked Nicole.

"It's very nice. And much bigger than I thought. I knew your family was rich, but not this rich!"

"Yeah, I heartily recommend being born into a rich family. I would've been in trouble if I'd had to earn it! So, would you like to live here?"

"Nicole, do you mind if Alice and have a quick chat in private?" asked Emiko.

"Not at all", said Nicole, "I'll just be in the other room.

Once she had left the room, the two friends conferred. Then they called Nicole back into the room, and Alice said...
1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.title: Nicole

choices: What are some other folks up to?
1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.content:
Just one question", said Emiko. "Don't you have - I dunno - a condo board or something that you'd have to run this by?"

"Not to worry", said Nicole, a little sheepishly. "Most of the people that live here are subordinates of my father. Unless we start having wild orgies, they're not going to make trouble."

"What about tame orgies", said Alice, jokingly, "Are those OK?

"Sure", said Nicole, laughing, "Just not after ten at night!"

Are these two a couple? she thought to herself. I never thought so, but they sure didn't seem to mind sharing a bedroom. Ah, well .what of it? Not my business anyway.

The trio had lunch together, discussing the logistics of their situation, making arrangements to have their stuff moved to Nicole's condo. Nicole had room in her storage space, so some of their stuff would go there.

As they drove to the mall to buy maternity wear, Emiko said to Alice, "Did you see the look on Nicole's face when you mad ethat 'orgy' remark? I think she was wondering if we're''together'!"

"Well", said Alice, "Someone's got to make an honest woman out of me!"

They picked up some clothing, and Alice changed into some of it in the store.

"Well, now you look like a proper mommy", said Emiko.

Alice huffed from the effort of walking. "Your turn will come, Emiko."

The two did some more shopping, and then headed back to Alice's apartment. Once there, they rested for a while, and then began working which of their things they would take to Nicole's, and which they would put into storage. After a while, Alice looked up, and noticed that it was nearly 6:00 .p.m.

So, she thought, it's time for Day Seven.
1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.title: "We accept your generous offer."

1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.content:
Alice and Emiko spent a quiet Wednesday evening together. Thursday morning, Alice found she had gained even more weight. Emiko had to help her out of bed and she found walking difficult. When she got to the bathroom,she noticed that her breasts were leaking. It was really starting to hit home to her that she was going to give birth in two days. She was also getting stretch marks.

"You OK in there, kid?" said Emiko.

"Yeah, I'm just pregnant, that's all. I'll get over it in a day or two. I'm also really itchy."

She waddled out for breakfast. She heard Emiko race into the bathroom behind her, and then the sound of her vomiting. Poor thing, she thought, lowering herself into a chair. Emiko joined her a while later.

That morning, Alice called her landlady and let her know her situation. The landlady was sympathetic and the call went smoothly.

Alice's back was hurting her, so she spent most of the day sitting around, while Emiko worked on packing things up. Later, Emiko went out shopping for various baby things that Alice would need, having them all shipped to Nicole's condo. While Alice was sitting around, she spent time researching as much as she could about child care. She really missed her mother - she had no close older female relatives to advise her in a situation like this. Emiko was lucky, she at least would have more time to prepare, and could always consult with her mom, if need be.

Emiko came back from the store, and plopped down onto the couch next to Alice.

"Stairs are already a pain for me", said Emiko. "I can't imagine what they'll be like in a couple of months."

Alice smiled fondly at her friend. Emiko was making such an effort for her!

"You know,Emiko, you thought Nicole wondered if we were a couple. Maybe it's not so funny. I can't imagine loving anyone as much as I love you right now."

"Are you sure that's not just the hormones talking?"

"Maybe a little", smiled Alice. "But I really do love you for everything you've done for me this week."

"I love you, too, sweetie", said Emiko. "Friends to the end. Besides, your day to do things for me will come!"

Alice smiled at her and said, "I'm so glad I - BLAARRP!"

Emiko laughed, "You always did have a way with words, dear."

"Damn indigestion!" came her friend's reply.

The pair kept busy with their preparations the rest of the afternoon. Eventually, Alice got hungry, and looked up to see if it was suppertime. It was 5:45 p.m., just about time to eat, and just about the start of her eighth day.
1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.title: Day Seven for Alice

1453311122121122111121221112211122122121.content:
That night, Emiko and Alice had a quiet evening together. The next morning, Alice woke up early. For the first time in several days, she didn't feel any heavier than she had when she'd gone to bed.

Later that morning, they went to see Doctor Gomulka. Emiko went in first and Doctor Gomulka pronounced her and her baby healthy. Alice went in next and did her best to make the pretense that hers was a normal pregnancy. There were some awkward moments, but in the end, she pronounced Alice and her baby healthy as well.


Afterwards, they had a light lunch. When they left the restaurant after they were done eating, Alice soon realized that Emiko wasn't driving them home.

"Where are we going?"

"You'll see."

Soon, they pulled up at Nicole's condo.

"Why are we here?"

"You'll see."

Emiko opened the door with a key Nicole had given her, waving Alice in ahead of her.

"Hey, it's all dark in here", said Alice.

Emiko flipped on the light switch.

"SURPRISE!" said Emiko, Nicole and Sheila.

"What?" asked Alice.

"Well, I couldn't let you get by without a baby shower, now could I?" replied Emiko.

The shower proceeded with the mixture of forced hilarity and good fellowship that such events usually entailed. When a quiet moment arrived, Sheila spoke up.

"Can I ask you all a question? Don't answer it if it's too personal, but have any of you given serious consideration to giving your babies up for adoption.
I'm not saying you should, just asking if any of you thought about it?"
