1453311211222111121111221212111.content:
Nicole felt her heart stop and drop down into the pit of her stomach as she saw her mother's usual smug facial expression greeting her at the doorway. Whether it was because she wanted to remind her daughter about the job interview she had coming up, or whether it was indeed just a spontaneous visit Nicole didn't know or care. Either way, she knew that right now she was dead, and chose at this moment to starting writing her will mentally.

"Well hello Nicole I-" Lucille Winters started off cheery enough for about all of five seconds before looking down, and found herself speechless, not even noticing her jaw's efforts to try and stretch all the way to the ground as her mouth opened and tried to form words. Normally, Nicole would find this sort of reaction hilarious if not for the fact that she was quivering in fear at the fact that whatever came next would not be pretty at all.

"U-um...hey mom...what bring you here?" She tried lamely in an attempt to engage in a casual conversation with her pregnant mother. However, all this did was bring her mom out of her shocked state as her look of bewilderment turned into an icy glare that made Nicole shiver even more and subconsciously hug her belly as if trying to hide her unborn children from her mother's impending wrath.

"Nicole. Shosanna. Winters." Nicole flinched as she heard her mother say her full name in what might be the calmest voice she'd ever heard her mother use with her.

"Y-Yes mother?"

"I think you have some explaining to do." Despite the even tone of voice her mother said this in, Nicole knew that this tone of voice meant only one thing. Lucille Winters was absolutely furious.

"Listen mom I-"

"YOU WHAT?!?" Her mother cut her off, finally showing her rage as her voice made Nicole shrink and take a few steps back into the living room. "You forgot to take your birth control Nicole? Is that it?!? OH or maybe you decided that it'd be fine and that you could take a chance with these things! " Nicole could only whimper in fear as she found her mother continuing to step towards her with each and every word she shouted, and even though she knew that her own orb of life utterly dwarfed her mother's in terms of size, Nicole felt that her mom's presence was much larger than her's at the moment. "So just WHAT can you say that would even somewhat justify this?!?" Lucille yelled furiously as she poked Nicole's pregnant tummy in an accusing manner.

"M-Mom I-I don't..." Nicole stuttered, absolutely terrified by her mother as tears began to form in her eyes, "I don't know how...it just...happened." This was obviously not the response her mother was looking for as her mother's face somehow managed to look even more angry at hearing this. Suddenly though, Lucille's face changed from a vehement rage to an eerily calm fashion as she began laughing bitterly.

"Well I can't say I didn't picture this happening at some point now that I think about it." Her mother said as she smirked darkly. "You were always such a spoiled little brat who never worked for anything in her life except to party,get drunk, and bed as many guys as possible." Her mother laughed harshly at this while Nicole could only cry silently. "Heh, I guess it was only a matter of time before it all came back to haunt you like this." Lucille grinned mockingly as she gave her daughter's much larger belly a few pats. "Just how many little future money-grubbing parasites have you got in that thing anyways?" She asked more out of disgust than curiosity.

"S-Seven..." Nicole whispered quietly as she saw her mother's face take on a look of absolute surprise before she started laughing. However, this was warm or happy laughter, it was a cruel, mocking laugh that only made it harder for Nicole to keep herself from outright mourning in the same manner Rachel had done yesterday afternoon. Fortunately, as Nicole felt her lips quiver, and a sob about to escape, her mother's laughs soon turned into snickers before she finally regained her composure and gave her daughter a cold look.

"Well then I suppose you'll know how it feels to have some ungrateful little creature mooching off of your funds for the rest of your life, except multiplied by seven!" Her mother said, giving her a hollow smile. "I suppose with this...heavy bit of news I'll be taking my leave." Nicole looked up in surprise at this, and saw her mother waddling towards the still open door. She's seriously not going to do anything then? She asked herself in a vain hope.

"Make no mistake though Nicole," Her mother added with her back turned to her as if hearing her thoughts, "even though I fully expected this to happen, I mean with your lifestyle how could it not, you are most certainly in deep trouble." Her mother spat. "We'll be having a very long talk with your father tomorrow, and you can show your dear cousins what happens when someone lives the kind of hedonistic lifestyle you do." She added that last part in more to mock her than anything Nicole figured. "Goodbye daughter." Lucille drawled out the word as if it was completely foreign to her before stomping furiously out the door and slamming it behind her.

Nicole could only stumble back and fall in a heap onto the couch as she let the waterworks flow, tears flowing like rivers down the sides of her face. She didn't know how long she cried for, only that it was certainly more than an hour before she finally began to stop as she shakily made her way back to the bathroom. Looking at her reflection in the mirror, she saw that the encounter with her mother had left her worse for the wear. Her usually straightened gorgeous blonde locks were in disarray, her blue eyes were veiny and bloodshot from all the crying she had done, and worst of all, her children were kicking up a storm in response to the stressful situation and she hadn't eaten at all, leaving her completely famished. Now, with all that had happened in the morning and looking at her reflection before her mother had come over, Nicole had seen an expansion in both her butt, and especially her belly, and with both of those features having made themselves so readily apparent, she easily assumed from the size comparison of her belly that her breasts hadn't grown at all. This of course was not the case as she suddenly noticed that her bra felt unusually tight, and that the certain heaviness that her breasts had been feeling all day was even more prominent than before.

"W-what the hell is wrong now?" She growled angrily as she cupped her boobs and jiggled them in frustration, as if trying to make the feeling go away by shaking it out.

*SNAP!* This had proven to be the wrong thing to do as that much of a ruckus caused her already strained bra to be pushed past its limit and finally give out. Nicole stared in shock and reached inside to remove the now too small undergarment. Great... she thought sadly, guess me and Betty are gonna need another shopping trip... she looked up and furrowed her brows angrily, and to top it all off that fat cow made me get tear-stains on my new shirt! However, upon closer inspection she realized something, the stains on her shirt were not clear like tears would be. These stains trailed down her shirt starting around her chest area, leaving a wavering trail of white that oddly looked a lot like-

"Milk..." Nicole breathed out, now adding lactation stains as yet another reason to the list of why today was already the worst day ever.

Seeing as she really had no tears left to cry with since her earlier episode used them all up, Nicole knew she needed someone to talk to. Someone who she knew would at least comfort her in her time of need, and so after having a brief battle with getting her cellphone out of her sweatpants pocket, it being harder to do now that her center of gravity was thrown off, and due to the fact that her belly and breasts largely obstructed her view, she decided to call...
1453311211222111121111221212111.title: Her mom in a surprise visit!

14533112112221111211112212121112.content:
Rachel clicked to recent calls and swiped Betty's name.

Betty always knows what to do; she'll help me out.

Nicole waited. And waited. The only advice she heard from Betty was how to leave a message after the beep. Nicole hurriedly called again, hand trembling a bit. Again there was no answer.

If Betty can't help me...who can? She felt her eyes begin to well up again before she had a thought.

Rachel does owe me one... Scrolling through her phone she found her cousin's name.

After a moment the line clicked, "Nicole? Nicole is that you?"

"H-Hi Rachel."

"I don't think you've ever called me, what's going on?"

"I-I..." Nicole found herself at a loss for words.

In a tiny voice Nicole managed to spit out, "Would you mind coming over?"

"I'll be there." The line clicked and went dead.

"Rachel? Rachel?" Nicole looked at her phone, the blank screen revealing nothing. Dropping her head backwards into the couch cushion, she sighed. A growl burst forth from her engorged midsection. During the confrontation with her mother, Nicole had completely forgotten about breakfast. But her body hadn't.

"Alright, alright. Let's get a little something to eat." Another growl came forth, much louder than the first. Nicole rolled her eyes. "Or a lot something to eat." She repeated her earlier maneuver scooting her backside towards the edge of the couch and thrusting upwards, but found herself falling backwards instead of toppling forwards. Grimacing, Nicole repeated her movements, again crashing back down to Earth.

"You're kidding me." Nicole slumped in her seat, her purple-clad breasts and tanned belly blocking her view almost entirely.

Now what?

Just as she began to accept her fate, a sharp rapping came from the front door.

"Nicole? Nicole are you okay?" Rachel's voice was muffled, but Nicole could hear the concern in her voice.

She's worried about me...

"I-I'm okay, the door's unlocked." The handle turned and in waddled Rachel. Glancing about for a second she found Nicole on the couch.

"Oh my God! Nicole!"

"What's up?" Nicole nervously laughed.

"Apparently my cousin, the most pregnant woman in the U.S., what happened?" She offered her hand.

"Guess I had a...little growth spurt last night." The girls grunted as Rachel got to her feet.

"Woooow" Rachel marveled at the vast expanse of her cousin's stomach, "Can I?" Nicole blushed and nodded. Rachel slowly grasped the sides of her belly, gradually making her way outwards. Nicole closed her eyes, tingles going up her spine.

"I can't believe this is all you."

"Neither can I" Nicole purred, her eyes still closed.

"Wow, I can't believe this is all you either!" Nicole opened her eyes to feel a light pat on her bottom.

"H-hey! It's not that big...is it?"

Rachel smirked, placing her hand on a cocked hip, "Nicole, you have more junk in your trunk than half the women on this floor."

Nicole looked over her shoulder and popped her hip, "But I'm the only one who makes it look this good." Both girls burst out laughing, their respective assets set bouncing. Wiping a tear from her eye, Rachel spoke up.

"So was that all you needed? A crane to get you off the couch?" Nicole's face sank.

"N-no. M-my mom came over this morning." Nicole told her whole story. From when she first started noticing her belly, to dinner at her parent's house, all the way up until her mom berated her this morning. To her credit, Rachel listened intently without interruption, only handing her the occasional tissue.

"You think I'm crazy don't you?" Nicole said, blowing her nose.

"No, I think this is crazy" pointing to her stomach, "and this" gesturing towards her own, "but not you." After a night of growth, Rachel was doing her best to make up for lost time. Looking to all the world like she was eight or nine months pregnant, her growth had clearly outstripped her outfits. Her breasts were much heavier behind her thin shirt and her belly made itself known poking out from under it.

"So what do you think I should do?"

Rachel let out a small breath and raised her eyes to the ceiling. After a moment, she spoke, "Before we start investigating magical pregnancies, I think you should go to the interviews."

"Like this? You can't be serious?"

"It's the only way to show your parents you are serious." Nicole wanted to look down at her feet, but only found her cleavage instead.

"I don't know...I wasn't sure I could do this before, but now..." She trailed off.

"Hey, c'mere" Rachel waddled over to her cousin, clasping her around the shoulder. "I'll help you pick out an outfit and drop you off. You've got this." Nicole couldn't help but smile. She had never received this sort of support from anyone in her family. And here was Rachel, with her own problems and issues helping Nicole with hers.
14533112112221111211112212121112.title: Rachel to the rescue

145331121122211112111122121211121.content:
"Thanks Rachel." She turned to hug her cousin but found it practically impossible. Her bump operated as a blockade, keeping anyone from getting a couple feet from her front.

"Guess we should get used to that." The girls shared another laugh. Simultaneously, a pair of growls erupted from the girls' stomachs.

"Should probably eat before I go." Nicole slowly waddled her way to the kitchen. "Come on, join me, I know you're hungrrryy."

"I shouldn't...I already ate a ton before I left this morning. But what the hell, we're growing girls, right?" During the next hour, Nicole and Rachel set about demolishing Nicole's food supply. Dozens of eggs, pounds of bacon, hash browns, loaves of bread. The whole milk flowed like water. In a surprise to both, Rachel was the one who ate the most. Her stomach was visibly bigger, repulsing her shirt.

"Oh my God, I can't believe we ate that much." Rachel groaned, massaging her belly.

"Me either. I think I might burst." Rachel was splayed out on her easy chair, rubbing what she could of her own stomach.

"Seconds?" The girls laughed as best they could with their lungs being crushed. Nicole couldn't remember the last time she had a good time with her family. Discounting shopping trips with her father.

"C'mon, let's get you dressed." The two sluggishly made their way to Nicole's closet. The two began searching through her newest purchases. The dress she had worn the day before was the first thing passed over. After some trial and error, all dresses were discarded, as was anything with buttons up the front. After an exhaustive search, Rachel came to a conclusion.

"You're going to have to show your belly."

"There is absolutely no way. There is no way they'd take me seriously with a gigantic tan belly in their face."

Rachel shrugged, "Look, we have one skirt that can fit over your ass, and barely at that. That green turtleneck looks the best, but we still have nothing that comes close to covering that. It's either we use a tarp, you go bare-belly or not at all."

Nicole bit her lip. Coming to terms with being hugely pregnant was one thing; going out in public flaunting it in everyone's faces was quite another. As she imagined everyone staring at her, one face came to the forefront. Her mother's. Growling, she grabbed the clothes and began pulling the sweater over her head.

"Umm, Nicole? Might want to put on a bra first unless you want to put someone's eye out." Squeezing into another maternity bra, Nicole set about getting dressed. The turtleneck went on well enough, wrapping tightly around her endowments. She similarly had trouble pulling her pencil skirt over her wide bottom and hips. Eventually, it popped up, barely covering her lower curves.

"Well" Nicole said breathlessly, "how do I look?"

"Like a receptionist. A really, really pregnant receptionist. Now come on, you're going to be late." After squeezing into the clothes, Nicole had to squeeze into Rachel's car. Even with the seat pushed all the way back, her belly brushed the dashboard. After a few minutes, the girls arrived at the address her father provided. As luck would have it, there was a spot in the front open. Thankful for the first time that week, Nicole heaved herself out of the car. The two girls waddled through the double doors into the lobby. A receptionist preoccupied with answering phones didn't notice the girls come in.

*Ahem* Nicole cleared her throat. The receptionist put on her fake smile, and turned only to be met by Nicole's belly. Grin falling, she stared open-mouthed. Nicole felt her face burn brighter than ever before. After a few moments, Rachel spoke up.

"Nicole Winters here for a job interview." Blinking and shaking her head, the secretary came back to Earth.

"I'm sorry, we're not hiring any...expecting mothers right now."

"No, you're mistaken. She has a scheduled interview for 11 AM." The receptionist's cheery grin faded, replaced by a smirk.

"Look, I don't care if you have an appointment. No knocked up slut is going to get hired here." With that, she turned back to the phone. Nicole's face burned again, this time with rage.

Flip Me

Digging a hand into her impossibly tight pocket, she grabbed the unnaturally cool coin. Flipping it and catching it in one motion, she slipped the coin back. Immediately the receptionist began to grow. Within an instant, her belly filled her lap and her breasts filled her shirt.

Reality Change

"I'm so sorry, I don't know what came over me. Us soon-to-be mothers have to stick together, right? You said your name was Rachel Winters? Of course, you’re right here. You're on floor three, room 304. Just take your first right. Good luck." The girls waddled to the elevator.

"That was...weird, right?"

"Yeah, I don't...whatever. I'll wait down here, alright? You've got this." Rachel took Nicole's hand in hers and squeezed.

"Thanks Rachel...for everything."

"That's what family's for, right?" Rachel let her hand fall away, making her way back to the lobby. The elevator doors opened and Nicole stepped in. A bell sounded, announcing her floor. She turned down the padded hallway. Finding room 204, she took a deep breath and knocked.

"Come in!" A muffled voice called. She entered and found herself staring at...

choices: Mitch van Gundy, Head of HR
1453311211222111121111221212111211.content:
“I’m Lisa Stinton, the manager here, you must be Rach-whoa.” Finally looking up, Lisa found a way to cut herself off. Slightly older than Rachel’s cousins, Lisa Stinton held a position beyond her years. Nicole had a few ideas about how she achieved this.

Straightening her back, Rachel waddled forward and extended her hand.

“Yes, I’m Rachel Winters. Lovely to meet you Lisa.” Pivoting the chair, Rachel squished her swollen butt into its tiny frame parallel to the desk.

“Yeah…nice to meet you too…” Lisa had yet to take her eyes off of Rachel’s belly. After a minute of silence Rachel cleared her throat.

“Oh! Of course, I’m so sorry. Your father did not mention your…condition. That might prove…tricky down the line.”

Rachel felt her stomach drop, “Tricky how?”

“Well, taking you on as a full-time employee would automatically entitle you to benefits, one of which is maternity leave. It doesn’t quite make sense to hire you only for you to leave. I’m sorry.” Lisa shuffled papers on her desk.

“Wait, so you’re turning me down already? I don’t even get a chance for the other two interviews?”

“I’m sorry, there’s nothing I can do. Good luck in the future.” Lisa turned to her computer and began typing, oblivious to Nicole’s hateful grin.

Flip Me

Nothing you can do, huh? How about this?

Nicole flipped the coin, catching it as it landed heads.

Reality Change

Immediately Lisa began to show the effects. Her starched white blouse began to billow out. Her already large breasts became even larger, close to the size of her head. Even with the increasing size, gaps between the buttons showed hints of a pink bra. Formerly flat, her stomach burst out, filling her lap and pushing her away from her desk. Bigger than a woman at term it continued to grow. Reaching a size close to Rachel, she finally stopped, a full two feet away from her keyboard. A skin-tight pencil skirt crept up her thighs, revealing her slightly thicker legs. Her ass seemed to mirror Rachel’s, pushing out of the gaps in her rolling chair. Panting, Lisa turned back towards Rachel.

“O-of c-course, ex-exceptions can be m-made.” She wiped her brow, a sheen of perspiration had formed during her growth.

“Are you okay? What just happened?” Rachel was sure she had just changed somehow, but she couldn’t put her finger on it. Was it her belly? Boobs? Something else? It was the strangest sense of déjà vu she just couldn’t shake.

“Oh I’m fine, I’m sure you know how it is. Just getting up when you’re this big is exercise enough.” Lisa chuckled, upper body jiggling. Rachel gave a half-hearted laugh, the situation still bothering her.

“Anyway, down to business. Now, you don’t have to answer this, but how far along are you?” Thinking back to the doctor’s appointment yesterday, Nicole answered.

“A little over four months.”

“Wow. And I thought having four kids was three too many,” She patted her side, “how many are you having?”

“Uh, seven, but look, Lisa, if I can’t get the job I’d just as well go, I can-“ Lisa whistled, cutting Rachel off this time.

“Seven? Wow. Look, I’m sorry I had to be rough on you at first. I know how hard it is to be a working mom. Seeing as you’re only four months pregnant, right?” Nicole vigorously nodded. “Then there’s no reason not to hire you.”

“You’re serious?” Nicole sat up in her chair, taking a deep breath.

“Just hold on a minute, I have to ask you a few questions first.” Nicole collapsed back into her seat.

“Can you type at least 70 wpm?”

“Umm, yeah. I think over 90 last time I checked.”

“Can you answer the phone in a polite and professional manner?”

Nicole mimed holding a phone to her ear, “Hello, R&R Industries, Nicole speaking. How may I direct your call? One moment sir.”

“Perfect. And can you operate a multi-line telephone?”

“I was practically born with a phone in my hand.”

“Then congratulations.” This time it was Lisa who offered her hand. Nicole took it, tentatively.

“You mean…”

“As long as nothing comes up in the other interviews, you’ve got the job.” Nicole could have kissed her.

“Oh, thank you so much, I can’t thank you enough, my dad will be so happy-“

“Now hold on, you haven’t got the job yet. Thank me after the next two interviews. Your next one is on the 6th floor, room 627.” The two women rose, each prying their asses out of their seats.

“Now the next guy, Mitch? The head of HR? He’s kind of a perv. Little ironic, huh? So look out.” Nicole nodded, thankful for the advice.

“I love your gall, by the way. Why try and hide something that big, right?” Lisa rubbed her own naked stomach.

“More of a forced choice than anything.” Nicole awkwardly smiled.

“Knock ‘em dead.” Nicole slowly closed the door behind her. Unable to contain herself any longer, she pumped her fists into the air, jumping for joy. Well, it was more of a tippy toes than a jump. Nicole had all the confidence in the world. Waddling back to the elevator with renewed strength, she pried her phone from her pocket. Texting Rachel giving her the good news, she hopped on the elevator to the 6th floor. Unlike the first ride, a man accompanied her on this ride. She could feel his roving eyes behind her.

She loved it.

As the bell rang for the 6th floor, she waddled out and bent over ever so slightly revealing the bottom of her plump cheeks. Looking over her shoulder she could see the man turn bright red and furiously press the close-door button. Nicole snickered.

I am the hottest woman in this building. Nothing is going to stop me.

She felt a pinching around her breasts.

Except maybe a bra.

Retreating to the ladies’ room, she stripped off her sweater to find her maternity bra woefully too tight. Her breasts were overflowing the cups and the straps were digging into her shoulders.

I can’t go braless, but this thing is hurting too much. What do I do?

Just as Nicole was about to text Rachel, she remembered what Lisa had told her.

Big perv, eh?

Ripping off her bra and tossing in the trash can, she got back into her sweater and waddled out. Feeling the release of the confines of the bra, she put the fact that she had outgrown a bra in a day out of her mind. Finding the right door, she knocked.

“Mr. van Gundy?” Using her huskier voice had worked for picking up boys; why couldn’t it work for getting a job?

“C-come in.” Nicole opened the door and found…

14533112112221111211112212121112111.content:
Nicole smiled sweetly as she waddled into the office, her belly bumping against the chair she was trying to sexily slide into. Mitch van Gundy was just as she expected: a silver-haired older guy, face covered in a soft mask of beard stubble, already growing back after his morning shave. Nicole batted her lashes at him. She had plenty of experience with getting older men to do what she wanted, thanks to years of experience with her father.

"Hello, I'm Nicole Winters. I'm interviewing for a job here as a receptionist and Lisa Stinton sent me to your office," Nicole said, one hand moving to her wide hips.

Mitch looked at her with a big, surprised gaze. "This whole damn office is turning into some sort of lamaze class or nursery," he said, clicking out of something on his computer and bringing over a folder. "Please, have a seat and we'll get started."

Nicole took one look at the small wooden chair Mitch had for visitors and one look at her belly and knew she wasn't going in there. "I'll just stand, if you don't mind," Nicole said, patting her belly. "Sometimes it's good to be on my feet and get a little bit of exercise."

Mitch shrugged and looked back at his papers. The smile slowly faded from Nicole's face. She underestimated the effect her pregnancy would have on everyone. This guy seemed too stuffy to fully "appreciate" Nicole's looks. Mitch van Gundy was, in fact, quite a stuffy guy and he started working at the office, the only jobs women were getting were receptionists. Now he had that Lisa Stinton breathing down his neck and everything was changing. And what's more, he had a coworker who was pregnant! Well, he was in no mood to keep that trend going.

"Alright, first question," Mitch said, looking up at Nicole, half of her belly above the desk. "What's your college experience?"

"None. I decided I wanted to start getting professional experience as soon as I could," Nicole lied, bending down and pointing to her file on Mitch's desk, making sure her cleavage, now unencumbered by her bra, was up front. "You can see here, I was recommended to come here by my father, Roger Winters."

Mitch looked at Nicole's chest as he responded. "Yes, we have a history of working with Mr. Winters." A thin line of sweat accumulated on his forehead. "W-well then, next question...what is your previous job experience?"

Nicole had never worked a day in her life but needed something to keep this old perv's attention. "Food service. I was a waitress at Hooter's." Nicole stood up and put one hand on her hip, popping it out while miming carrying a tray of food. "Can't you picture me serving you? 'I've got a big order of buffalo wings. Now, I heard it was someone's birthday?'"

Mitch slowly started to grin. "Is that so? Well, some day you'll have to show us all your old outfit."

Nicole giggled, trying to sound as flirty as she could. "I'l see, but it might not fit over this big ball anymore," she said, patting her massive womb.

Mitch's grin vanished and he cleared his throat, going back to his notes. Damn, she thought, Shouldn't have reminded him about the pregnancy.

"Miss Winters, let me be very frank," Mitch said, crossing his hands and looking at Nicole. Well, he was looking at her chest, but he continued all the same. "I am the head of human resources here at R&R Industries. My job is to make sure all of our employees work well together. I keep the order and R&R is a successful business because of it."

That could not be further from the truth. Mitch van Gundy, though his actions, made R&R Industries one of the top companies in the country for sexual harassment. Ass patting, breast groping, rude comments, and nearly anything else you could imagine. It was a real piece of work. Little did Nicole know, of course.

"And frankly, having pregnant employees ruins that cohesion," Mitch continued. "You draw attention away with your aches and needs until you're on a long vacation to have your kids and come back not caring about your work. Legally, I can't refuse to hire you just because you're pregnant, unfortunately. Unless you're going to pop out your kids soon."

"Oh no, I'm just four months along," Nicole said, running her hands up her sides. "I've got a long way to grow." She made this last comment as her hands were near her breasts, which was no accident.

The gesture was not lost on Mitch. "Well, in that case...let's see, you were already approved by Lisa and you do have a good recommendation. But you're also pregnant and young." He looked back up at her. "But there's a few things about you I wouldn't mind seeing around the office every day."

Nicole was a little taken aback by his openness at this point. "So, what'll it be, Mitch?" She said with pouting lips, bending down again.

"It's a toss-up for me," Mitch said quietly, stroking his chin.

Flip me

Nicole nodded to the voice in her head and reached into her pocket, bringing the coin, which had been very useful lately, out into the open and gave it a quick flip. Tails.

Mitch suddenly turned pale and looked around the room, where there was no trashcan in sight. "Umm...if y-you'd excuse me a moment."

Nicole took a small step and blocked Mitch's way with her belly. "Oh, Mitch, you can't leave until I know," she said cutely, looking at him. "C'mon, it's an easy decision to make."

"Miss, get out of my-" Mitch let out a small burp and gripped his stomach. "Okay, okay, you've got it, now just get out of my way." Nicole smiled triumphantly as she turned her belly, letting Mitch run to the bathroom. Grinning, Nicole waddled back to the elevator and returned to Lisa's office.

Not finding her, Nicole waddled around until she came across Lisa resting against the wall by the water cooler, rubbing and stroking her bare belly as she polished off a cup of water and refilled it.

"Ah, Nicole," Lisa smiled, gulping down the water. "Sorry if you were looking for me. Drinking cool water calms these four down, it seems," she said, stroking the side of her round bulge. "You're only four months along but you should start feeling kicking soon."

"I hope so," Nicole said. Actually, she hadn't thought about that aspect of pregnancy yet, it just sounded like something that would make Lisa happy. But it was something she would have to accept eventually. She was, after all, pregnant. "Anyway, I just finished interviewing with Mitch and he approved me. Who do I go to now?"

Lisa raised her eyebrow, assuming Mitch took one look at Nicole's chest and agreed to hire her. "Last up is the head of administrations, just down the hall. Good luck."

"Thank you," Nicole smiled, waddling off to the last obstacle to her getting a job and getting her father and pregnant mother off her back.

145331121122211112111122121211121112.content:
Rachel sighed frustratedly and dropped her head on the steering wheel of her car. She was absolutely bored, and normally she'd have no trouble finding something to do, this was the busiest part of the city after all, except there was one thing in her way, inner city traffic. She muttered quiet curses as she heard the car behind her honk angrily and looked up from her makeshift blindfold. She pushed on the gas pedal lightly and felt as her car lurched forward in response, she sped up as much as she could in an attempt to at least feel some sort of freedom from her car-based prison, if only for a few moments.

"Aw forget it!" She grumbled, parking in a nearby vacant lot. Figuring that at this rate she'd be getting nowhere fast, she leaned her seat back and decided to wait. However, as fate would have it, she felt her phone vibrate, and looked at it to find a text from Nicole telling her to come pick her up.

"Well back into the fray..." She sighed and started her car, pulling out of the lot and then headed for the building Nicole was being interviewed at. Speaking of Nicole... a lot has happened with her lately hasn't it... She thought to herself. Thinking back on the past couple of days that she'd arrived along with her other cousins she realized that the events as of late seemed to be centered around the Winters family. Literally one thing after the other, first it was her aunt Lucy announcing, or rather showing, that she was pregnant, then Stacy, and now Nicole and herself? It was all too surreal in her mind. Strangely enough Jenny seemed to be the only one unaffected by this weird pregnancy epidemic, but from how she was acting, Rachel wouldn't be too surprised if she had an announcement of her own to make pretty soon.

This line of thought made her trickle back down to two factors. Her cousin Nicole, and herself. Before this all had started, she hadn't been one to be as catty or as biting with her remarks as her other cousins were, and so she'd never really liked to make fun of Nicole. Of course, after hearing from aunt Lucille and the behind the back comments her other cousins made about her, she had subconsciously began to accept this as the truth. They had called her spoiled, bratty, and the laziest person they'd ever met, and also usually worked in the fact that she liked to mooch off of her father's bank account. Of course, while all of the above was true, after yesterday, she'd come to realize that maybe under different circumstances, they would have seen that Nicole was actually a pretty nice person if you treated her right, and had something to sympathize about, in this case, lamenting a pregnancy. Despite this fact, she knew that after this, even if her cousins and parents didn't have her back, Nicole would know that at least Rachel had hers.

Besides, she giggled to herself, it'd be great if we could babysit for each other. God knows that it's going to be havoc trying to take care of four and seven children...

That's another thing... She realized. The pregnancies. Now she didn't know why, but even though the doctor had told her that she was only about 4 months along, she had felt like it was only a couple days strangely enough. Nicole however...she hadn't even been showing a couple of days ago, and now to this morning she'd ballooned out to an impossible size. Even yesterday she had looked much too big compared to the day before, seven children or not, no one could possibly gestate that fast...could they? Something weird is going on... Rachel thought to herself, brows furrowing, and even if Nicole doesn't realize it, we need to figure out what it is...and fast! As she finished the thought, she placed a hand on her belly, letting out a squeak at feeling a particularly strong kick from one of her quadruplets. She definitely wasn't used to this-

"Hey Rachel!"

"Wagh!" Rachel shrieked and jumped in her seat, not realizing that she'd been parked in front of the building where Nicole had gone to. Also, her cousin had somehow evaded her eyesight, even with that ridiculously large belly, opened the door, and gotten in. Either I'm really bad at being aware of things, she's a pregnant ninja, or I was really deep in thought... she decided to go with option three and turned to face her cousin. Looking up past the gigantic tan belly that was in front of her, she gave her cousin a glare. "Not funny Nicole! You nearly made me have a heart attack!"

"Not my fault you were zoned out like that!" Nicole giggled, sticking her tongue out playfully, "besides how could you even miss something like this, " she gave her belly a pat, "getting into your car hm?"

"Just thinking." Rachel replied with a roll of her eyes at her cousin's immature response.

"Yeah? About what? Must have been pretty good to make you miss my fat*** getting in."

"Nevermind, wasn't really important," Nicole's face fell, and Rachel could tell she wanted to press the issue, and so she quickly switched the subject to something else, "so uh how'd the interviews go?" All of a sudden Rachel heard Nicole fall quiet, and raised her eyebrow in confusion. "Nicole? you back there? Did you get the job?" She looked back to find her cousin...

1453311211222111121111221212111211121.content:
Nicole beamed, puffing her already puffed-up chest out as she reached for the seatbelt. "I got the job, easy. The first woman was knocked up so she was easy to get to sympathize with me." Nicole laughed at her words. "Geez, I've only known I was pregnant for a few days and I can already bond with other pregnant women."

Rachel smiled back, knowing exactly what Nicole was talking about. While the circumstances behind Rachel's pregnancy weren't...ideal, she was looking forward to using it to squeeze sympathy and benefits out of other people. Rachel and her sisters may not be as spoiled as their cousin, but they knew how to manipulate people to get what they wanted. Still, part of Nicole's comment confused her some. A few days? Nicole looked like she was due to go into labor last month. How did she only know about her pregnancy recently?

"And then the second and third guy were both perverts who were pretty easy to manipulate. The second guy was a jerk and complained about pregnant women working there but he couldn't keep his eyes off of my chest. Luckily, he ran off to the bathroom so he had to make a quick decision and thought with his dick, I guess."

Rachel chuckled. She had never been all that kind to Nicole, but spending time with her like this and joining in on her bitchy capers was fun. "And the third guy?"

"Total perv, through and through," Nicole said, smiling with a little shudder. "He paced around me, eyes all over. I thought he'd actually try and cop a feel at one point."

"And you still want to work there?" Rachel said, raising an eyebrow.

"Anything to get Daddy off my back," Nicole said, rolling her eyes. "And it's paid pretty well. Besides, look at me. I've had guys hitting on me all through middle and high school. There's probably not a lot of guys who'll want to hit on me now, anyway," Nicole added, running her hands up and down her gigantic belly. "I'd say I could bring my big, muscular boyfriend around one day to scare people off but...he hasn't seen me like this yet."

Rachel looked over and saw the signs of sadness begin to crack Nicole's positive outlook. "Well, how serious are you two? You should tell him that he's going to have-"

"They're not his!" Nicole said loudly, crossing her arms, which only served to squish and emphasize her chest more. "Can you drive already? These brats are kicking my bladder."

Rachel powered up the car and headed back to Nicole's apartment, looking over at her cousin, both to see how she was doing and to catch a glimpse of her impossibly big belly. It was a rare sight, after all. "Sorry I...pressed the issue," Rachel finally said.

"It's okay," Nicole said. "You didn't know. This is all new to me too." She turned back to Rachel and smiled a little. "You know, I always hated you and your sisters but...today you're been okay."

Rachel smiled at her cousin. "We're not always so hot about you. Especially Jenny. Since you're the closest in age of the three of us, she feels like she has to especially one-up you."

"I might have guessed," Nicole smirked. "Well, she's not a pregnant cow so she might have that one-up for sure now."

Rachel giggled a little, both unaware that Jenny was pregnant with quintuplets, doomed to grow by one month each day. Right as they pulled into Nicole's apartment, Rachel started to turn red as Nicole struggled to get out. Her belly pushed against the front of the car, making her nervous she might set off an airbag, and turned her wide hips sideways to get out of the seat. Her belly bounced and sloshed around as she stepped out. Rachel was amazed she snuck into the car in the first place with all this difficulty.

"Hey Nicole?" Rachel said slowly. Nicole stuck her hips out and waddled around to Rachel's window, panting when she got there. "Since I didn't blab about your pregnancy, would it be okay if I confided a secret in you?" Her face got even redder. "I feel like I'm going to explode if I don't get it out."

Normally, Nicole would have smiled like a snake and then told everyone her bitch cousin's secret, but she was seeing a different side to Rachel. "Sure, Rachel."

Rachel took a deep breath. "The baby...the babies aren't Peter's."

Nicole scrunched her eyebrows. "R-really?" Rachel showed off how she was getting married to hunky, successful Peter all the time. And she got knocked up with some other guy's kids? The old Nicole would DEFINITELY have broadcast this information but she felt differently. Maybe sharing a pregnancy really did make her sympathize with her cousin. "Do you know who the father is?"

Rachel nodded. "Yeah, but is it okay if I don't talk about that?"

Nicole smiled with compassion for what might be the first time in her life. "Sure. Hey, do you want to...hang out with my friend and me tonight?"

Rachel blinked in surprise. "Well, Peter's out of town for the day but...are you sure?"

"It's just me and my other pregnant friend chatting, eating take-out," Nicole said. "Think you can handle that?"

Rachel smiled and turned off the car, undoing her seatbelt. "I think so."
1453311211222111121111221212111211121.title: Grinning happily. She'd gotten the job!

14533112112221111211112212121112111211.content:
"Whew. That-that's enough exercise for the day" Nicole wheezed. Carrying her belly from Nicole's car to her apartment now a Herculean effort. She collapsed onto her couch, ignoring the squeaks it emitted. She let the day's events wash over herself.

I have a job. I never thought I'd have a job. Guess I never thought I'd be a mom either. Nicole rubbed her belly, smiling at the kicks she felt. Looking up, she saw Rachel slowly waddling around her living room.

"I know you're confused, but this is what an apartment looks like when someone with good taste decorates it." Rachel slowly turned towards Nicole, eyebrow cocked only to be met with a billion-watt grin.

Rachel rolled her eyes, "Oh please, you wouldn't know good taste it if bit you in your fat ass." The two girls smiled. The two felt familiar with each other even though they had never spent more than a few hours in a row with each other. A few moments of silence passed.

"Don't you think you should call your parents about the job?"

Nicole waved her hand, "I'm sure daddy already knows. If not, they can wait till tomorrow. Let Lucille think I'm a total failure for another few hours."

"Here." Nicole wriggled her fingers in the air. "I'll go change and call Betty and we can get this party started." Waddling into her room, Nicole tugged at the hem of her sweater. Finding it caught around her bust, there was little to no give, she tugged harder. Nothing. Pulling with all her strength, Nicole was finally able to unleash her breasts. As they bounced to a standstill, Nicole felt her breath catch in her chest.

"Rachel? Could you come in here?" Nicole eyed her breasts with caution.

"I swear Nicole, if you got stuck I'll nev-Holy..."

"So I'm not seeing things." Nicole made her way over to Rachel, jaw slack. "Where's the bra you wore today, there's no way that could have fit."

"Eheheheh...I kinda threw it away before my second meeting." Nicole looked downward, blush spreading across her cheeks.

"Why?"

"Well...the pregnant lady from the first interview told me he was a huge perv! And...it didn't fit anymore." Rachel dropped her jaw again.

"We have to go back to the doctor tomorrow. There's no way that can be normal. There's no way this can be normal." She said, gesturing to her own swollen belly.

To say she was in ecstasy was an understatement. The influence of the coin rolled over every thought in Nicole's brain and all she could feel was the complete bliss of carrying life. Nicole's free hand caressed her enormous belly. Somewhere in the depths of her consciousness a skinny little girl screamed at her, shouting back at the sheer size of her pregnancy. That tiny girl led to reason, saying that seven babies was plenty, eight or more was crazy, and flipping the coin for even more was pure insanity.

Flip me Nicole!

It made sense. Pregnancy was beauty. Bigger was better.

Nicole didn't even sense the movement in her fingers that caused the flip, only the gentle movement of air caused by the rotation of the golden disc. A subtle, evil chuckle resonated through her, and though Nicole knew that she had given in to the coin's desire, the sheer pleasure she experienced ruled out all doubt.
A gentle thought informed her that she had previously been the carrier of nine fetuses, but when Nicole caught the coin she knew that was soon to be left behind.

Tails! No reality change!

Nicole first felt the change in her breasts. Though enormous before, now they surpassed the imagination. Roughly the size of beachballs, Nicole felt a warm pulse over their expanse as they swelled. Her nipples erupted from her smooth skin as they engorged larger than any she had ever known, leaking small drops of milk from the huge reservoirs behind them. The rest of her bosom immediately followed suit, her boobs pushing up closer to her chin, inflating beyond any measurement that she could comprehend as they became as large as a normal pregnant belly.

Feeling the warmth in her breasts dissipate, Nicole rested her hands on her belly. A gurgle passed through her gravidity and she felt the expansion start. She could swear she actually felt babies implant in her womb and then proceed to age to a nine month maturity. Her shirt flew off her body, no longer able to cover any square inch of her gravid womb. Eventually her underwear joined the useless shirt as her waist increased to sizes never before seen by man. Nicole slowly sunk to the floor as her belly became too heavy to carry for the time she remained standing. She could feel her thighs spread wider as her belly occupied the only space it could. Her arousal heightened with every millimeter of growth she experienced. The feel of the carpet on her belly, her nipple between her fingers, and the warmth of bloating with an unnatural number of children came crashing down on her as she came as she never had before.

A creak from the front door announced the arrival of both Betty and Rachel with shopping bags in hand.
"Nicole, we found some clothes for you!" came the sound of Betty's voice. The girls heard a loud moan from the bedroom. Curious, they approached the door and were greeted by a titanic wall of flesh.

"Oh my god! Nicole!" exclaimed Rachel.
Nicole looked up at them, lost in a haze of insurmountable pleasure, and grinned. "Oh,hey girls."

choices: Chris! What the hell is he doing here?
145331121122211112111122121211121112112.content:
It was another day down and another day arriving for our pregnant heroines as they felt the kicks of their children let them know that it was both time to wake up and time to eat once again, despite the Chinese binge that the three young mothers had shared last night amongst gossiping.
Rachel was the first to wake up of the three as she tried to ignore the ruckus her brood was making inside of her womb.

“Ugh fine...” she groaned quietly as her eyes fluttered open. Looking around she spotted Betty, who despite her initial expectations showed no signs of growing any larger, the redhead having stayed exactly the same size all around. She counted her cousin's best friend lucky that she didn't have to deal with getting progressively larger so quickly, but at the same time she found it odd. I wonder why me and Nicole have been growing larger and she hasn't...though from what she told me last night she had started out bigger than the rest of us at first. The brunette sighed and rubbed her forehead in frustration. There was so much that they didn't know about, and it was driving her crazy!

Well I'm sure the doctors will at least clear a few things up when we go visit them today, the brunette reassured herself. Looking down at herself she found that she wasn't surprised in the least to see that she had grown once again. Her white and green-sleeved t-shirt that she'd put on for dinner had fit her well enough last night; covering all except a tiny portion of her belly. Now though it seemed that the shirt couldn't be bothered to cover much except for her her breasts, leaving her belly bared for all of the world, or more accurately all of her cousin's condo to see. Speaking of the two aforementioned residents, she found that her maternity bra had gone from slightly loose-fitting to uncomfortably tight in the span of about six hours, which if the insane growth of her cousin's monstrous breasts was anything to go by it would only increase as time went on. After seeing this she was at least relieved to find that her butt hadn't grown all that much, as she still felt comfortable in her own pair of sweatpants, though she could definitely feel that her hips had widened a bit.

“Checking yourself out cousin? Geez and you said I was the one too into themselves!” Rachel's eyes snapped up in surprise as she heard her cousin giggling at her. Once her eyes landed on the girl in question however the brunette made no effort to hold her shock in as her jaw dropped at the sight of her cousin.

To say Nicole's belly was merely huge at this point was like saying that her parents were only kinda rich. What word could accurately describe Nicole's colossal tan dome Rachel didn't know, but it probably only existed in some obscure dictionary that only scientists used, considering that it was jutting out of her cousin's body by about four to four and a half feet, the outie on its crest sticking out like a cute little nub. Much to Rachel's surprise it seemed that Nicole's body hadn't decided to pour any more milk into her breasts today, which was fine by her because as far as Rachel was concerned those didn't need to be growing any larger lest they burst out of Nicole's shirt, which was already turned into nothing but a glorified sports bra at this point. Considering that the belly took up most of her view of Nicole the brunette couldn't tell whether or not her butt had grown any, but if her view of it yesterday was anything to go by it was probably just as ridiculous as the blonde's breasts judging by how much her sweatpants were stretched.

“Uh N-Nicole...” Rachel breathed, unsure of what to say next.

“Yeah I know,” Nicole sighed, saving her cousin from trying to dance around the issue, “I'm absolutely massive.”

“Well you seem to be taking it pretty well,” Rachel snarked, “what do you like getting this huge or something?”

“W-What?!? No way!” Nicole yelped, “who the hell would ever want to be this big?!?”

“Okay okay geez! Calm down!” Rachel snickered at her cousin, “I was only joking with you.” This seemed to appease Nicole, who began to lay back into the couch she was on. However, Rachel knew better than to point out that despite her cousin's denial, she'd turned a shade of red too suspicious for someone who hated getting that huge from being pregnant. She didn't really know why her cousin would bother to hide something like that though, because if she was totally honest with herself Rachel had to admit there was something a bit exciting about being a mother. Also, she had to admit there was a certain air of...wonder she got whenever she saw how huge her cousin was.

She might have even been a little jealous that her belly was so small in comparison. But that couldn't be true...right? She asked herself, biting her lip as she placed both hands on her gravid form.

“Ugh geez guys quiet down...” the two cousins turned to Betty after hearing her annoyed groans from underneath the couch pillow.

“Morning sleeping beauty.” Nicole teased as she threw another pillow at her best friend.

“Oh shut up you bi- holy...” Betty stopped herself as she took in her bestie's new size, “Nicky...”

“Yeah yeah we get it I grew again!” Nicole cut her off with an annoyed huff, “geez you all act like I'm some kind of undiscovered animal or something!”

“Well to be fair I don't think anyone has ever carried seven kids as far as you have before.” Rachel pointed out.

“Yeah well...shut up.” Nicole finished lamely, causing the other two to laugh. A comfortable silence descended upon the three as they each tended to the kicks of their children, and all was well.

Then there was a knock at the door.

“Uh Nicole?” Rachel inquired, though the shrug that her cousin gave her told her that she hadn't been expecting anyone either.

“Hey Betty can you get that?” Nicole pleaded with her best friend,“I would but I'm not sure if I'm able to even walk right now...”

“Sure Nicky,” Betty said with a warm smile, “urgh just gimme a sec.” After heaving herself up the redhead waddled over to the door and peeked through the peephole. The two cousins noticed immediately that something was up when they saw their friend's face pale.

“Well Betty,” Nicole prompted anxiously, “who is it?”

“It's...”
145331121122211112111122121211121112112.title: The girls are awoken a few hours later by a kno...

1453311211222111121111221212111211121122.content:
“It's...”
“Hello? Nicole are you there?” Now it was the party princess' turn to pale at what lurked beyond her door, for it was none other than her troublesome ex Chris.

“What the hell is he doing here?” Nicole hissed to Betty quietly.

“How should I know?!?” Betty whispered back just as harshly.

“Uh guys...” Rachel tilted her head, confused as to why her cousin and her friend were freaking out, “I think I'm missing something here, who is that?”

“One of my exes who doesn't know when to quit.” Nicole grumbled.

“Heh, maybe you could see if he wants to be your baby daddy?” Rachel joked.

“Oh hell no!” Nicole growled, “I wouldn't let that idiot be the father of my kids if he was the only man left on Earth!”

“Nicole he won't leave...” Betty warned as the knocking intensified. “What do we do?”

“I dunno!” Nicole said tossing her arms up, “make something up!”

“Seriously?” Rachel raised her eyebrow, “when was the last time he saw you?”

“When my belly was still flat and not looking like I stuffed four beach balls into it!” Nicole replied icily, directing a light glare at the offending mass attached to her.

“Oh hey...Betty?” The two heard the man greet the least pregnant of the trio, “what are you doing here?”

“Well for one thing I am Nicole's best friend.” She snidely replied while doing her best to keep her belly hidden behind the door since Chris hadn't seen her pregnant.

“Oh...yeah...” Chris awkwardly replied, realizing that he'd made an obvious mistake. “Uh, is Nicole home by any chance?” The blonde froze at her mention.

“U-Uh...nope! She isn't!” Betty hastily replied, obviously not wanting to continue the conversation, “she actually had to go...out of town...with her family for a couple of days since her cousins were visiting.” Nicole silently cheered as she heard Betty come up with a reasonably legitimate excuse on the spot.

“Oh.” Chris said, dejected, “wait then why are you here?”

“To watch her stuff while she's away! Duh!” Betty replied as if she was talking to an idiot, and in Nicole's mind she was indeed talking to quite a big idiot.

“Oh well uh when she gets back can you tell he-”

“Well nice talking to ya but I gotta go.” Betty said, rolling her eyes in annoyance as she slammed the door shut on him before he could finish his reply. All three girls then waited with baited breath, none of them daring to move until they finally heard footsteps walk away after what seemed like hours. After that the girls all sighed in relief now that the proverbial pest had finally left.

“What a nuisance,” Betty muttered as she waddled back to the couch and sat down with a huff.

“I think nuisance might be too good for that guy,” Nicole said, shaking her head in frustration, “I can't believe he still hasn't picked up that we're never going to be a thing again.”

“Well sometimes guys are persistent. So I wouldn't worry about it too much Nicole.” Rachel said, trying to bring the tension in the room down. “Anyways, we should probably head out here in a bit, we need to get to the doctor's office as early as we can so that not too many people see us.” Rachel suggested as she looked at her watch, which currently read 6:15.

“Good idea!” Betty chirped, “we can probably get it over with and then eat breakfast once we get back.”

“Sounds good to me, I just woke up and I'm already starving.” Nicole agreed, her stomach loudly voicing its agreement at the mention of food.

“Well I'm not surprised Nicky,” Betty winked slyly at her best friend, “now come on, let's get you up off the couch.”

It was a tedious task, with Betty first heaving herself up off her side of the couch, while Rachel slowly got herself standing as well. After they both waddled slowly over to Nicole, who was impatiently wriggling her fingers for them to grab, they took hold and grunted. The mother of seven's weight gain was definitely showing as it took them a few tries to even move her from off the couch, but finally, after ten minutes they managed to balance the hugely pregnant Nicole on her feet. Betty and Rachel had already waddled out the front door, but Nicole hadn't even made it to the doorway before her legs were begging for rest.

“Crap,” she panted tiredly, “all that walking yesterday wore me out, I can barely move...” a few more steps towards the front door was all she could manage before she bent over, one hand steadying herself on the wall, the other rubbing her belly to sooth her children, who were obviously not happy at being woken up so early in the morning.

“Nicole!” She heard Rachel and Betty heading back towards her.

“Sorry guys,” she wheezed, “just taking a little breather...”

“Come on.” Betty said gently, “we'll help you.”

“Come on guys,” Nicole protested weakly as they linked her arms around their shoulders, “I can...make it...”

“Nonsense Nicole,” Rachel said sternly, “we're all pregnant without explanation, so we're in this together!” The soon to be birthday girl felt tears welling up in her eyes. A few days she didn't even want to think about what it was like being pregnant, and she'd been so full of hate towards her cousins. Now here she was, pregnant with not one, but seven children, arm in arm with her best friend and her new friend and cousin, Rachel, supporting each other as if they'd known each other for years!

For the first time in her life Nicole wasn't taking these relationships for granted, and strangely enough, she actually felt like getting pregnant had ended up being a good thing.

Now Rachel and Betty had been used to going slow, being pregnant and all, but with the weight of Nicole and how huge she was they were practically going at a snail's pace! Luckily, they managed to snag an empty elevator close by, which was miraculously wide enough for all three of them to fit into. Then, they carefully made their way to Rachel's van, and hoisted Nicole's gravid form into the backseat. Rachel hopped into the passenger's seat as they all agreed that Betty should drive since she was currently the smallest in size.

Of course, even though the redhead was indeed the smallest of the group, driving with a full-term twin-sized belly was no easy feat. However, the challenge was at least mitigated by the fact that not too many people were out at this hour. Finally, after a somewhat rough ride they had finally arrived.

Rachel had gone off to go check them in while Betty went off to go find an easier way to get Nicole in, leaving the lattermost girl alone with her thoughts. As she sat in silence, gently caressing her belly, the past couple of days weighed heavily on her mind. Getting pregnant, growing so fast, the ultrasound, her mom's visiting, everything. What if I can't do it? She wondered, what if I don't make a good mom? Maybe Lucille was right... Nicole felt moisture beginning to form in her eyes I just barely got a job, don't have any baby supplies or anything! She shouted angrily at herself, and by now the tears were flowing freely down her face.

By this time Rachel had returned to see her cousin's tears.

“Nicole?” She inquired softly, “sweetie are you alright?”

“No...” came the shaky reply. Rachel frowned and hoisted herself up next to her distraught cousin.

“Hey now, what's wrong girl?” She asked, gently trying to coax an answer out of the blonde mother of septuplets.

“Oh Rachel!” Nicole sobbed as she buried her face into her cousin's shoulder, “I'm gonna be a horrible mother!”

Rachel was taken aback for a few seconds, all this time she'd thought Nicole had been handling this the best out of all of them, when in reality she'd been bottling up her emotions inside, which hadn't been a smart thing to do, especially when they were all hormonally driven emotional wrecks that were pregnant women.

“Hey now, what makes you say that Nicky?” Rachel cooed, rubbing her cousin's back reassuringly.

“Look at me Rachel!” Nicole cried, “I'm as big as a house, I can't walk three steps without running out of breath, I haven't even started my job, and I haven't even bought any baby supplies!” Rachel was heartbroken as she heard her cousin whimper, “I'm beginning to think Lucille was right...maybe I am just doomed to fail...”

“Nicole stop it!” Rachel shushed Nicole before she descended any further in the abyss of self pity, “now stop beating yourself up and look at me!” Much to her relief, Nicole stopped sniffling for a few seconds and looked up at her. “Good, and now listen to me,” she chided, “you are not a failure Nicole! If anything the fact that you've been holding up this long being pregnant with seven is proof of that! Screw Lucille! She still thinks you're just a stuck up brat who isn't worth her time, but if she'd been here with you for the past couple of days, she'd have seen that you've definitely matured into a woman who's more ready for motherhood than she'll ever be! Understand?”

Nicole was shocked, she didn't think that Rachel would defend her so strongly, but now that she thought about it, she had definitely changed over the past couple of days, and not just physically. She had gone from thinking about herself and the next booze driven party or the next new fling with some stranger she knew nothing about to being more compassionate and kind towards her cousin and Betty. She even realized that she was excited about being a mom, considering how much love was in her heart for her unborn children.

“Heh, you're right Rachel,” she sniffed, “thanks for that.”

“Hey, what are cousins for?” Rachel winked.

"So we're signed in and everything then?" Nicole inquired, to which Betty nodded in confirmation.

"Yup! I even got you a set of wheels," she proudly proclaimed, jiggling the wheelchair for emphasis.

"Oh ha ha," Nicole rolled her eyes, the joke not really hitting home with her, "let's just get this over with!" With that, Rachel and Betty carefully helped Nicole out of the car and gently set her down in the wheelchair, which creaked ominously, but still managed to hold up despite Nicole's weight. Unfortunately, our heroine had heard the creak loud and clear which dampened her mood once again, making her sigh sadly.

Seeing this, Rachel clasped a reassuring hand on her cousins shoulder and gave it a light squeeze. Looking up, Nicole saw her cousin smile encouragingly, which in turn brightened her demeanor once again.

After that, the three pregnant young women set off through the building, Nicole's huge gravid form jutting from the wheelchair as though a hill had turned on its side. Through sheer luck nobody was visiting the doctor at this time of day, but of course they had to pass the front desk, and if they weren't women on a mission they would have definitely laughed at the dropped jaw the attendant sported when she saw the size of Nicole.

After heading towards Dr. Anderson's office...

145331121122211112111122121212.content:
Nicole awoke to the sound of a dull, but quite loud roar that startled her into an almost perfectly awake state. Looking outside she noticed that it had gotten dark outside and took a look at the that was across the couch.

"Huh? Only 9:00 eh? Felt like longer..." She observed in a neutral tone. "Wonder why I woke up so soo-" her question was immediately cut off as Nicole clutched her stomach, feeling a sharp pang of hunger come from within, emphasized by a rather loud growl that probably could be heard throughout her entire condo. She laughed nervously and gave her belly a pat before addressing the seven passengers inside her womb, "guess you all are pretty hungry as well huh? Well let's see what we can't do about that..."

It only took a minute for the heavily pregnant girl to get up and waddle over to the kitchen. She deliberated for a second on what she wanted to eat before deciding that she'd just take an assortment of items out and see how they fared. In a rush of hunger-fueled impulses she grabbed a loaf of bread, two bags of potato chips, some leftover pizza that she'd taken home from Betty's, and an entire cream pie. She ended up making around eight sandwiches before stopping to look at everything she'd taken out.

Am I even going to be able to eat all of this? She thought skeptically as she felt intimidated by the amount of food she had brought out. Of course, another pang of hunger made her groan while picking up one of the peanut butter and jelly sandwich she'd made, before ceremoniously taking a bite.

That first bite was all her body needed.

Suddenly Nicole felt all of her pent up hunger hit her at once as she dove into her meal without a second thought about pacing or slowing down even to chew properly. She went through all of her sandwiches like they were nothing while simultaneously stuffing entire handfuls of chips into her mouth. One would've thought that she would have choked on her food at this rate, but apparently this was not so as she devoured an entire bag of chips in the span of a minute and a half. She didn't bother to heat up the pizza she'd brought back at this point since she was too hungry to care, and ended up finishing off the entire box before deciding that she was thirsty.

Groaning at the slight fullness she was experiencing she heaved herself up and made her way over to the refrigerator. Upon opening it she immediately found a 2-liter bottle of lemon lime soda and didn't waste a second before ripping the cap off and clumsily guzzling it down like there was no tomorrow, not even hesitating as she felt some of the contents of the bottle spill out onto her new shirt. She actually managed to chug about three fourths of the entire bottle before stopping to take a breath as she felt a large amount of gas building up inside her.

*BURP* The resulting belch was something that could only be described as having come from some sort of primordial monster from ages gone by. Sighing in relief at the gas having been let out she slowly waddled back to her chair at the kitchen table, feeling the contents of her current meal slosh around inside her as she walked.

After arriving at the table with a now empty soda bottle, Nicole let out another belch before tiredly eyeing her last objective: the cream pie. However, upon seeing this last culinary delight her stomach announced that it really didn't have much room to spare, and the rational part of her brain told her that she'd eaten plenty already, but once she smelled the delicious aroma of the dessert adorned with whipped cream there was no stopping her. Slice by slice she ate, never yielding even when her stomach groaned in disapproval as she began to stuff it past its max capacity. Eventually though, after a couple minutes, she had finished her feast, and sat back in her chair, which creaked all the more as she had only added to her pregnant weight.

"Best...meal...ever..." She breathed out before starting to get up out of her chair. The meal had taken its toll on her however, and she found herself in a sleepy , full state which made her bend over forward and would have made her fall had she not steadied herself on the counter top while she walked. Walking over to the bathroom to wash her hands, she took a look up at her reflection and blanched.

"I...I guess really overdid it..." She muttered, taking in the resulting aftermath of her feeding frenzy. Her poor stomach, which had been filled past its brim, had bloated out even larger, and looked like she had added another child into her womb while no one was looking, leaving the bottom of her belly to peek out from underneath her shirt. "Aw hell! My new shirt!" She cried out in horror as she eyed the now ruined garment. From taking even a glance at this piece of clothing, her astounding meal had been made obvious to anyone that noticed the many crumbs, jelly stains, trails of soda, and specks of cream that now adorned her shirt. Groaning in frustration, Nicole figured it would be best to take it off and just throw it away since it was most likely too late to get the stains out anyways. Besides, its not like another shirt is gonna kill my parent's bank account, she thought dismissively.

After stripping her torso down to naught but the black, somewhat see through maternity bra, she shrugged and decided to go the whole nine yards before freeing her lower half of the sweatpants that she currently had on. Well, it's more comfortable to sleep in just a bra and panties like this anyhow. She thought with a nod of approval before she started off towards her room. She cursed the fact that she had to walk up stairs to get to her room, since each and every step up was a journey in itself made harder by the fact that her full tummy had left her feeling even slower and more lethargic. She felt a bit self conscious as she felt her breasts and butt jiggle with every stair she ascended, feeling as if her weight was due to bad eating habits rather than being pregnant with seven children. (Not to mention the implants she'd gotten before this.) Finally, after a long and arduous journey, she'd made her way to the top of the stairs, out of breath and huffing and puffing as if she'd run an entire marathon instead of just walking up 32 steps.

After a few minutes of rest she waddled into her room and didn't even have time to pull her bed's blanket over herself before she fell into a deep sleep.
